job_description[0]: POSITION OVERVIEW

job_description[4]: Implementation & Configuration:

job_description[18]: : Complete Training & Handling documentation, conduct formal testing, and ensure a smooth handover to customers.

job_description[27]: : Performs other related duties as assigned.

job_title: Software Project Leader - Up to 2,500$ - Hybrid Working - Relocation Bonus
job_description[0]: LG Electronics Development Vietnam (LGEDV) Company focuses on smart & eco-friendly automotive components. The VC Company produces high-quality & state-of-the-art in-car infotainment systems that deliver both information and entertainment on the go for many of the world‘s biggest automobile brands.
job_description[1]: We, LG Electronics Development Vietnam (LGEDV), conduct core R&D activities and various product reliability tests in support of our vehicle component business.
job_description[2]: As Software Project Leader of LGEDV Da Nang Office, you will:
job_description[3]: • Coordination of SW development activities
job_description[4]: • Manage operations related to the delivery of assigned projects
job_description[5]: • Project Management
job_description[6]: o Discuss plans for assigned projects with HQ based on LGEDV & Vietnam calendar
job_description[7]: o Monitor the progress of scheduled activities
job_description[8]: o Monitor and control quality of deliverables
job_description[9]: o Identify and act on potential problems as early as possible
job_description[10]: o Identify, report and act on risks as early as possible
job_description[11]: o Identify and act on conflicts of interest with other areas within or external to the project
job_description[12]: o Report progress (and potential delays and issues) to HQ/OEM
job_description[13]: • Defect Management
job_description[14]: o Supervise Development and maintenance of the heritage of the defect to reinforce platform approach
job_description[15]: o Act as SPOC (Single Point Of Contact) for the defect management towards OEM/HQ
job_description[16]: o Manage defect calls with OEM/HQ and provide clear minutes and actions
job_description[17]: • Software Releases
job_description[18]: o Support the release of each software to all stakeholders and Partners of the LGEDV, supporting them for each difficulty which may be faced during the update.
job_description[19]: o Review Software release notes prepared by Functional teams for each release, and make sure it is meeting the required quality
job_description[20]: • Customization requirements
job_description[21]: o Insert and update settings and customization requirements inside LG databases
job_description[22]: o Analyze the impact of CR and lead overall CR development
job_description[23]: • Test Coordination
job_description[24]: o Collaborate with Validation stakeholders & Certification teams to retest fixed defects
job_description[25]: o Review various reports prepared by Validation stakeholders & Certification teams
job_description[26]: • Process Alignment
job_description[27]: o Improvement for project management to meet A-SPICE requirement
job_description[28]: Expected results:
job_description[29]: • Ensure that projects are delivered on time, with the required quality standards within agreed customer requirement specifications

job_description[0]: ***Để đảm bảo hồ sơ được tiếp nhận xử lý, ứng viên cần nộp hồ sơ ứng tuyển trên website tuyển dụng chính thức của Vietcombank tại địa chỉ: https://tuyendung.vietcombank.com.vn
job_description[1]: Thời hạn nộp hồ sơ: đến hết ngày 31
job_description[3]: I. Mô tả công việc:
job_description[4]: 1. Xây dựng và quản lý chiến lược về an ninh thông tin trong phạm vi được phân công:
job_description[5]: - Phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan để đề xuất, xây dựng và rà soát, đề xuất điều chỉnh (nếu cần thiết) chiến lược về an ninh thông tin phù hợp với chiến lược phát triển và định hướng hoạt động kinh doanh của VCB trong từng thời kỳ.
job_description[6]: - Theo dõi, giám sát việc thực hiện chiến lược về an ninh thông tin của VCB.
job_description[7]: 2. Xây dựng, quản lý giải pháp và kiến trúc về an ninh thông tin trong phạm vi được phân công:
job_description[8]: - Phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan xây dựng kế hoạch, thiết kế các giải pháp kiến trúc để đảm bảo an ninh, ATTT cho hệ thống CNTT của VCB.

job_requirement[8]: • Tiếng Anh đọc hiểu tài liệu tốt

job_requirement[10]: • Có kinh nghiệm với Kafka / RabbitMQ / Pulsar, Redis, Elasticsearch

job_title: Head Of VPBank Enterprise Data And Analytics Division Id671
job_description[0]: Strategy & Planning
job_description[1]: Lead, develop, communicate, and implement the strategic direction of Enterprise Data and Analytics Division:
job_description[2]: • Lead the development of the annual business plan and objectives, direction for product and service development, and budget of the Enterprise Data and Analytics Division based on the strategic development direction for the short and long term to ensure competitiveness, customer needs, market, partners, and achieve business targets assigned by the Board of Directors/CEO.
job_description[3]: • Lead the implementation of the organizational and business models of the Division to enhance market competitiveness and achieve short-term, medium-term, and long-term growth and profitability objectives.
job_description[4]: • Lead and approve the business allocation plan for the departments/units under the Division, control and support direct management personnel to build and allocate KPIs for subordinates.
job_description[5]: • Monitor the progress and adjust the annual action plan/strategy as necessary to achieve desired results based on the approved development strategy, follow market conditions, industry trends, competitors, customer needs, and changes in regulations from relevant authorities and strategic partners.
job_description[6]: • Develop the bank's data management strategy under the direction of the leadership board.
job_description[7]: • Establish data management and governance standards, policies, and procedures.
job_description[8]: • Standardize business analysis tools and maximize automation of business analysis reports.
job_description[9]: • Develop policies and measures to protect information assets, especially related to data security laws if applicable in Vietnam.
job_description[10]: • Attend EXCO, Strategy Council, Strategy Planning, as well as other Executive Board and Leadership Board meetings as necessary.
job_description[11]: Business Management
job_description[12]: General Operations Management:
job_description[13]: • Implement leadership and business management, direct the activities of the Division.
job_description[14]: • Monitor the development and implementation of appropriate strategic initiatives to enhance market competitiveness and achieve short- and long-term growth and profit objectives.
job_description[15]: Successful achievement of Data Analytics targets & Development goals:
job_description[16]: • Lead the design of the overall data architecture and ensure its consistency with the management framework throughout the development of the entire ecosystem data system, identify new types, forms, and sources of data to support business innovation throughout the organization.
job_description[17]: • Lead comprehensive management of end-to-end data flow for integration, storage, process of data in end-to-end data pipelines for integration, storage, and processing of data: Develop and maintain controls for data quality, interaction ability, and sources to effectively manage the company's data usage and analysis-related risks.
job_description[18]: • Lead the management of the readiness, accessibility, and distribution of system-wide data as a product: Manage data, exploit data for in-depth research and analysis to maximize profitability on data assets.
job_description[19]: • Lead the application and promotion of AI/ML technology in the banking industry.
job_description[20]: - Design and implement predictive analytics and optimization analytics for business and operations units, using data science and machine learning techniques.
job_description[21]: - Package models, APIs, and develop intuitive tool systems with the aim of providing advanced analysis solutions to units.
job_description[22]: - Partner with business and operations units to correspondingly support the development of AI strategies with the overall goal of achieving business/operational objectives.
job_description[23]: • Develop methods to ensure consistency and suitability of analysis results in practical business decisions.
job_description[24]: • Promote a data-driven decision-making culture and enhancing understanding of data across the bank.
job_description[25]: • Manage, monitor the implementation, and adjusting policies and data management to meet legal and information security requirements.
job_description[26]: • Coordinate IT, Infrastructure Management reporting (data model, business metadata, data mart, BI).
job_description[27]: • Provide regular/ad-hoc BI reports & analytics to support decisions making.
job_description[28]: Compliance and risk management
job_description[29]: • Monitor the compliance with internal and external policies.
job_description[30]: • Supervise the application of limits and risk management procedures in accordance with the Bank's regulations from time to time.
job_description[31]: Resources Management
job_description[32]: People Management
job_description[33]: Implement the necessary leadership and management to enable direct and indirect subordinates to achieve the goals of EDA and the bank.
job_description[34]: • Develop staff and head-count plans, human resource allocation.
job_description[35]: • Work in collaboration with HR to develop recruitment, training, succession planning, career development roadmap, recognition employees, performance management for employees in EDA.
job_description[36]: Attracting, developing and retaining key performers and improving employee satisfaction.
job_description[38]: • Act as a role model in building corporate culture. Ensure the correct and full implementation of corporate culture implementation plans; Employees understand and apply consistently corporate cultural values, behavioral standards of VPBank.
job_description[39]: Other responsibilities assigned time to time by superior.

company_name: LG Electronics Development Vietnam Company Limited
job_description[0]: LG Electronics Development Vietnam (LGEDV) Company focuses on smart & eco-friendly automotive components. The VC Company produces high-quality & state of the art in-car infotainment systems that deliver both information and entertainment on-the-go for many of the world‘s biggest automobile brands.
job_description[1]: We, LG Electronics Development Vietnam (LGEDV), conduct core R&D activities, and various product reliability tests in support of our vehicle component business.
job_description[2]: As a Software Architect of LGEDV in the Da Nang office, your roles & responsibilities will be as below:
job_description[3]: Purpose and objectives of the job
job_description[4]:  Be responsible to lead architectural decision based on constraints, risks and quality attributes among stake-holders i.e.) OEM, developer teams, project leader, developers, validation engineers etc.
job_description[5]:  Act as single point of contact for the company work scope to collect, discuss and review, any technical requirement or topic related to the delivery of products to customer
job_description[6]: Expected results
job_description[7]:  Ensure that projects are delivered on time, with the required quality standards within agreed customer requirement specifications
job_description[8]: Primary duties and responsibilities of the job
job_description[9]:  Design overall SW Architecture and explicitly make SAD (SW Architectural Design) document based on customer requirements.
job_description[10]:  Consider SW Reusability by checking whether new modules are really needed or not, have the developers utilize the previous design and source code that already developed in other projects to avoid redundant work load
job_description[11]:  Propose technical alternatives for resolving cross-functional issues at project level
job_description[12]:  Perform a verification review of design
job_description[13]: Collect or propose new technical programs to be setup, not related to a specific product, but applicable in general. Then manage all related technical activities for the execution of such programs (from planning, to development and testing)

job_description[0]: Overview
job_description[1]: This role is designed for a solution-driven Business Analyst capable of owning end-to-end initiatives across multiple business units in a fast-changing real-estate ecosystem.
job_description[2]: You will act as a bridge between Business – IT – Vendors, ensuring that requirements are clarified, solutions are practical, and projects are delivered with quality and accountability.
job_description[3]: Responsibility
job_description[4]: 1. Business Analysis:
job_description[5]: • Conduct requirement elicitation through workshops, interviews, observations, and process analysis.
job_description[6]: • Analyze business processes and identify pain points, providing feasible solution options aligned with operational and strategic goals.
job_description[7]: • Prepare functional documentation, including business requirements, user stories, process flows, use cases, business rules, data mapping, and UI/UX wireframes (Figma.
job_description[8]: • Collaborate closely with developers, testers, and vendors to clarify requirements and ensure alignment with the proposed solution.
job_description[9]: • Support and coordinate UAT activities: test scenario review, defect tracking, validation, and acceptance sign-off.
job_description[10]: • Ensure delivered solutions meet business expectations and are operationally viable
job_description[11]: 2. Project Management Support:
job_description[12]: • Own the planning activities within the assigned scope: requirement clarification, timeline estimation, risk identification, and dependency mapping.
job_description[13]: • Coordinate with business users, IT teams, and vendors to ensure project activities progress according to plan
job_description[14]: • Monitor and follow up on tasks assigned in the project, escalating issues to the Supervisor/Project Manager when necessary.
job_description[15]: • Act as the primary point of contact for assigned modules/features to ensure smooth communication and alignment.
job_description[16]: • Manage change requests within assigned scope and assess impacts on timeline and deliverables
job_description[17]: • Support project closure, including documentation of lessons learned and improvement proposals
job_description[18]: 3. Prepare project reports, requirement traceability matrices, risk logs, and progress updates as required by the Supervisor/PM.
job_description[19]: 4. Other:
job_description[20]: • Other tasks assigned by Line Manager based on the evolving needs of the business at a particular time.
job_description[21]: • Proactively propose improvements to business processes or implementation methodologies.

job_description[9]: - Collaborate with Level 2 Experts to test, validate, and implement solutions for users.
job_description[10]: - Ensure smooth information flow between users and Level 2 teams for quick problem resolution.

job_description[12]: - Lead, manage, and mentor the Level 1 Delivery Support team to ensure efficient handling of support requests.
job_description[13]: - Monitor daily support activities, prioritize tickets, and ensure timely resolution.
job_description[14]: - Develop standard operating procedures (SOPs) and ensure adherence across the team.
job_description[15]: - Conduct regular performance reviews and training to enhance team capabilities.

job_title: Product Manager (Sản Phẩm Tài Chính - Kế Toán Cho Doanh Nghiệp) (Phỏng vấn trước Tết - Nhận việc sau Tết)
job_description[0]: Trong suốt hành trình hơn 30 năm tiên phong, MISA tự hào là công ty hàng đầu Việt Nam cung cấp giải pháp chuyển đổi số toàn diện SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) với gần 60 sản phẩm, ứng dụng cho 350.000 khách hàng là cơ quan nhà nước, doanh nghiệp, hộ kinh doanh và 3.5 triệu khách hàng cá nhân tại Việt Nam và 22 quốc gia trên thế giới. MISA vinh dự khi được đồng hành cùng các Bộ, ban, ngành trong chương trình Chuyển đổi số quốc gia, tự động hóa hoạt động quản lý, kinh doanh, giúp nâng cao năng suất và góp phần vào sự phát triển chung của Việt Nam.
job_description[1]: Với tinh thần "Nỗ lực sáng tạo vì một thế giới thông minh bằng sản phẩm công nghệ trí tuệ Việt", chúng tôi mong muốn được đồng hành cùng bạn, kiến tạo nên những thành tựu đột phá.
job_description[2]: Mô tả công việc:
job_description[3]: • Xây dựng chiến lược và lập kế hoạch phát triển sản phẩm, định hướng sản phẩm trở thành phần mềm quản lý hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực tương ứng.
job_description[4]: • Làm việc chặt chẽ với các bộ phận kỹ thuật, phân tích sản phẩm để đảm bảo sản phẩm phát triển theo đúng định hướng, đạt chất lượng cao và đáp ứng nhu cầu khách hàng.
job_description[5]: • Hợp tác với Marketing & Sales để mở rộng thị trường, xây dựng chiến lược tiếp cận khách hàng và đạt được các mục tiêu kinh doanh.
job_description[6]: • Thấu hiểu nhu cầu của thị trường và khách hàng, nghiên cứu luật và các quy định liên quan đến các hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh đáp ứng nhu cầu doanh nghiệp.
job_description[7]: • Theo sát xu hướng phát triển của ngành thương mại, sản xuất tại Việt Nam và trên thế giới để tìm kiếm ý tưởng, cải tiến và phát triển sản phẩm ngày càng vượt trội.

company_name: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN VINSMART FUTURE
job_description[0]: Mô tả công việc
job_description[1]: • Phát triển và duy trì AI Platform: Thiết kế, xây dựng và tối ưu hóa các tính năng core của nền tảng AI, bao gồm multi-agent orchestration, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), MCP (Model Context Protocol), và Agent-to-Agent communication, đảm bảo hiệu suất cao và khả năng mở rộng.
job_description[2]: • Kiến trúc hệ thống end-to-end: Chịu trách nhiệm thiết kế kiến trúc full-stack từ frontend (UI/UX cho AI workflows) đến backend (API, microservices, agent coordination), database design và integration với các LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.).
job_description[3]: • Triển khai RAG pipeline: Xây dựng và tối ưu hóa hệ thống RAG hoàn chỉnh bao gồm document processing, vector embedding, semantic search, context retrieval và prompt engineering để nâng cao chất lượng AI responses.
job_description[4]: • Phát triển Multi-Agent System: Thiết kế và implement logic điều phối nhiều AI agents, xử lý communication protocols, task delegation, conflict resolution và state management giữa các agents.
job_description[5]: • Tích hợp MCP và A2A protocols: Implement Model Context Protocol để quản lý context hiệu quả và xây dựng Agent-to-Agent communication framework cho phép các agents tương tác, chia sẻ thông tin và collaborate trong các workflows phức tạp.
job_description[6]: • Tối ưu hiệu suất và scalability: Monitor, profile và optimize performance của các AI workflows, xử lý concurrent requests, caching strategies, và đảm bảo platform có thể scale theo nhu cầu người dùng.
job_description[7]: • API development và integration: Thiết kế RESTful/GraphQL APIs, integrate với third-party services, vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant), và các AI/ML tools ecosystem.
job_description[8]: • Code quality và best practices: Maintain high code quality standards, viết unit tests, integration tests, conduct code reviews, và document technical architecture và APIs cho team.
job_description[9]: • Collaboration và mentoring: Làm việc chặt chẽ với AI/ML engineers, product managers và designers, đồng thời mentor junior developers về AI application development và best practices.
job_description[10]: • R&D công nghệ mới: Nghiên cứu và đánh giá các công nghệ AI emerging (fine-tuning, prompt optimization techniques, new agent frameworks), đề xuất và implement các giải pháp cải tiến cho platform.
job_requirement[0]: Trình độ học vấn:
job_requirement[1]: • Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học máy tính, Kỹ thuật phần mềm hoặc các ngành liên quan
job_requirement[2]: Kinh nghiệm làm việc:
job_requirement[3]: • Tối thiểu 5+ năm kinh nghiệm phát triển phần mềm full-stack
job_requirement[4]: • Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm từ 2+ năm làm việc với AI Platform, AI Agents, Multi-Agent Systems, RAG, MCP, hoặc A2A communication
job_requirement[5]: Kỹ năng lập trình & Framework:
job_requirement[6]: • Thành thạo ngôn ngữ python
job_requirement[7]: • Hiểu sâu về memory model, closure, threading, event loop
job_requirement[8]: • Kinh nghiệm với frontend frameworks: React hoặc Vue.js
job_requirement[9]: • Thiết kế module reusable, áp dụng SOLID principles và design patterns nâng cao
job_requirement[10]: AI/ML & Platform Development:
job_requirement[11]: • Ưu tiên cao: Kinh nghiệm thực tế với AI Agent development, Multi-Agent orchestration
job_requirement[12]: • Ưu tiên cao: Hiểu biết về RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline: document processing, vector embedding, semantic search
job_requirement[13]: • Ưu tiên cao: Kinh nghiệm với MCP (Model Context Protocol) và A2A (Agent-to-Agent) communication
job_requirement[14]: • Kinh nghiệm tích hợp với LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Claude, GPT-4, etc.)
job_requirement[15]: • Hiểu biết về prompt engineering và context management
job_requirement[16]: • Kinh nghiệm với vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant, Milvus)
job_requirement[17]: Cơ sở dữ liệu:
job_requirement[18]: • Kinh nghiệm với cả SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) và NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis)
job_requirement[19]: • Hiểu rõ cách thức hoạt động và lựa chọn CSDL phù hợp với yêu cầu dự án
job_requirement[20]: • Kinh nghiệm với vector databases cho AI applications
job_requirement[21]: API & Integration:
job_requirement[22]: • Thiết kế và phát triển RESTful APIs và/hoặc GraphQL
job_requirement[23]: • Kinh nghiệm tích hợp third-party services và APIs
job_requirement[24]: • Hiểu rõ luồng mạng giữa frontend ↔ backend ↔ database ↔ third party services
job_requirement[25]: Message Queue & Event Streaming:
job_requirement[26]: • Kinh nghiệm với Apache Kafka cho event streaming và message processing
job_requirement[27]: • Hiểu biết về event-driven architecture và asynchronous communication
job_requirement[28]: DevOps & CI/CD:
job_requirement[29]: • Tự cấu hình build/test/deploy pipelines
job_requirement[30]: • Kinh nghiệm với Docker, Docker Compose
job_requirement[31]: • Ưu tiên cao: Kinh nghiệm thực tế với Kubernetes (K8S) cho container orchestration
job_requirement[32]: • Thiết lập và tối ưu CI/CD, caching, proxy
job_requirement[34]: • Ưu tiên cao: Kinh nghiệm làm việc với AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, ECS/EKS, RDS, etc.)
job_requirement[35]: • Hiểu biết về cloud architecture và best practices
job_requirement[36]: • Lợi thế: Kinh nghiệm với hybrid cloud environment (kết hợp on-premise và cloud)
job_requirement[37]: • Kinh nghiệm với infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
job_requirement[39]: • Hiểu rõ các kiến trúc: Monolith, Microservices, Event-driven
job_requirement[40]: • Đánh giá được tác động khi thay đổi kiến trúc
job_requirement[41]: • Khả năng thiết kế module độc lập theo performance & maintainability
job_requirement[42]: • Kinh nghiệm thiết kế hệ thống có khả năng scale
job_requirement[44]: • Thiết kế test strategy toàn diện (unit, integration, edge case)
job_requirement[45]: • Tự động hóa kiểm thử với AI/công cụ hỗ trợ
job_requirement[48]: • Hiểu biết về OWASP Top 10 và cách phòng chống

job_description[0]: Dẫn dắt việc thiết kế, quản trị và tối ưu kiến trúc hệ thống tổng thể của dòng sản phẩm AI Hội thoại, bao gồm kiến trúc ứng dụng, dữ liệu, hạ tầng, tích hợp và bảo mật. Đảm bảo hệ thống có khả năng mở rộng, an toàn, hiệu năng cao, phù hợp với kế hoạch sản phẩm dài hạn.
job_description[1]: Nhiệm vụ chính:
job_description[2]: - Thiết kế kiến trúc hệ thống theo hướng scalable, tối ưu khả năng triển khai hybrid giữa cloud-based và edge-based (dòng sản phẩm TLA trên xe VinFast và AI cho robot).
job_description[3]: - Xây dựng tiêu chuẩn, nguyên tắc và khung quản trị kiến trúc
job_description[4]: - Thẩm định, tư vấn kỹ thuật và trực tiếp triển khai thiết kế giải pháp.
job_description[5]: - Giám sát hiệu năng, độ tin cậy, chi phí vận hành và đề xuất tối ưu hệ thống
job_description[6]: - Xây dựng và quản lý đội ngũ kiến trúc sư hệ thống và chuyên viên phát triển phần mềm cấp cao để hoàn thành nhiệm vụ trọng điểm.
job_requirement[0]: - Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Công nghệ Thông tin, Khoa học Máy tính, Kỹ thuật Phần mềm, Trí tuệ nhân tạo/ML hoặc các ngành liên quan.
job_requirement[1]: - Tối thiểu 10+ năm kinh nghiệm phát triển phần mềm và các hệ thống quy mô lớn.
job_requirement[2]: - Tối thiểu 3+ năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí quản lý cấp cao (quản lý kỹ thuật/Engineering Manager, Trưởng bộ phận kỹ thuật/Head of Engineering).
job_requirement[3]: - Tối thiểu 2+ năm kinh nghiệm với nền tảng AI (AI Platform), ứng dụng mô hình ngôn ngữ lớn (LLM), và hệ thống AI đa tác tử (Agentic AI Systems).
job_requirement[4]: - Thiết kế kiến trúc tổng thể cho nền tảng AI quy mô doanh nghiệp (AI Platform – Enterprise Scale).
job_requirement[5]: - Hiểu biết sâu về hệ sinh thái mô hình ngôn ngữ lớn (LLM): GPT-4, Claude, Gemini và các mô hình nguồn mở.
job_requirement[6]: - Kiến thức chuyên sâu về Agentic AI: điều phối đa tác tử (multi-agent orchestration) với LangChain, LangGraph.
job_requirement[7]: - Real-time AI Agent: xử lý thời gian thực, streaming, quản lý ngữ cảnh, lưu trữ và duy trì trạng thái (state persistence).
job_requirement[8]: Ưu tiên:
job_requirement[9]: - Có kinh nghiệm về kiến trúc RAG: cơ sở dữ liệu vector, embedding, tìm kiếm kết hợp (hybrid search).
job_requirement[10]: - MCP và giao tiếp giữa các tác tử AI (Agent-to-Agent communication).
job_requirement[11]: - Tinh chỉnh mô hình (fine-tuning), thiết kế gợi ý (prompt engineering), và hệ thống đánh giá chất lượng (evaluation frameworks).
job_requirement[12]: - Cập nhật chặt chẽ các nghiên cứu mới nhất và các đột phá trong lĩnh vực AI.
job_requirement[13]: Kiến trúc Doanh nghiệp (Enterprise Architecture)
job_requirement[14]: - Microservices, hệ thống hướng sự kiện (event-driven) cho tác vụ AI.
job_requirement[15]: - Hệ thống phân tán, độ sẵn sàng cao, khả năng mở rộng lớn.
job_requirement[16]: - Hạ tầng AI: triển khai mô hình (model serving), tối ưu suy luận (inference optimization).
job_requirement[17]: - Giám sát hệ thống (Observability): monitoring, logging, đánh giá hiệu năng.
job_requirement[18]: - Thành thạo Python.
job_requirement[19]: - Kinh nghiệm phát triển backend cho hệ thống quy mô lớn.
job_requirement[20]: - Cơ sở dữ liệu vector: Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant, Milvus.
job_requirement[21]: - Kafka; API: RESTful, GraphQL, WebSocket.
job_requirement[22]: - Kinh nghiệm sâu trong triển khai hệ thống Cloud Native.
job_requirement[23]: - AWS (SageMaker, Bedrock, Lambda, ECS/EKS).

job_description[0]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[1]: • Analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured banking data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities.
job_description[2]: • Develop and deploy machine learning models for use cases such as credit scoring, fraud detection, customer segmentation, and churn prediction.
job_description[3]: • Collaborate with business units to translate complex data findings into actionable insights and strategies.
job_description[4]: • Design and maintain dashboards and reporting tools to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs).
job_description[5]: • Ensure data quality, integrity, and compliance with banking regulations and data governance policies.
job_description[6]: • Work with IT and data engineering teams to optimize data pipelines and infrastructure.
job_description[7]: • Stay updated on the latest data science techniques, tools, and regulatory changes in the financial sector.
job_requirement[0]: Qualifications:
job_requirement[1]: • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field.
job_requirement[2]: • 3+ years of experience in data science or advanced analytics, preferably in banking or financial services.
job_requirement[3]: • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL.
job_requirement[4]: • Experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow, XGBoost).
job_requirement[5]: • Strong knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau).
job_requirement[6]: • Familiarity with banking products, customer behavior, and regulatory requirements.
job_requirement[7]: Preferred Skills:
job_requirement[8]: • Experience with big data platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark).
job_requirement[9]: • Knowledge of financial risk modeling, credit scoring, or anti-money laundering (AML) analytics.
job_requirement[10]: • Understanding of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
job_requirement[11]: • Certification in data science or analytics (e.g., Microsoft Certified Data Scientist, Google Data Engineer).
job_requirement[12]: Benefits:
job_requirement[13]: Chính sách lương, thưởng cạnh tranh trên thị trường (Thưởng theo hiệu suất kinh doanh và thưởng định kỳ).

job_description[0]: Job Purpose:
job_description[1]: Responsible for designing and managing the enterprise data architecture that supports banking operations, analytics, and regulatory compliance. This role ensures that data systems are scalable, secure, and aligned with business strategy.
job_description[2]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[3]: Data Architecture Strategy
job_description[4]: • Define and maintain the bank’s enterprise data architecture roadmap.
job_description[5]: • Align with business goals, regulatory requirements, and technology strategy.
job_description[6]: Collaboration
job_description[7]: • Collaborate with IT, data engineering, analytics, and business units to ensure cohesive data solutions.
job_description[8]: • Act as a key advisor to senior leadership on data architecture decisions.
job_description[9]: Data Modeling & Integration
job_description[10]: • Design conceptual, logical, and physical data models for core banking systems, customer data, and financial products.
job_description[11]: • Oversee integration of data across systems.
job_description[12]: • Ensure consistency, reusability, and scalability of data models.
job_description[13]: Governance, Security & Compliance
job_description[14]: • Implement data governance frameworks including metadata management, data lineage, and master data management.
job_description[15]: • Ensure compliance with banking regulations.
job_description[16]: • Work with cybersecurity teams to enforce data security and privacy standards.
job_description[17]: Innovation & Optimization
job_description[18]: • Evaluate emerging technologies and tools to enhance data architecture.
job_description[19]: • Promote automation, standardization, and best practices in data design.
job_description[20]: • Optimize data storage, access, and performance across platforms.

job_description[0]: Summary:
job_description[1]: Design, build, and maintain scalable data infrastructure and pipelines that support banking operations, analytics, and regulatory compliance. This role bridges technical leadership with strategic business needs, ensuring data is accurate, secure, and accessible.
job_description[2]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[3]: Data Architecture & Pipeline Development
job_description[4]: • Design and implement robust, scalable data pipelines for structured and unstructured data.
job_description[5]: • Oversee ETL/ELT processes to ingest data from core banking systems, CRM, and external sources.
job_description[6]: • Ensure data models support real-time analytics, reporting, and machine learning.
job_description[7]: • Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to provide usable, cleaned and aggregated data to end users.
job_description[8]: Governance, Security & Compliance
job_description[9]: • Ensure data practices comply with banking regulations (e.g., Basel III, GDPR, local laws).
job_description[10]: • Implement data governance frameworks, including metadata management and lineage tracking.
job_description[11]: • Collaborate with cybersecurity teams to safeguard sensitive financial data.
job_description[12]: Performance Optimization
job_description[13]: • Monitor and optimize data infrastructure for performance, reliability, and cost-efficiency.
job_description[14]: • Troubleshoot data issues and ensure high availability of data services.
job_description[15]: Innovation & Tooling
job_description[16]: • Evaluate and adopt modern data technologies (e.g., cloud platforms, data lakes, streaming tools).
job_description[17]: • Promote automation and DevOps practices in data engineering workflows.

job_description[0]: Đảm bảo chất lượng tổng thể của sản phẩm Trợ lý ảo (hoặc tương đương) trên ô tô, thông qua việc thiết kế, thực hiện và báo cáo các kịch bản kiểm thử chức năng, hiệu năng, trải nghiệm người dùng, cũng như phối hợp chặt chẽ với các nhóm phát triển, AI/ML, UX/UI và kỹ thuật trên xe.
job_description[1]: Nhiệm vụ chính:
job_description[2]: • 1. Thiết kế và thực thi test case:
job_description[3]: • Viết và cập nhật test case chi tiết cho các tính năng của Trợ lý ảo: nhận lệnh điều khiển xe, hỏi đáp thông tin, tương tác tự nhiên, cá nhân hóa...
job_description[4]: • Kiểm thử trên thiết bị thực tế (IVI, xe thật) và mô phỏng (emulator, HMI test bench).
job_description[5]: • 2. Kiểm thử đa nền tảng & đa ngôn ngữ:
job_description[6]: • Đảm bảo trợ lý hoạt động mượt trên nhiều dòng xe, cấu hình phần cứng khác nhau.
job_description[7]: • Kiểm thử ngôn ngữ đa dạng (Việt, Anh), giọng nói vùng miền, và các tình huống mất kết nối.
job_description[8]: • 3. Kiểm thử hội thoại và AI:
job_description[9]: • Kiểm thử độ chính xác NLP, khả năng hiểu ý định, quản lý ngữ cảnh và xử lý đa lượt hội thoại.
job_description[10]: • Ghi nhận các lỗi logic, phản hồi không tự nhiên, hoặc phản hồi sai lệch nguy hiểm.
job_description[11]: • 4. Tự động hóa kiểm thử:
job_description[12]: • Đề xuất hoặc phát triển framework test tự động cho UI hoặc API của trợ lý.
job_description[13]: • Giao tiếp với hệ thống backend: kiểm tra log, luồng xử lý, dữ liệu đầu ra JSON...
job_description[14]: • 5. Quản lý lỗi & báo cáo chất lượng:
job_description[15]: • Ghi nhận lỗi lên hệ thống (Jira/Redmine), theo dõi tiến độ xử lý.
job_description[16]: • Thực hiện báo cáo chất lượng định kỳ, phân tích xu hướng lỗi để đề xuất cải tiến.
job_description[17]: • 6. Hỗ trợ kiểm thử nghiệm thu OTA:
job_description[18]: • Kiểm thử sản phẩm trước/sau khi phát hành OTA lên xe thật.
job_description[19]: • Phối hợp với nhóm vận hành để đánh giá mức độ ổn định thực tế.

job_description[2]: - Quản lý, vận hành, kiểm tra và đảm bảo tính ổn định, chính xác của dữ liệu trên các hệ thống HRIS (SuccessFactors, iHRP…).

job_description[8]: 3. Phân tích và báo cáo dữ liệu nhân sự:

job_description[11]: 4. Hỗ trợ công tác chính sách nhân sự:
job_description[12]: - Tham gia vận hành quy trình thi đua – khen thưởng nội bộ trên hệ thống.
job_description[13]: - Phối hợp triển khai và tổng hợp báo cáo kết quả các chương trình nhân sự toàn hệ thống.

job_description[3]: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
job_description[4]: - Apply the organization’s project management methodologies and procedures – PMI’s standard - into project’s activities ensuring the assigned project is properly managed as per standard.
job_description[5]: - In day-to-day basis, facilitate the project team to do the management and monitoring and control on (1) Integration, (2) Scope, (3) Schedule, (4) Cost, (5) Quality, (6) Human Resource, (7) Communication, (8) Risk, (9) Procurement, (10) Stakeholders – in order to effectively deliver all project’s objectives that are meeting expectations.
job_description[6]: - Build up and maintain both project high-level and detailed plan.
job_description[7]: - Regularly monitor project’s progress and make necessary communications, reports to the senior management and the Project Steering Committee if there is any potential issues and/or risks to project objectives – in order to drive timely decision making.
job_description[8]: - Strictly perform change control (and/or management) for any occurred changes related to any of the project’s scope, schedule, cost and quality – making sure the project will not go over budget, completed within committed scopes, meeting expected quality and schedule.
job_description[9]: - Manage cross-divisional, large scale company projects (500K EUR+) with multiple functional streams
job_description[10]: - Directly contribute to PMO governance frame-work and project management process standardization.
job_description[11]: - Perform any other tasks and/or activities assigned by direct line managers.

job_title: TMO - Chuyên Gia Thiết Kế Giải Pháp (Số Hóa Hành Trình Tích Lũy & Đầu Tư)
job_description[0]: Mục tiêu vai trò
job_description[1]: • Dẫn dắt chiến lược số hóa hành trình tích lũy và đầu tư cho khách hàng cá nhân, tập trung vào các nhóm sản phẩm:
job_description[2]: • Tích lũy có mục tiêu, tích lũy có kỳ hạn
job_description[3]: • Đầu tư: bảo hiểm, chứng chỉ quỹ
job_description[4]: • Quản lý tài chính cá nhân (PFM)
job_description[5]: • Là đầu mối định hướng, thiết kế và triển khai sản phẩm số, đảm bảo hành trình khách hàng liền mạch, hiện đại và có khả năng mở rộng. Vai trò yêu cầu tư duy sản phẩm, năng lực Agile delivery và khả năng phối hợp đa phòng ban.
job_description[6]: Trách nhiệm chính
job_description[7]: 1. Phát triển & Triển khai sản phẩm số
job_description[8]: • Tiếp nhận insight từ các đơn vị Kinh doanh, Sản phẩm, Dữ liệu để hiểu rõ nhu cầu khách hàng.
job_description[9]: • Chuyển hóa đặc thù sản phẩm tích lũy & đầu tư thành giải pháp số phù hợp.
job_description[10]: • Thiết kế và triển khai các tính năng số như dashboard PFM, khuyến nghị đầu tư, theo dõi mục tiêu tài chính.
job_description[11]: • Theo dõi hiệu quả sản phẩm, cải tiến liên tục dựa trên phản hồi khách hàng và kết quả kinh doanh.
job_description[12]: 2. Quản lý Backlog & Agile Delivery
job_description[13]: • Quản lý backlog, định nghĩa user stories, sắp xếp ưu tiên theo chiến lược ngân hàng.
job_description[14]: • Làm việc cùng squad Agile (PO, Developer, Scrum Master) để đảm bảo tiến độ và chất lượng sprint.
job_description[15]: • Triển khai MVP, thử nghiệm, tối ưu và mở rộng sản phẩm trên toàn hệ thống.
job_description[16]: 3. Hợp tác liên phòng ban & Đối tác
job_description[17]: • Phối hợp chặt chẽ với các khối Kinh doanh, Ngân hàng số, Công nghệ, Dữ liệu, Rủi ro, Truyền thông, Tài chính để triển khai giải pháp.
job_description[18]: • Làm việc với đối tác nội bộ và bên ngoài (bảo hiểm, quỹ, fintech/insurtech/wealthtech) để tích hợp sản phẩm và nền tảng.
job_description[19]: • Cập nhật tiến độ, báo cáo kết quả cho Ban dự án và Ban điều hành.
job_description[20]: 4. Quản trị thay đổi & Vận hành thực tế
job_description[21]: • Phối hợp đào tạo frontline và kênh phân phối về sản phẩm và hành trình số mới.
job_description[22]: • Hỗ trợ triển khai truyền thông nội bộ và truyền thông khách hàng.
job_description[23]: • Theo dõi KPIs: số lượng khách hàng tham gia, AUM, phí dịch vụ, mức độ gắn kết, NPS, tỷ lệ duy trì và tỷ lệ rời bỏ.

job_description[0]: IMPACT & OPPORTUNITY:
job_description[1]: • Provide effective IT support across all aspects of the Gentherm Hanam plant.
job_description[2]: • Be responsible for supporting IT Team Leader, IT global administrator, Regional IT manager and maintaining overall IT infrastructure environment not only Hanam but also other sites in Asia.
job_description[3]: • Provide exposure to a broad range of IT-related projects and activities
job_description[4]: ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
job_description[5]: • Be aware of updates in IT infrastructure design. Helps in production evaluation.
job_description[6]: • RFQ for hardware and software as required by the infrastructure projects/operations.
job_description[7]: • Perform vendor compares and rating and recommends to manager.
job_description[8]: • Assist and lead sub-IT infrastructure projects.
job_description[9]: • Channel users' feedback for potential future development.
job_description[10]: • Explain and enforce security measures and policy in place.
job_description[11]: • Understand security measurement in all aspects of business system.
job_description[12]: • Prepare and update company IT infrastructure documents

job_description[0]: Sản phẩm AI cho Chăm sóc Khách hàng
job_description[1]: **Dẫn dắt chiến lược, phát triển, triển khai và tối ưu các sản phẩm AI phục vụ CSKH, bao gồm chatbot CSKH, callbot, trợ lý ảo cho nhân viên CSKH và các công cụ AI khác để hỗ trợ nhân viên CSKH cũng như khách hàng cuối để đáp ứng mục tiêu nâng cao trải nghiệm khách hàng, giảm chi phí vận hành, tăng tỷ lệ tự động hóa.

job_description[5]: - Phối hợp với các stakeholders có liên quan đến dự án: CSKH, vận hành tổng đài, đầu mối các hệ thống back-end... để triển khai sản phẩm.
job_description[6]: - Chịu trách nhiệm về chất lượng của sản phẩm và tiến độ triển khai của dự án.
job_description[7]: - Quản lý ngân sách bộ phận và hiệu quả P&L của sản phẩm.
job_description[8]: **Sản phẩm AI Hội thoại bao gồm các sản phẩm AI chủ lực sau:
job_description[9]: Trợ lý ảo Vivi trên xe VinFast, AI tích hợp cho Robot và hệ thống các ứng dụng AI cho CSKH (tự động hóa, chatbot, callbot…).

job_description[11]: - Làm việc chặt chẽ với các đơn vị thụ hưởng sản phẩm: VinFast (TLA Vivi), VinMotion/VinDynamics (AI cho Robot), TT CSKH của các PnL (AI cho CSKH)
job_description[12]: - Quản lý và xây dựng roadmap cho các dòng sản phẩm phù hợp với nguồn lực và đáp ứng công nghệ.

job_description[16]: - Quản lý ngân sách, P&L và đánh giá hiệu quả đầu tư vào sản phẩm.

job_description[0]: Job Purpose
job_description[1]: Perform specialized tasks, provide special skills in daily monitoring of IT infrastructure / applications / services of critical services (ROC, COC,...) to ensure that critical services meet SLAs committed to the business; As well as in the process of handling alerts, try to restore services as quickly as possible as well as remaining issues to ensure the best service delivery to customers.
job_description[2]: Key Acountabilties
job_description[3]: 1. Participate in monitoring and handling system alerts/incidents/problems:
job_description[4]: - Perform 24/7 monitoring and handle alerts of services of the entire IT infrastructure/application/services. In case encounter difficulties, escalate to L3 for coordinated processing.
job_description[5]: - Ensure projects/specialized operations departments provide adequate alert/incident handling instructions for new services before golive and periodically review and update existing alert/incident handling instructions.
job_description[6]: - Responsible for periodically reviewing issues/vulnerabilities in IT infrastructure/applications/services within scope of responsibility
job_description[7]: - Provide in-depth transfer skills in monitoring and handling alerts and critical IT service incidents
job_description[8]: - Participate Lead the standardizing and developing relevant processes and regulations to ensure effective monitoring and handling of alerts/incidents.
job_description[9]: - Coordinate with relevant units to promptly restore services/systems, investigate root causes, propose solutions and implement solutions.
job_description[10]: - Participate in implementing changes across the software development environment, including on Prem and cloud.
job_description[11]: Participate in building and optimizing centralized monitoring tools:
job_description[12]: - Implement the development and promulgation of standards and operate centralized monitoring tools (Dynatrace, Grafana, Splunk...)
job_description[13]: - Implement monitoring tool integration and support building monitoring dashboards for new IT infrastructure/applications/services
job_description[14]: - Ensure projects/specialized operations departments provide adequate monitoring indicators/monitoring thresholds for new services before golive.
job_description[15]: 2. System problem and incident management:
job_description[16]: - Manage the lifecycle of IT incidents, including identifying, classifying, coordinating and resolving incidents according to SLAs
job_description[17]: - Be the contact point during troubleshooting, ensuring effective communication among technical, operations and business departments
job_description[18]: - Root cause analysis (RCA) after each incident, recommending preventive measures and process improvements. Coordinate with relevant teams to minimize downtime and improve system availability.
job_description[19]: - Participate in developing and maintaining incident management processes according to standards and best practices
job_description[20]: 3. Responsibilities in Risk Management and Compliance:
job_description[21]: - Control and ensure the unit's activities comply with issued policies, regulations, procedures and instructions.
job_description[22]: - Identify the unit's risks during operations, coordinate with relevant units to develop methods to measure, evaluate and minimize risks.
job_description[23]: Report periodically to management levels and perform other tasks as directed by management

job_description[0]: Shinhan Securities is looking for a Senior Back-End Developer with at least 3 years of experience in building and maintaining back-end systems, specifically for stock trading platforms. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience with Oracle SQL, PostgreSQL, Pro*C, C++, and API development using REST and WebSocket. Additionally, expertise in caching mechanisms, message queuing systems like ZeroMQ, and developing gateway services using Node.js or Python is required. Basic English skills are sufficient, but a passion for working in a dynamic financial technology environment is essential.
job_description[1]: • Design, Develop, and Maintain Back-End Systems: Build and optimize scalable backend services for a stock trading platform with a focus on high availability, performance, and fault tolerance.
job_description[2]: • Develop and Manage APIs:
job_description[3]: o Design and maintain APIs using REST and WebSocket protocols for handling real-time trading data and client interactions.
job_description[4]: o Integrate back-end services with front-end applications and third-party systems.
job_description[5]: • Database Management:
job_description[6]: o Work with Oracle SQL and PostgreSQL to manage trading data, optimize performance, and ensure data integrity.
job_description[7]: o Develop and optimize database queries, stored procedures, and triggers for trading applications.
job_description[8]: • Develop in C++ and Pro*C: Build and maintain critical components of the platform using
job_description[9]: • Implement Caching and Message Queuing:
job_description[10]: o Use caching mechanisms to improve performance in real-time trading environments.
job_description[11]: o Implement message queuing systems such as ZeroMQ, Kafka, RedisCache, for fast and reliable communication between services.
job_description[12]: • Build Gateway Services: Design and develop
job_description[13]: • Ensure System Security and Compliance:
job_description[14]: o Collaborate with the security team to ensure the platform meets industry security standards and regulations.
job_description[15]: o Work closely with DevOps to ensure continuous deployment and reliability.
job_description[16]: • Collaborate Across Teams: Work with front-end developers, product managers, and other back-end team members to ensure smooth integration and alignment with business goals.
job_requirement[0]: Qualifications
job_requirement[1]: • Experience:
job_requirement[2]: • At least 3+ years of back-end development experience, preferably in stock trading platforms or the financial services industry.
job_requirement[3]: • Experience in high-performance systems that handle real-time data in trading environments.
job_requirement[4]: • Technical Skills:
job_requirement[5]: • Oracle SQL and PostgreSQL: Proficient in database design, querying, and performance tuning.
job_requirement[6]: • Pro*C: Experience in database interaction using Pro*C for performance-critical tasks.
job_requirement[7]: • C++: Strong programming experience in C++ for building reliable, scalable services.
job_requirement[8]: • API Development: Hands-on experience in building and integrating RESTful APIs and WebSocket for real-time data communication.
job_requirement[9]: • Caching Mechanisms: Knowledge of caching techniques (e.g., Redis, Memcached) for high-speed data retrieval.
job_requirement[10]: • Message Queuing: Experience with ZeroMQ or similar message queuing systems for inter-service communication.
job_requirement[11]: • Node.js/Python: Experience developing gateway services or microservices using Node.js or Python.
job_requirement[12]: • System Architecture: Understanding of distributed systems, fault tolerance, and scalability in trading platforms.
job_requirement[13]: • Communication: Basic proficiency in English is sufficient to collaborate with team members and document solutions.
job_requirement[14]: • Familiarity with microservices architecture.
job_requirement[15]: • Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure).
job_requirement[16]: • Experience working with FIX protocol in trading environments.
job_requirement[17]: • Experience with other message brokers like Kafka or RabbitMQ.
job_requirement[18]: • Database: Experienced working with both SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis).
job_requirement[19]: • Trading Risk Management: Knowledgeable in trading risk management (risk checks, margin, and liquidation).
job_requirement[20]: • AI Tools: Proficient in using AI coding tools such as Cursor, Claude Code, and GitHub Copilot to accelerate development.

job_description[0]: PURPOSE OF THIS POSITION:
job_description[1]: The IT Manager at Spartronics Vietnam is responsible for leading IT infrastructure, ERP/MES system management, cybersecurity, automation solutions, and digital transformation initiatives within the factory. This role ensures system stability, data integrity, and IT service availability to support production, quality, planning, and business operations efficiently.
job_description[2]: PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
job_description[3]: 1. IT Infrastructure & System Administration
job_description[4]: • Manage and maintain factory-wide network, servers, data center, Wi-Fi, firewall, backup systems.
job_description[5]: • Ensure high uptime for IT systems supporting production & office operations.
job_description[6]: • Oversee hardware & software lifecycle: configuration, license management, upgrades.
job_description[7]: 2. ERP / MES / MRP System Management
job_description[8]: • Own and support ERP (SAP/Oracle/D365 or equivalent) and MES for production operations.
job_description[9]: • Lead system troubleshooting, issue resolution, and user support for all functions.
job_description[10]: • Coordinate with vendors for customization, integration and enhancement requests.
job_description[11]: • Ensure data accuracy and transactional discipline across departments.
job_description[12]: 3. Industry 4.0 Digital Transformation
job_description[13]: • Plan and execute automation & digital roadmap for the factory.
job_description[14]: • Drive integration among SMT machines, AOI, ICT, MES, ERP and quality monitoring tools.
job_description[15]: • Implement dashboards for real-time productivity, WIP, OEE, yield, quality performance.
job_description[16]: 4. Cybersecurity & IT Compliance
job_description[17]: • Establish security controls, firewall rules, system access authorization.
job_description[18]: • Ensure compliance with corporate IT policy, data privacy and backup policy.
job_description[19]: • Conduct periodic network security audits and risk assessments.
job_description[20]: 5. Cross-functional Support
job_description[21]: • Partner with Operations, Quality, Planning, Finance to optimize system-driven workflow.
job_description[22]: • Manage IT helpdesk team to provide timely support and service resolution.
job_description[23]: • Provide IT training and system knowledge to end users.
job_description[24]: 6. Vendor & Budget Management
job_description[25]: • Manage IT projects, vendor contracts and SLA performance.
job_description[26]: • Prepare and control annual IT budget (hardware/software/renewal).
job_description[27]: • Evaluate investment for automation, licensing, and future upgrades.
job_description[28]: 7. Leadership & People Development
job_description[29]: • Lead IT Engineers, System Admins, Infrastructure Support team.
job_description[30]: • Build IT capability, succession plan, performance goals & training roadmap.
job_description[31]: • Foster proactive, customer-service mindset and continuous improvement culture

company_name: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN VINSMART FUTURE
job_description[0]: About the Role
job_description[1]: We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer with strong Python experience and a solid understanding of AI-driven systems. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing high-performance backend systems that power large-scale AI applications — such as chatbots, vision-based analytics, and cloud-based inference pipelines.
job_description[2]: The ideal candidate has experience with parallel computation, cloud scaling (Azure), and system reliability, ensuring our services remain efficient and responsive even under heavy workloads.
job_description[3]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[4]: • Design & implement scalable backend architectures using Python (FastAPI, Flask, or Django).
job_description[5]: • Build and optimize AI-powered backend services, integrating models and inference pipelines with minimal latency.
job_description[6]: • Develop and manage cloud infrastructure on Azure (AKS, App Services, Azure Functions, Azure Storage, etc.).
job_description[7]: • Implement task orchestration and parallel computing workflows using multithreading, multiprocessing, and asynchronous execution for compute-intensive workloads.
job_description[8]: • Design auto-scaling mechanisms to dynamically allocate compute resources (VMs, containers, GPUs) based on workload or active users.
job_description[9]: • Integrate and optimize databases (PostgreSQL, Redis, or similar) for data persistence, caching, and fast retrieval.
job_description[10]: • Collaborate with AI and FE engineers to deploy and serve machine learning models efficiently (batch or real-time inference).
job_description[11]: • Monitor and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks, ensuring uptime, fault tolerance, and system reliability.
job_description[12]: • Contribute to DevOps and CI/CD pipelines, automating deployment and testing workflows.
job_description[13]: • Mentor junior engineers and review code for best practices and maintainability.

job_description[0]: Main Responsibilities
job_description[1]: - Build HR data/models/reports, such as Recruitment, Headcount, Salary, Budget, etc.
job_description[2]: - Develop reports/dashboards using BI tools, Excel, PowerPoint, etc., to support data management/ analysis.
job_description[3]: - Prepare periodic or ad-hoc reports and analyses. Ensure timeliness, accuracy, and compliance with reports.
job_description[4]: - Regularly check, update, and supplement data for report analysis, ensuring data accuracy.
job_description[5]: - Utilize data visualization programs, tools, and techniques to create dashboards, reports, and presentations.
job_description[6]: - Analyze data to extract insights and forecast upcoming trends.
job_description[7]: - Efficiently execute and compile reports as required.

job_description[9]: - Conduct research, design, develop, and administer the Company's databases.
job_description[10]: - Collect and process data from various sources related to reports to ensure data accuracy.
job_description[11]: - Interact with relevant teams to clarify data analysis requirements, organize data for report and dashboard development, and provide appropriate analytical data.
job_description[12]: - Develop and maintain BI reports and dashboards to monitor work progress.
job_description[13]: - Verify data and ensure the quality of data used for analysis.
job_description[14]: - Create interactive and visually appealing reports and data visualizations using Power BI tools

job_description[17]: - Visualize data using Power BI, and analyze and present it in PowerPoint
job_description[18]: - Analyze data to identify opportunities for improvement, optimize processes, and support strategic decision-making
job_description[19]: - Propose solutions and improvements based on analytical reports to maximize the company's operational efficiency.
job_description[20]: 3. Strategy proposal and effectiveness evaluation:
job_description[21]: - Provide strategic information and data analysis to support the Company in making effective work method decisions
job_description[22]: - Propose strategies and actions based on insights gathered from data
job_description[23]: - Evaluate the effectiveness of HR management strategies and specific features through data analysis and provide improvement recommendations

job_description[26]: - Support the development of the Company's Human Resources software

job_title: SAP Senior Consultant - SAP SD (Sales and Distribution) Implementation
job_description[0]: Are you ready to unleash your potential?
job_description[1]: At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.
job_description[2]: We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.
job_description[3]: Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.
job_description[4]: We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognized for their contributions.
job_description[5]: Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!
job_description[6]: Work you will do
job_description[7]: This role sits within the SAP team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which encompasses the SAP Module solutions respectively. As a leader of this group, you will drive the growth of our SAP business in the region and be responsible for the creation, sale and delivery of SAP solutions: Functional and Technical Design, SAP Application & Systems Development, SAP Business Transformation, etc.
job_description[8]: • Engage clients in workshops and interviews to analyze process and reporting requirements
job_description[9]: • Advise clients on industry/ cross-industry leading practices. Advise clients on SAP recommended processes and functions
job_description[10]: • Design target state SAP solutions for clients. Influence clients’ thinking in adopting leading/ standard practices while developing target state
job_description[11]: • Analyze application landscape to design interfaces to SAP solution
job_description[12]: • Perform SAP configuration and tests. Develop specifications for development of forms/ reports/ interfaces.
job_description[13]: • Lead the consultant and client teams through the implementation cycle including planning and execution of testing, migration and cutover.
job_description[14]: • Support change management execution by developing training material, delivering training and supporting users post cutover.
job_description[15]: • Develop relationships with internal and external stakeholders
job_description[16]: Your role as a leader:
job_description[17]: At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We connect our purpose and shared values to identify issues as well as to make an impact that matters to our clients, people and the communities. Additionally, Senior Consultants across our Firm are expected to:
job_description[18]: • Actively seek out developmental opportunities for growth, act as strong brand ambassadors for the firm as well as share their knowledge and experience with others.
job_description[19]: • Respect the needs of their colleagues and build up cooperative relationships.
job_description[20]: • Understand the goals of our internal and external stakeholder to set personal priorities as well as align their teams’ work to achieve the objectives.
job_description[21]: • Constantly challenge themselves, collaborate with others to deliver on tasks and take accountability for the results.
job_description[22]: • Build productive relationships and communicate effectively in order to positively influence teams and other stakeholders.
job_description[23]: • Offer insights based on a solid understanding of what makes Deloitte successful.
job_description[24]: • Project integrity and confidence while motivating others through team collaboration as well as recognising individual strengths, differences, and contributions.
job_description[25]: • Understand disruptive trends and promote potential opportunities for improvement.

job_description[12]: Các nhiệm vụ báo cáo khác: Thực hiện báo cáo định kỳ cho Ban Điều hành, các Ủy ban, Hội đồng Thu hồi nợ, GĐK/CEO, BOD về tình hình danh mục nợ và dự báo kết quả hoàn thành, dự báo tỷ lệ nhảy nhóm nợ, NPL…Các nhiệm vụ khác được giao bởi TP, GĐK.

job_title: Chuyên viên cao cấp Bảo mật dữ liệu - Khối Dữ liệu - Senior Data Security - Data Division - Khối Dữ liệu (HO25.501)
company_name: Ngân Hàng Thương Mại Cổ Phần Quân Đội - MB
job_description[0]: 1. Mục tiêu công việc:
job_description[1]: Thực hiện các hoạt động liên quan đến xây dựng và triển khai cơ chế bảo mật dữ liệu, đảm bảo an toàn, tuân thủ và bảo vệ dữ liệu trong suốt vòng đời, theo quy định pháp luật và tiêu chuẩn quốc tế (Nghị định 13/2023/NĐ-CP, ISO 27001, GDPR...).
job_description[2]: Phối hợp với các đơn vị Quản trị dữ liệu, An ninh thông tin, Rủi ro và Tuân thủ để triển khai hiệu quả các chính sách, quy trình, tiêu chuẩn và công cụ bảo mật dữ liệu trong phạm vi được phân công, góp phần đảm bảo hoạt động quản trị dữ liệu toàn hàng được vận hành liên tục, an toàn và hiệu quả.
job_description[3]: 2. Nhiệm vụ/trách nhiệm chính:
job_description[4]: i. Thiết kế và triển khai Data Security Framework thống nhất trên toàn tổ chức.
job_description[5]: ii. Quản lý các hoạt động bảo mật dữ liệu theo vòng đời dữ liệu (data lifecycle):
job_description[6]: • Phân loại và gắn nhãn dữ liệu (Data Classification & Tagging)
job_description[7]: • Mã hóa và quản lý khóa (Encryption & Key Management)
job_description[8]: • Ẩn danh, che dấu dữ liệu (Masking, Tokenization)
job_description[9]: • Quản lý truy cập và phân quyền (Access Control, IAM, ABAC/RBAC)
job_description[10]: • Giám sát và phát hiện rò rỉ dữ liệu (DLP, Monitoring, Incident Response)
job_description[11]: iii. Xây dựng và cập nhật chính sách, quy trình, tiêu chuẩn bảo mật dữ liệu, phối hợp chặt chẽ với các đơn vị IT Security, Data Governance, QTRR và Tuân thủ.
job_description[12]: iv. Tham gia triển khai, đánh giá và kiểm soát tuân thủ các quy định pháp luật về bảo vệ dữ liệu cá nhân và bảo mật thông tin.

job_title: Senior Product Owner (Giải Pháp Thanh Toán Cho Hộ Kinh Doanh và SME)
job_description[0]: 1. Mô tả chung công việc
job_description[1]: • Senior Product Owner chịu trách nhiệm xây dựng và phát triển bộ sản phẩm giải pháp thanh toán dành cho hộ kinh doanh và doanh nghiệp nhỏ và vừa (SME). Vai trò này thuộc khối Business, phối hợp chặt chẽ với các đội ngũ kỹ thuật, đối tác triển khai và các bên liên quan để phát triển sản phẩm từ giai đoạn lên ý tưởng, thiết kế, phát triển, vận hành, tối ưu hóa sản phẩm.
job_description[2]: • Ứng viên cần có kinh nghiệm trực tiếp xây dựng sản phẩm tương tự tại các doanh nghiệp trong ngành POS/QR/PayTech hoặc trong lĩnh vực FnB, Retail

job_description[6]: • Khảo sát nhu cầu người dùng, thị trường và đối thủ
job_description[7]: • Xác định yêu cầu nghiệp vụ, mô tả chức năng sản phẩm, viết BRD, backlog và user stories
job_description[8]: • Thiết kế luồng hoạt động sản phẩm (flow, wireframe) phối hợp cùng UX/UI khi cần
job_description[9]: b. Triển khai & phối hợp kỹ thuật
job_description[10]: • Làm Product Owner đại diện business, làm việc trực tiếp với team IT/Dev/QA, đối tác công nghệ và các bộ phận phát triển kinh doanh, giải pháp liên quan.
job_description[11]: • Theo dõi quá trình phát triển, đảm bảo yêu cầu được hiểu đúng và triển khai đúng chất lượng
job_description[12]: • Tham gia kiểm thử UAT, nghiệm thu sản phẩm trước khi đưa vào vận hành
job_description[13]: c. Vận hành & tối ưu hóa
job_description[14]: • Giám sát hiệu quả sản phẩm sau khi triển khai, theo dõi KPI vận hành
job_description[15]: • Thu thập phản hồi người dùng, đề xuất cải tiến liên tục
job_description[16]: • Tham gia xây dựng quy trình vận hành, chính sách sản phẩm và tài liệu hướng dẫn nội bộ
job_description[17]: d. Phối hợp liên phòng ban
job_description[18]: • Làm việc với Business Development, Sales, Merchant Ops để đảm bảo sản phẩm phù hợp thị trường
job_description[19]: • Kết nối các bên đối tác công nghệ, ngân hàng, ví điện tử khi cần tích hợp thanh toán
job_description[20]: • Hỗ trợ xây dựng tài liệu đào tạo, training sản phẩm cho đội Sales và CSKH

job_description[0]: Job Purpose
job_description[1]: • Manage weaknesses and risks in technology operations in the IT sector.
job_description[2]: • Participate in identifying, managing and coordinating with departments to propose appropriate measures to prevent and minimize risks that may occur in the technology sector.
job_description[3]: • Organize and implement tasks to ensure compliance in the technology sector with regulations of State agencies, regulations of the Bank and international standards on technology applied at the Bank.
job_description[4]: Key Accountabilities (1)
job_description[5]: 1. Technology Risk Management
job_description[6]: • Perform the department's work in accordance with policies, regulations, procedures, internal guidelines... and service quality commitments (SLAs).
job_description[7]: • Develop and organize the implementation of documents and risk indicators to detect and manage potential risks in the technology sector of Techcombank.
job_description[8]: • Organize and implement risk assessments:
job_description[9]: + Take charge of conducting technology risk assessments; Organize self-assessment of risks in departments of the IT Sector; Participate in technology projects to detect risks, weaknesses, and risks in technology activities.
job_description[10]: + Advise and warn about potential risks, weaknesses, and risks of technology systems.
job_description[11]: • Receive and manage newly arising risks:
job_description[12]: + Record and manage identified risk points.
job_description[13]: + Coordinate with relevant parties to handle risk items in accordance with the process (assess risk level, identify risk owners, handling plans, etc.).
job_description[14]: • Monitor and periodically report on the status of handling technology risks to the Board of Directors of the Technology Block and related units:
job_description[15]: + Warn, monitor, check (results, evidence) and update the status of handling technology risks.
job_description[16]: + Chair meetings on risk handling.
job_description[17]: + Collect and report KRIs.
job_description[18]: + Periodically report on the status of handling technology risks.
job_description[19]: • Coordinate with Operational Risk to deploy operational risk management tools in the IT sector at the Technology Block.
job_description[20]: • Communicate to raise users' awareness of technology risks (design courses, implement communication messages on technology risks).
job_description[21]: 2. Compliance management:
job_description[22]: • Develop regulations, processes, and checklists for technology compliance assessment at Techcombank.
job_description[23]: • Organize planning and conduct periodic or ad hoc compliance assessments as required by the Leadership for technology activities to ensure compliance with the Bank's policies, regulations, and technology processes (in the field of operating technology systems, developing technology solutions and applications, ensuring information security, etc.).
job_description[24]: • Organize compliance assessments in the technology field at headquarters, main/backup data centers, main/backup data transfer centers according to issued documents.
job_description[25]: • Conduct assessments and monitor the maintenance of technology certificates applied at Techcombank.
job_description[26]: • Manage non-compliance points and corrective and preventive actions in the technology field; Prepare periodic and ad hoc reports on non-compliance points and corrective status to management levels.
job_description[27]: • Organize assessment of compliance status and organize implementation to ensure compliance with new regulations of State agencies in the technology field.
job_description[28]: • Conduct training, communication, and raise awareness of staff about the responsibility to comply with regulations in the technology field of the Bank.

job_description[0]: Job Purpose
job_description[1]: The job holder is responsible for building, managing, participating in the development of one of the following areas:
job_description[2]: a. IS Practice: Evaluate deployment, develop security solutions/Design, test information security/Ensure compliance with security standards (of Vietnam and International)
job_description[3]: b. IS Administration: Manage and directly participate in administrative activities on identity and access security/network security/endpoint services and data security
job_description[4]: c. IS Engieering: Manage and directly control the implementation of information security policies and standards for applications, infrastructure of Techcombank and its partners and suppliers, ensure compliance with the Business's information security requirements.
job_description[5]: d. IS Red team: Manage and directly perform testing attack activities for technology systems to detect vulnerabilities/weaknesses and provide solution guidance.
job_description[6]: e. IS Monitoring: Monitor detecting all attack events/incidents as quickly as possible (realtime) based on events aggregated from security systems as well as other technology components. Then alert relevant departments to investigate and react to that event/incident.
job_description[7]: Key Accountabilities (1)
job_description[8]: 1. Information Security Assurance
job_description[9]: - Participate in projects, developing and deploying technology to ensure Information Security for systems to be built, including stages: analysis, building requirements Information security, design Information security, threat modeling, source code review, testing and building controls to ensure Information Security.
job_description[10]: - Research and develop necessary information security solutions to prevent attacks and incidents Information security, ensure security and safety for the entire information system of the Business.
job_description[11]: - Coordinate with the Information Security supervisory department in handling information security incidents.
job_description[12]: - Set up and monitor the implementation of TCB's information security process, regulations, standards, guidelines and policies in accordance with the regulations of the government and international organizations
job_description[13]: - Implement and maintain compliance with international standards PCI-DSS, ISO, SWIFT CSP.
job_description[14]: - Implement and maintain compliance with TCB's policies, circulars and regulations of the State Bank.
job_description[15]: - Regularly perform compliance and integrity checks of the security policy configuration in the internal system TCB detects violations or insider attacks.
job_description[16]: - Coordinate with Compliance Assessment and Risk Management units to assess the compliance of technology systems according to policies, regulations, standards, processes, checklists.
job_description[17]: Key Accountabilities (2)
job_description[18]: 2. Information Security Red team:
job_description[19]: - Implement the strategy to ensure information security:
job_description[20]: + Participate in the implementation of the Information Security strategy by providing input data on attack trends, forms of exploitation and risks arising in each period.
job_description[21]: + Participate in the implementation of the annual information security implementation plan, meet the business and operational needs of the bank through the implementation of information security testing programs for the technology activities of the Business.
job_description[22]: + Develop penetration testing methods, information security scanning scripts and security checks according to international standards such as OSSTMM, Sans and OWASP.
job_description[23]: + Develop new techniques, exploit scripts and programs for automated penetration testing
job_description[24]: - Perform test attack activities:
job_description[25]: + Directly perform vulnerability detection review, vulnerability assessment, and conduct penetration/exploit testing periodically or at the request of the Block leader for all systems/applications; Penetration testing for system/application after live detection or whenever undergoing a major change. Testing methods must ensure practicality including both technical (technology) and non-technical (people, processes, physical assets). From there, provide CISO as well as other Information Security departments to have programs to deal with the problems of system weaknesses that can be exploited.
job_description[26]: + Perform regular vulnerability scans, information security checks to find vulnerabilities in the system and provide remedial / remedial solutions; supports maintaining compliance with world security standards such as PCI-DSS, ISO27001, SCP (swift).
job_description[27]: + Develop and manage vulnerability management program, threat intelligence database. Collect, track metrics, and analyze trends on cyber defenses, threats, detected attacks, vulnerabilities, and countermeasures/preventions.
job_description[28]: + Actively research / find new vulnerabilities, exploitation techniques and cyber threats; Identify trends in cybersecurity involving tactics, techniques, and processes, targeting for malware development and deployment.
job_description[29]: + Directly participate in the experimental plan of responding to an Information Security incident as an attack unit and in the case of an actual Information Security incident as the response team. Coordinate and provide expert cyber defense engineering skills to resolve cyber attack incidents
job_description[30]: Key Accountabilities (3)
job_description[31]: 3. Information Security Administration
job_description[32]: - Building/adjusting and implementing MTPQ of systems.
job_description[33]: - Develop requirements and measures to control access and protect the Business's data.
job_description[34]: - Develop, maintain and optimize information security policy/rule/configuration for solutions to ensure information security such as: Information security solutions on access identity management (PAM, IAM…); Network information security solutions (Firewall, NAC, APT, NetIPS, DDOS...); Information Security solutions on endpoints (AD GPO, HIPS/HFW, Appcontrol, Web/mail filtering, DB security…); Information security solutions on data (DLP, FAM...).
job_description[36]: + Decentralization enforcement ensures compliance with the decentralized matrix.
job_description[37]: + The issue and withdrawal of privileged accounts and digital certificates on technology systems.
job_description[38]: + Exception requirements related to identity, access rights on technology systems
job_description[39]: + Change requirements on information security assurance solutions.
job_description[41]: + Identify risks of the department in the process of operation, ensuring compliance with the processes and regulations of the Business. Coordinate with relevant units to handle risks.
job_description[42]: + Perform risk treatment activities according to reports of internal/external audit departments.

job_title: TMO - Chuyên Gia Thử Nghiệm & Đổi Mới
job_description[0]: Tổng quan vai trò
job_description[1]: Đóng vai trò tiên phong trong việc nghiên cứu, thử nghiệm và triển khai các giải pháp công nghệ mới nhằm thúc đẩy đổi mới sáng tạo và chuyển đổi số tại ACB. Vị trí này sẽ trực tiếp tham gia thiết kế, thực hiện các thử nghiệm công nghệ, phối hợp triển khai sáng kiến đổi mới và kết nối hệ sinh thái công nghệ để mang lại giá trị vượt trội cho khách hàng và tổ chức.
job_description[2]: Nhiệm vụ chính
job_description[3]: 1. Thử nghiệm và đổi mới công nghệ
job_description[4]: • Nghiên cứu, đề xuất và triển khai thử nghiệm các công nghệ mới (AI, Blockchain, Open API, Cloud…) để đánh giá khả năng ứng dụng vào sản phẩm/dịch vụ tài chính.
job_description[5]: • Thiết kế và thực hiện Proof of Concept (POC), Rapid Prototyping nhằm kiểm tra tính khả thi của giải pháp công nghệ và mô hình kinh doanh mới.
job_description[6]: • Thu thập, phân tích dữ liệu thử nghiệm để đề xuất cải tiến và điều chỉnh phù hợp.
job_description[7]: 2. Phối hợp triển khai sáng kiến đổi mới
job_description[8]: • Hợp tác với các phòng ban nội bộ (Công nghệ, Dữ liệu, Quản lý Thay đổi…) để tích hợp kết quả thử nghiệm vào các sáng kiến chuyển đổi số.
job_description[9]: • Tham gia các dự án chuyển đổi chiến lược, đóng vai trò triển khai và theo dõi hoạt động thử nghiệm.
job_description[10]: • Đánh giá kết quả thử nghiệm theo tiêu chí đo lường, đề xuất hướng nhân rộng hoặc điều chỉnh sáng kiến.
job_description[11]: 3. Nghiên cứu và kết nối hệ sinh thái đổi mới
job_description[12]: • Cập nhật xu hướng công nghệ mới và giải pháp đổi mới sáng tạo trên thị trường.
job_description[13]: • Kết nối với đối tác công nghệ, fintech, startup để tìm kiếm cơ hội hợp tác và thử nghiệm giải pháp mới.
job_description[14]: • Tham gia sự kiện công nghệ, hội thảo chuyên đề để mở rộng mạng lưới đổi mới và tìm kiếm ý tưởng tiên tiến.
job_description[15]: 4. Xây dựng văn hóa đổi mới
job_description[16]: • Đóng góp vào các hoạt động nội bộ lan tỏa tư duy đổi mới (hackathon, innovation day, cuộc thi ý tưởng).
job_description[17]: • Hỗ trợ đào tạo đội ngũ về quy trình thử nghiệm nhanh và công nghệ mới.
