job_title: Consumer Innovation Center Supervisor - Chuyên Viên Nghiên Cứu Thị Trường Cấp Cao
job_description[0]: Job Summary:
job_description[1]: We are seeking a dynamic and consumer-focused Product Innovation Manager to lead the development of new products from ideation to launch. This role requires a deep understanding of market trends, consumer behavior, and competitive landscapes, combined with hands-on engagement with consumers and cross-functional collaboration.
job_description[2]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[3]: 1. Information Gathering & Market Research
job_description[4]: Conduct in-depth research on market trends, consumer behavior, and competitive products.
job_description[5]: Collaborate with Consumer Insights to analyze survey data and identify unmet needs.
job_description[6]: Attend industry fairs and events to stay abreast of category innovations.
job_description[7]: Perform competitor analysis to benchmark offerings and pricing strategies.
job_description[8]: Translate market data into actionable insights for product development.
job_description[9]: 2. Field Work with Consumers
job_description[10]: Engage directly with consumers via in-store recruitment, focus groups, and field research.
job_description[11]: Collect and analyze feedback during product testing and sampling.
job_description[12]: Build relationships with key consumer segments to foster brand loyalty and trust.
job_description[13]: 3. Product Development
job_description[14]: Generate innovative product concepts based on research and consumer input.
job_description[15]: Partner with Consumer Technical Insights and R&D to develop prototypes and assess feasibility.
job_description[16]: Lead the end-to-end product development process, ensuring alignment with category goals.
job_description[17]: 4. Product Lifecycle Management
job_description[18]: Oversee the full lifecycle of products from concept to launch.
job_description[19]: Monitor product performance and recommend enhancements or updates.
job_description[20]: 5. Stakeholder Management
job_description[21]: Serve as the primary liaison for cross-functional teams including Marketing, R&D, and WinCommerce.
job_description[22]: Coordinate with suppliers to ensure timely delivery of materials and resources.
job_description[23]: Collaborate with WinCommerce to organize in-store testing and gather consumer feedback.
job_requirement[0]: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field (Master’s preferred).
job_requirement[1]: 3–5 years of experience in product development, market research, or consumer insights.
job_requirement[2]: Strong analytical skills and ability to translate data into strategic decisions.
job_requirement[3]: Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
job_requirement[4]: Passion for consumer-centric innovation and trend analysis.
address: 23 Le Duan Street, District 1, HCMC
benefits.Thưởng: 13th payment
benefits.Khác: Attractive Performance Bonus

This is a unique opportunity to play a key role in the Vietnam business team in an exciting, fast-growing business environment. The ideal candidate is an entrepreneurial professional with passion and experience in how to ‘scale’ sales efforts.
job_description[1]: In this role, you will be responsible for implementing a comprehensive sales plan for MEGAZONE CLOUD’s service and product offerings to assigned customer territories. You will manage numerous customer accounts concurrently and strategically to deliver technical solutions in collaboration with internal and external technology partners. You’re also encouraged to proactively propose and experiment with lead-generation marketing campaigns to help address potential customers in alignment with the digital growth function in the headquarter. This role will report to the Head of Vietnam Business.

company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH CÔNG NGHỆ CODERPUSH
job_description[0]: Role overview
job_description[1]: You will be a core member of a forward-deployed engagement team that onboards enterprise customers (often highly regulated, high-maturity organizations such as banks) to an AI Data Analyst SaaS platform. Your primary responsibility is to design and implement robust data models and connections so the AI Data Analyst can reliably compute business metrics and answer analytical questions. This is a high-touch role combining deep technical data modeling and engineering with stakeholder management, requirements gathering, testing/validation, risk mitigation, and project delivery.
job_description[2]: What you’ll do — key responsibilities
job_description[3]: • Customer liaison & discovery
job_description[4]: • Lead discovery sessions with technical and non-technical stakeholders to understand source systems, data lineage, business definitions, and reporting needs.
job_description[5]: • Map business KPIs/metrics to available data and identify gaps or remediation required.
job_description[6]: • Data modeling & metric engineering
job_description[7]: • Design logical and physical data models (facts, dimensions, hierarchies, slowly changing dimensions) that reflect customer business semantics and support the AI Data Analyst’s metric definitions.
job_description[8]: • Define canonical metric specifications (metric definition, calculation SQL/DSL, cohort logic, edge cases).
job_description[9]: • Platform integration
job_description[10]: • Implement data connections, ingestion pipelines, and schema mappings into the SaaS platform (or customer’s cloud data layer) ensuring freshness, reliability, and observability.
job_description[11]: • Configure dimensions, attributes, and metric metadata inside the platform so the AI models can consume and reason about the data.
job_description[12]: • Validation & QA
job_description[13]: • Develop and execute test plans to validate AI Data Analyst outputs against agreed-upon metric specs and ground-truth reports; quantify accuracy and identify root causes for discrepancies.
job_description[14]: • Create automated and manual validation suites (unit tests, reconciliation queries, data quality checks).
job_description[15]: Project & stakeholder management
job_description[16]: • Create project plans, manage timelines, set realistic expectations, and communicate status/risks to customers and internal stakeholders.
job_description[17]: • Facilitate sign-offs on metric definitions, data readiness, and production cutovers.
job_description[18]: • Risk, security & governance
job_description[19]: • Identify data and model risks (PII exposures, inference errors, stale data) and put mitigation controls in place.
job_description[20]: • Ensure implementations comply with customer security, data governance, and regulatory requirements.
job_description[21]: • Knowledge transfer & documentation
job_description[22]: • Produce clear runbooks, metric spec docs, and onboarding artifacts. Train customer users and internal support teams for ongoing operations.
job_description[23]: • Continuous improvement
job_description[24]: • Feed product/engineering with requirements and lessons learned to improve platform data modeling capabilities and onboarding playbooks.

job_description[0]: Our fast-growing company is seeking a highly talented and experienced
job_description[1]: Full-stack Java engineer
job_description[2]: to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for leading the development of software applications and systems that meet the needs of our clients.
job_description[3]: As a Fullstack Java engineer, you will be responsible for:
job_description[4]: - Provide technical leadership in the design, integration, implementation, and transition of enterprise SaaS human services system
job_description[5]: - Flexible design architectural approach to deliver configurability along the data creation, integrations, workflows, notifications, and data persistence
job_description[6]: - Understand and synthesize integration requirements, and develop recommendations based on business objectives, product roadmap, solution architecture and technical considerations
job_description[7]: - Contribute to the development of our platform functionality using state-of-the-art frameworks and tools Specify and troubleshoot API integrations in an ecosystem of multiple systems
job_description[8]: - Work closely with client stakeholders, partners, product managers, creative designers, platform architect, and other software engineers
job_description[9]: - Constantly learn and use leading-edge technologies

company_name: CT TNHH NEXT WAVE ENERGY MONITORING
job_description[0]: 1. Network Design & Implementation
job_description[1]: • Design and configure LAN/WAN networks for solar plants, substations, and monitoring centers.
job_description[2]: • Implement IP addressing schemes, VLANs, routing, and switching for operational technologies (OT) and IT networks.
job_description[3]: • Set up communication for SCADA/EMS systems, inverters, meters, data loggers, and field sensors.
job_description[4]: • Deploy industrial communication protocols (Modbus TCP/RTU, IEC 104/61850, DNP3).
job_description[5]: • Integrate networking for remote sites using LTE/4G/5G, microwave links, and VPN tunnels.
job_description[6]: 2. Monitoring & Maintenance
job_description[7]: • Monitor network performance and reliability for solar plant operations.
job_description[8]: • Troubleshoot issues related to connectivity between inverters, weather stations, string monitoring units (SMUs), and control rooms.
job_description[9]: • Maintain and update network diagrams, documentation, and configurations.
job_description[10]: 3. Network Security
job_description[11]: • Implement firewalls, access control lists (ACL), and secure remote access (VPN, SSH).
job_description[12]: • Monitor and mitigate threats in OT/SCADA networks.
job_description[13]: • Ensure compliance with cybersecurity standards for energy infrastructure (NERC CIP or ISO 27001 preferred).
job_description[14]: 4. Collaboration & Support
job_description[15]: • Work closely with solar engineering teams, SCADA engineers, electrical engineers, and EPC/contractors.
job_description[16]: • Support commissioning of new solar sites by validating network configurations and communication links.
job_description[17]: • Train technicians on basic network diagnostics.
job_description[18]: 5. Cloud & Monitoring Platforms (Optional)
job_description[19]: • Configure data uploads to cloud-based monitoring systems (AWS, Azure, Solar-Log, Power BI, etc.).
job_description[20]: • Manage API integrations for energy dashboards and reporting.

job_requirement[6]: • Thành thạo Linux (Centos, Ubuntu, Redhat) ví dụ như setup LAMP stack trên Linux server, configure Virtual Host và có thể lập trình trực tiếp trên Linux.

job_title: Trưởng Phòng Hạ Tầng & Dịch Vụ CNTT kiêm Trưởng Phòng Bảo Mật Hệ Thống
company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Bảo Tín Mạnh Hải
job_description[0]: Mục tiêu công việc
job_description[1]: Quản lý toàn bộ hạ tầng CNTT, dịch vụ IT và bảo mật hệ thống của công ty, đảm bảo các hệ thống hoạt động liên tục, an toàn và tối ưu chi phí. Đảm bảo hạ tầng và dịch vụ CNTT hỗ trợ hiệu quả chiến lược kinh doanh, nâng cao năng suất, bảo vệ dữ liệu và cải tiến liên tục theo xu hướng công nghệ mới.
job_description[2]: Nhiệm vụ chính
job_description[3]: 1. Quản lý hạ tầng CNTT
job_description[4]: • Giám sát, vận hành và bảo trì hệ thống máy chủ, thiết bị mạng, thiết bị lưu trữ, cơ sở dữ liệu, phần mềm nội bộ, phần cứng, hệ thống email và dịch vụ đám mây.
job_description[5]: • Triển khai, cập nhật, nâng cấp các phần mềm, phần cứng, thiết bị mạng, giải pháp backup & recovery và điện toán đám mây (Azure, AWS).
job_description[6]: • Quản lý và duy trì kết nối Internet, VPN, firewall, anti-virus, bảo mật mạng và hệ thống truy cập từ xa.
job_description[7]: • Quản lý danh mục tài sản CNTT (phần mềm & phần cứng), theo dõi vòng đời thiết bị, tối ưu chi phí và đảm bảo hiệu quả sử dụng.
job_description[8]: • Lên kế hoạch mở rộng, nâng cấp hạ tầng để đáp ứng nhu cầu kinh doanh và chiến lược phát triển công ty.
job_description[9]: 2. Quản lý dịch vụ IT & hỗ trợ người dùng
job_description[10]: • Đảm bảo tất cả các yêu cầu hỗ trợ CNTT được xử lý nhanh chóng, hiệu quả và đúng SLA.
job_description[11]: • Phát triển, duy trì và cải tiến quy trình hỗ trợ người dùng, helpdesk, quản lý sự cố, quản lý thay đổi, và tài liệu hướng dẫn sử dụng hệ thống.
job_description[12]: • Đào tạo, hướng dẫn người dùng sử dụng phần mềm, phần cứng và các công cụ CNTT, bao gồm Office 365, ERP, CRM, BI.
job_description[13]: 3. Bảo mật hệ thống & dữ liệu
job_description[14]: • Xây dựng, triển khai và giám sát các chính sách bảo mật hệ thống, dữ liệu và ứng dụng nội bộ.
job_description[15]: • Quản lý rủi ro, thực hiện kiểm tra định kỳ và đánh giá bảo mật toàn bộ hạ tầng.
job_description[16]: • Triển khai các giải pháp phòng chống xâm nhập, mã hóa dữ liệu, xác thực đa yếu tố (MFA), quản lý SSL/TLS, và các công cụ giám sát bảo mật.
job_description[17]: • Lập kế hoạch backup, disaster recovery và business continuity.
job_description[18]: • Đảm bảo tuân thủ các chuẩn bảo mật, quy định và compliance (ISO 27001, FedRAMP, FIPS 140-2).
job_description[19]: 4. Quản lý dự án & cải tiến công nghệ
job_description[20]: • Lập kế hoạch, ưu tiên và quản lý các dự án CNTT theo mục tiêu kinh doanh.
job_description[21]: • Đánh giá, nghiên cứu và đề xuất các giải pháp công nghệ mới nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả vận hành, tối ưu chi phí và tăng cường bảo mật.
job_description[22]: • Quản lý môi trường DevOps, CI/CD pipeline, Azure Cloud và các nền tảng liên quan.
job_description[23]: • Hợp tác chặt chẽ với các phòng ban: phát triển phần mềm, bảo mật, dữ liệu, BI, ERP để đảm bảo các hệ thống hoạt động tối ưu.
job_description[24]: 5. Lãnh đạo & phát triển đội ngũ
job_description[25]: • Quản lý, đào tạo và phát triển đội ngũ kỹ thuật hạ tầng, bảo mật và hỗ trợ người dùng.
job_description[26]: • Xây dựng KPI, đánh giá hiệu suất, lập kế hoạch phát triển nghề nghiệp cho nhân viên.
job_description[27]: • Khuyến khích văn hóa làm việc chuyên nghiệp, minh bạch và cải tiến liên tục.
job_description[28]: • Thúc đẩy tinh thần hợp tác, sáng tạo và chia sẻ kiến thức trong đội ngũ CNTT.
job_requirement[0]: Trình độ & kinh nghiệm
job_requirement[1]: • Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên chuyên ngành CNTT, Hệ thống thông tin, Khoa học máy tính hoặc tương đương.
job_requirement[2]: • Tối thiểu 5 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý hạ tầng CNTT và bảo mật hệ thống, trong đó ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí quản lý.
job_requirement[3]: • Kinh nghiệm quản lý dịch vụ IT, triển khai hệ thống máy chủ, mạng, cloud (Azure, AWS), Office 365, Active Directory, DevOps/CI/CD.
job_requirement[4]: • Có kinh nghiệm triển khai và quản lý các dự án bảo mật, compliance (ISO 27001, FedRAMP, FIPS 140-2).
job_requirement[5]: Kiến thức kỹ thuật
job_requirement[6]: • Thành thạo Microsoft Windows Server, LINUX, Virtualization (Hyper-V, VMware), Active Directory, Group Policy, OU.
job_requirement[7]: • Kinh nghiệm với firewall, VPN, SSL/TLS, SFTP, SSH, MFA, patch management.
job_requirement[8]: • Kiến thức về Cloud Services (Azure, Azure Government Cloud, AWS), Containers, Kubernetes.
job_requirement[9]: • Quản lý hệ thống ERP, CRM, BI, Office 365, và các phần mềm nội bộ doanh nghiệp.
job_requirement[10]: • Kỹ năng phân tích, đánh giá hạ tầng và tối ưu hiệu quả vận hành.
job_requirement[11]: Kỹ năng cá nhân
job_requirement[12]: • Khả năng lãnh đạo, quản lý dự án, và làm việc nhóm.
job_requirement[13]: • Giao tiếp xuất sắc với các phòng ban và ban lãnh đạo.
job_requirement[14]: • Tư duy chiến lược, giải quyết vấn đề và ra quyết định nhanh chóng.
job_requirement[15]: • Khả năng quản lý nhiều dự án song song, ưu tiên công việc hiệu quả.

company_name: Công Ty TNHH LOTTE C&F Vietnam
job_description[0]: We are looking for a highly skilled and proactive Senior Data Engineer to lead the design and development of our data foundation. This role is critical in building robust data pipelines, managing databases, enabling scalable data structure, and ensuring high data quality and observability at companywide. You’ll work with stakeholders across engineering, analytics, and operations to unlock the full value of data across the organization.
job_description[1]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[2]: • Design, develop, and maintain data pipelines (batch and streaming) using tools such as Kafka, AWS Glue, DBT, or Airflow.
job_description[3]: • Build and manage data warehouse / data mart for BI, reporting, and advanced analytics.
job_description[4]: • Collaborate with software teams to ensure integration seamlessly with data systems.
job_description[5]: • Implement data quality frameworks (validation, deduplication, lineage tracking).
job_description[6]: • Support CDP integration.
job_description[7]: • Monitor and administer production databases (Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL). Acting as the first line of defense for any database-related issues, diagnosing the root cause of problems, and implementing effective solutions to minimize downtime.
job_description[8]: • Ensure high availability (HA), backup/restore, replication, and disaster recovery strategies are in place.
job_description[9]: • Automate DB operational tasks.
job_description[10]: • Enforce data security, access control, and compliance with PCI DSS, GDPR, and local regulations (Decree 13, SBV).
job_description[11]: • Implementing robust processes to retrieve data from many sources of databases. This involves managing different data formats, protocols, and extraction methods (batch, streaming).
job_description[12]: • Researching and evaluating new database management systems (e.g., NoSQL, NewSQL, Graph databases), data warehouse or cloud-native services to see if they would better serve upcoming business needs.
job_description[13]: • Capacity Planning: monitoring the growth of the database to forecast future storage and processing needs, ensuring the system can scale with increasing data volume and user load.
job_description[14]: • Cost Forecasting: analyzing usage to predict future database-related costs.
job_description[15]: • License Management: planning for the renewal and management of expensive commercial database licenses.

job_description[0]: POW TEAM – VIETNAM
job_description[1]: The Creative, Analytical, Action Driven Engine Behind High Performance E Commerce
job_description[2]: POW is one of the most important roles at WowSuite. This team combines analytics, creativity, CRO, automation, investigation, and execution to drive revenue and make performance breakthroughs happen. You will work across departments, solve complex problems, and push ideas into production that directly impact millions of dollars in sales.
job_description[3]: This role offers base salary, profit share, performance bonuses, and the opportunity to travel internationally.
job_description[4]: ABOUT THE ROLE
job_description[5]: POW improves the performance and scalability of e commerce funnels across the full user journey. You work with Account Managers, CRO, Engineering, Marketing, and Executives to generate insights, design experiments, investigate issues, automate workflows, and deliver measurable performance lifts.
job_description[6]: You are the performance engine behind higher CTR, higher CVR, stronger approval rates, bigger AOV, longer LTV, and cleaner, more profitable traffic.
job_description[7]: CORE CAPABILITIES
job_description[8]: Analysis and Insight
job_description[9]: You read CTR, CVR, AOV, LTV, EPC, approval rates, traffic mix, user flows, dashboards, and competitor funnels. You convert data into clear insights and recommended next actions. You never stop at reporting, you always push what needs to happen next.
job_description[10]: Creativity and CRO Execution
job_description[11]: You generate ideas that improve presale, index, checkout, and upsell. You design and validate tests, monitor results, and turn wins into permanent deployments. You understand the short game of CTR and the long game of lifetime value.
job_description[12]: Investigation and Problem Solving
job_description[13]: You treat anomalies like puzzles. You track down issues in traffic quality, fraud, routing, tracking, or payment flows. You uncover root causes and eliminate them. You protect revenue by ensuring clean data and clean funnels.
job_description[14]: Automation and AI Enablement
job_description[15]: You build automations using SQL, Python, APIs, or Apps Script. You use AI to speed up reporting, analysis, communication, and execution. You remove repetitive work and help the team scale.
job_description[16]: POW MINDSET
job_description[17]: You think beyond numbers and generate performance ideas.
job_description[18]: You always propose next steps.
job_description[19]: You collaborate and push ideas into action.
job_description[20]: You own outcomes, not tasks.
job_description[21]: You simplify complexity so others can act.
job_description[22]: You move fast, communicate clearly, and stay curious.
job_description[23]: You understand e commerce metrics from CTR to LTV and how they connect.
job_description[24]: WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON
job_description[25]: Performance reporting, insights, dashboards, and forecasting.
job_description[26]: A B test design, setup, monitoring, and deployment.
job_description[27]: Investigating traffic quality, fraud signals, approval drops, and funnel anomalies.
job_description[28]: Payment analysis and routing optimization.
job_description[29]: QA of funnels, layouts, tracking, and FE updates.
job_description[30]: Automation of reports, workflows, and data pipelines.
job_description[31]: Cross team execution to turn insights into results.
job_description[32]: You will be at the center of performance improvement for WowSuite clients.

job_title: Senior Quality Engineer (Up to 30 Months of Salary Annually)
job_description[0]: ABOUT THE ROLE
job_description[1]: Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach $100 million of revenue in 2024, a cumulative average growth rate of over
job_description[3]: in just under 4 years. Our mission now is to harness the power of technology to develop a direct-to-consumer approach and enhance customer lifetime value.
job_description[4]: We are looking for a skilled
job_description[5]: Full Stack Quality Engineer
job_description[6]: to join our team and ensure the delivery of high-quality software products. This role combines expertise in manual and automated testing, technical acumen, and collaboration skills to maintain product excellence across the development lifecycle. As a full-stack QC Engineer, you will work closely with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to test and improve our systems, ensuring an exceptional user experience and alignment with business goals.
job_description[7]: ready to join the crew?
job_description[8]: WHAT YOU WILL DO:
job_description[9]: Testing and Quality Assurance:
job_description[10]: • Design, develop, and execute test plans and test cases to ensure comprehensive coverage of product requirements.
job_description[11]: • Perform functional, integration, regression, and system testing for both frontend and backend systems.
job_description[12]: • Create and maintain detailed reports on testing progress, defects, and outcomes.
job_description[13]: • Review and refine test strategies to optimize quality and efficiency.
job_description[14]: • Ensure cross-browser, cross-platform, and device compatibility for applications.
job_description[15]: Automation Testing:
job_description[16]: • Develop, implement, and maintain automated test scripts using tools like Cucumber, Serenity BDD, and Playwright.
job_description[17]: • Conduct API testing using tools such as Postman and performance testing with JMeter.
job_description[18]: • Collaborate with the DevOps team to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git.
job_description[19]: • Leverage programming skills in Java or JavaScript to enhance testing frameworks.
job_description[20]: Collaboration and Delivery:
job_description[21]: • Collaborate with BAs, developers, and product managers to understand requirements, provide input, and ensure alignment.
job_description[22]: • Act as a quality advocate, focusing on delivering features that meet user needs and maintain high standards.
job_description[23]: • Evaluate product readiness and release timelines based on test results and team discussions.
job_description[24]: Leadership and Influence:
job_description[25]: • Share quality-focused practices and promote a quality-first mindset within the team.
job_description[26]: • Mentor team members on testing techniques and workflows to enhance overall quality.
job_description[27]: • Ensure workflows and processes are followed consistently and improve them when necessary.
job_description[28]: Continuous Monitoring and Improvement:
job_description[29]: • Monitor product performance and user feedback in production environments to identify improvement areas.
job_description[30]: • Stay updated with industry trends, tools, and best practices to continually improve testing processes.
job_description[31]: • Drive initiatives to improve product quality, user satisfaction, and team productivity.

job_description[0]: We are looking for potential candidates who are willing to work for R&D Center in Thang Long II Industrial Zone, Hung Yen, and will be mainly responsible for the following duties:
job_description[1]: - Develop embedded software for washing machine control systems from design to implementation.
job_description[2]: - Analyze functional specifications and convert them into detailed software design.
job_description[3]: - Implement software modules in C/C++ for microcontrollers (Renesas or STM32).
job_description[4]: - Design control logic for washing programs, motor drive, water level and temperature sensing.
job_description[5]: - Conduct unit testing and debugging on actual hardware.
job_description[6]: - Work closely with other teams and testing design flowcharts, test specifications and verification reports.
job_requirement[0]: - University's degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering, Automation, Mechatronics or Computer Science.
job_requirement[1]: - New graduate or experience in embedded software development (Renesas, STM8, Nuvoton preferred).
job_requirement[2]: - Solid understanding of microcontroller peripherals such as PWM, ADC, UART, I2C, SPI and timers).
job_requirement[3]: - Experience with development tools such as e2studio, IAR, CS+ or equivalent.
job_requirement[4]: - Basic knowledge of control systems or motor control is a plus.
job_requirement[5]: - Careful, responsible and proactive in learning new technologies.
job_requirement[6]: - Able to read and understand technical documents in English.

job_title: Senior IT Business Analyst cum Product Manager
job_description[0]: Own the end-to-end life cycle of assigned products/systems from requirement analysis to delivery, post launching enhancement. Act as bridge between business users, IT and Vendors to ensure the product delivers measurable business value.
job_description[1]: 1. Product & Strategy
job_description[2]: - Define and maintain the product, system vision, goals, and roadmap aligned with business strategy, technology strategy
job_description[3]: - Translate business objectives into actionable digital initiatives and measurable KPIs.
job_description[4]: - Identify opportunities for process improvement, automation, and customer experience enhancement.
job_description[5]: 2. Business Analysis
job_description[6]: - Work with business users to gather, document, and validate functional and non-functional requirements.
job_description[7]: - Develop detailed Business Requirements Documents (BRD), User Stories, and Use Cases.
job_description[8]: - Support system analysis, data mapping, and integration requirements across systems (CRM, Quotation, CDP, LMS, BPM etc.).
job_description[9]: 3. Delivery & Execution
job_description[10]: - Act as Product Owner Assistant in Agile or hybrid delivery models — manage backlog, sprint planning, and release priorities.
job_description[11]: - Collaborate with Project manager, Developers, QA, UX/UI designers, and vendors to ensure timely and high-quality delivery.
job_description[12]: - Participate in SIT, UAT, validate deliverables, and ensure system acceptance meets defined requirements.
job_description[13]: 4. Stakeholder & Vendor Management
job_description[14]: - Serve as key contact between business departments, IT, and external vendors.
job_description[15]: - Communicate progress, risks, and issues transparently to stakeholders.
job_description[16]: - Coordinate vendor evaluations, PoCs, and feature enhancement proposals.
job_description[17]: 5. Measurement & Continuous Improvement
job_description[18]: - Define and monitor KPIs / success metrics for each product, system features release.
job_description[19]: - Gather post-launch feedback and drive continuous improvement.
job_description[20]: - Maintain product documentation and ensure proper version control and knowledge sharing.

job_title: IT Specialized Korean–Vietnamese Interpreter / Translator (Up to 40 Mil Vnd)-Contract 6 Months
company_name: Công Ty TNHH LOTTE C&F Vietnam
job_description[0]: 1. Position Overview
job_description[1]: This position is responsible for providing professional Korean–Vietnamese interpretation and translation support for IT software development Head visiting from Korea. The role ensures clear and accurate communication between Korean IT teams and local Vietnamese IT, Operations, and Business teams.
job_description[2]: Key areas include technical interpretation, documentation translation, and project communication support.
job_description[4]: 2. Key Responsibilities
job_description[5]: 1) Technical Interpretation (Korean ↔ Vietnamese)
job_description[6]: • Provide real-time interpretation for meetings, workshops, on-site visits, and technical discussions.
job_description[7]: • Interpret topics such as system architecture, API integration, mobile app development, IT operations, troubleshooting, and change requests.
job_description[8]: • Bridge communication between Korean IT personnel and Vietnamese stakeholders to ensure alignment on project status, issues, and requirements.
job_description[9]: 2) Project Communication Support
job_description[10]: • Prepare meeting minutes and summarize key decisions and action items.
job_description[11]: • Track communication items between Korea and Vietnam and follow up with relevant teams.
job_description[12]: • Support project coordination by ensuring clarity of schedules, deliverables, and expectations.
job_description[13]: 3) On-site Technical Support
job_description[14]: • Provide on-site interpretation during system demonstrations, store-level testing (e.g., POS, payment tests), or operational checks.
job_description[15]: • Assist communication during incidents or system failures to ensure timely information flow.
job_description[16]: • Support Korean IT teams during business trips, including coordination with local departments.

job_title: Senior UI/UX Designer (Must Have 3 Years Experience in Ux-Ui Design)
company_name: Văn Phòng Đại Diện Max Biocare Tại Hà Nội
job_description[0]: We’re looking for an experienced Senior UX/UI Designer to lead the design and optimization of engaging, user-centric digital experiences across Shopify and WordPress platforms.
job_description[1]: This role blends creativity, strategy, and technical insight — ideal for someone who understands both corporate branding and e-commerce performance design.
job_description[2]: As part of our Digital Experience team, you’ll collaborate with marketers, developers, and business stakeholders to create seamless user journeys, improve conversion rates, and ensure every touchpoint reflects our brand excellence.
job_description[3]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[4]: - Lead UX/UI Design Projects — Plan, design, and deliver high-quality user interfaces for corporate websites and e-commerce stores on Shopify and WordPress.
job_description[5]: - User Experience Strategy — Conduct research, user testing, and data analysis to inform UX decisions and improve user flows.
job_description[6]: - Design Systems & Style Guides — Develop and maintain design systems, component libraries, and visual style guides for consistent brand representation.
job_description[7]: - Wireframing & Prototyping — Create wireframes, interactive prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups using Figma, Adobe XD, or similar tools.
job_description[8]: - Collaboration — Work closely with developers to ensure design feasibility and accurate front-end implementation.
job_description[9]: - Optimization — Use analytics and A/B testing to refine layouts, improve usability, and enhance conversion rates.
job_description[10]: - Accessibility & Responsiveness — Ensure all designs meet accessibility standards and provide seamless experiences across devices and browsers.
job_requirement[0]: Experience
job_requirement[1]: - 3+ years of proven experience designing for UX and UI — preferably for corporate and e-commerce websites.
job_requirement[2]: - Demonstrated expertise in Shopify and WordPress design, including theme customization and understanding of front-end constraints.
job_requirement[3]: - Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, or similar tools.
job_requirement[4]: - Strong understanding of user-centered design principles, information architecture and conversion-focused layouts.
job_requirement[5]: - Experience conducting user research, usability testing, and heuristic evaluations.
job_requirement[6]: - Familiarity with HTML/CSS and responsive frameworks (knowledge of Liquid or Elementor is a plus).
job_requirement[7]: - Excellent communication skills — able to articulate design rationale and present to non-design audiences.
job_requirement[8]: - Strong portfolio demonstrating UX/UI work for both Shopify and WordPress platforms.
job_requirement[9]: Design Skills
job_requirement[10]: - Proficient in Figma, Adobe XD, Adobe Illustrator, and Photoshop.
job_requirement[11]: - Skilled in logical layout composition, harmonious color schemes, and professional typography.
job_requirement[12]: - Strong aesthetic sense, with the ability to convey ideas and narratives through design (visual storytelling).
job_requirement[13]: - Solid understanding and practical application of UX principles including UX
job_requirement[14]: - Research, Information Architecture, User Flow, and UX Testing to optimize user experience.
job_requirement[15]: Benefits
job_requirement[16]: - Regular professional training provided directly at the workplace, along with access to online courses.
job_requirement[17]: - Income: Depending on position and experience (Junior or Senior), FROM 25 million VND + performance bonuses.
job_requirement[18]: - Working hours: Monday to Friday, and Saturday morning. Saturday afternoon and Sunday off.
job_requirement[19]: - Social, health, and unemployment insurance according to current government regulations.
job_requirement[20]: - Benefits for birthdays, weddings, funerals, and illness in accordance with Vietnamese labor laws.
job_requirement[21]: - Annual company trip.
job_requirement[22]: - Holiday and Tet bonuses throughout the year.

job_title: Senior Data Analyst , Storefront eCommerce Platform (Total Annual Compensation $55,000)
job_description[0]: ABOUT THE ROLE
job_description[1]: Join our
job_description[2]: Technology Innovations Center of Excellence (CoE)
job_description[3]: at
job_description[4]: Crossian,
job_description[5]: fast-growing startup that achieved a milestone of $100M in 2024.
job_description[6]: In this dynamic role, you'll check in daily with your team to stay aligned on project goals and collaborate across our ecosystem with an
job_description[7]: Agile mindset
job_description[8]: infused with a
job_description[9]: unicorn-worthy startup culture
job_description[10]: We are building a cutting-edge
job_description[11]: Global eCommerce Platform
job_description[12]: , offering end-to-end solutions for:
job_description[13]: • Storefront
job_description[14]: : Designing customizable and scalable online store systems that provide seamless shopping experiences and support dynamic business growth.
job_description[15]: • Ads Manager
job_description[16]: : Integrating and optimizing advertising tools across platforms like Facebook, Google and more, enabling businesses to launch, track, and analyze marketing campaigns efficiently.
job_description[17]: • Marketing Insights & CRM
job_description[18]: : Turning raw data from marketing campaigns, transactions, and user behavior into actionable insights to enhance customer engagement and drive smarter decision-making.
job_description[19]: WHY JOIN US?
job_description[20]: We’re not just about building platforms; we’re about creating a workplace where talent thrives. Here's what you’ll gain:
job_description[21]: Exceptional Compensation
job_description[22]: • Up to 30 months of salary per year
job_description[23]: through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
job_description[24]: • Total annual compensation $55,000, reflecting your expertise and contribution.
job_description[25]: Growth Opportunities
job_description[26]: • Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
job_description[27]: • Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
job_description[28]: Global Vision
job_description[29]: • Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
job_description[30]: • Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.
job_description[31]: In addition to development tasks, you’ll collaborate closely with other CoEs to understand their unique challenges. With your technical expertise, you’ll continuously propose innovative solutions to elevate their performance and contribute to the overall success of the organization.
job_description[32]: WHAT YOU WILL DO
job_description[33]: As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for the following tasks and duties:
job_description[34]: • Strategic Analysis & Insight Generation
job_description[36]: data from diverse sources, including user behavior metrics, campaign performance metrics, and customer engagement metrics.
job_description[37]: • Manage data from A/B testing, including user tracking event data, aggregating and splitting it into multiple versions for analysis.
job_description[38]: • Develop hypotheses and provide actionable insights to improve storefront experiences, optimize ad campaigns, enhance customer retention strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of new features or content through AB testing.
job_description[39]: • When comparing versions in AB testing, provide the confidence level of the results, determine the required number of views (users) and duration for the test to achieve statistically significant outcomes. Define the Definition of Done (DoD)
job_description[40]: for the two versions A and B in the experiments.
job_description[41]: • Utilize data visualization techniques to create charts and dashboards that communicate key trends and support decision-making for cross-functional teams.
job_description[43]: • Build and maintain real-time BI dashboards to track critical metrics such as conversion rates, customer lifetime value, and results from A/B tests.
job_description[44]: • Assist in the creation of a self-service BI system, enabling teams to explore data and generate reports tailored to their needs, including monitoring and analyzing A/B tests.
job_description[46]: • Define and manage data schemas for eCommerce-specific objects (e.g., product catalogs, tracking user events) and data from A/B tests to optimize data accessibility for analysis.
job_description[47]: • Ensure the data warehouse maintains high data quality standards, is optimized for performance, and meets the needs of our global platform, including supporting analyses from A/B testing
job_description[50]: Work closely with team members to comprehend data requirements and deliver appropriate data solutions to meet business needs.
job_description[52]: Engage with cross-functional teams to support and facilitate data-driven decision-making throughout the organization.
job_description[53]: By undertaking these responsibilities, you will play a crucial role in driving data-informed decisions and strategies, ultimately contributing to the success and growth of our organization.

job_description[0]: About the Role
job_description[1]: Own the reliability, security, and compliance of our Google Workspace for Education Plus tenant, AWS cloud services, key education platforms, and campus network. Align all operations to academic cycles (Start of year SOY / End of year EOY) and Vietnam’s regulatory environment, while partnering with teaching/operations teams to keep learning tools fast, safe, and easy to use.
job_description[2]: Key Responsibilities

company_name: Công Ty TNHH Olam Việt Nam
job_description[0]: As a leading provider of high-quality food and beverage ingredients, we work with farming communities across the globe to grow, source and produce ingredients that are good for consumers, farmers, and the world around us. We supply household food brands and manufacturers worldwide with cocoa, coffee, dairy, nuts and spices ingredients which are often grown on our own farms and estates and sourced from hundreds of thousands of farmers across ~50 countries. Along with our diverse manufacturing and innovation capabilities, this means we can provide ingredients for a range of products, from a plant-based latte mix to an almond based snack bar or a dairy-free ice cream. Making a positive impact on people and planet is a core component of our Purpose, to be the change for good food and a healthy future. With a deep-rooted presence in the countries where our ingredients are grown, we are closer to farmers, enabling better quality, and more reliable, traceable, and transparent supply. And whoever we’re with, whatever we’re doing, we always make it real.
job_description[1]: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
job_description[2]: • Revise and analyze data on farmer practices and sustainability programs, prepare diagnosis reports of data quality, identify urgent improvements, train origins to address pitfalls, and monitor implementation of solutions.

job_description[4]: • Design and provide training to origin teams on data quality monitoring, survey collection,
job_description[5]: • Design and implement standard operational procedures to monitor data quality recording, data quality reporting, polygon quality, and farmer training.
job_description[6]: • Support the implementation of farmer segmentation analytics and farm development plan design.
job_description[7]: • Support data cleaning and tailoring for submission to different sustainability reporting platforms from customers and partner organizations.
job_description[8]: • Propose innovations to data collection, data monitoring and data evaluation
job_description[9]: • Conduct in-depth demo’s of our online sustainability platforms to external parties
job_description[10]: • Be the point of contact for our digital sustainability platforms - test new development, provide high level detailed feedback and be responsible for the final sign off, investigate and provide guidance on tech issues
job_description[11]: • Monitor status, estimations and expected delivery dates for all digital tracks
job_description[12]: • Work closely with the origin teams and assist with internal and external reporting
job_description[13]: • Overarching goal to revolutionize and digitize reporting metrics

job_description[0]: Main purpose of work:
job_description[1]: We are seeking a Business Analyst who will act as the crucial bridge between our functional teams and business stakeholders. In this role, you will facilitate clear communication and understanding of business requirements, supporting project managers throughout the project lifecycle. You will coordinate between Biz team and Delivery Team during FIT/GAP requirements, System Integration Testing (SIT) and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) phases, proactively manage outstanding issues to resolution. The ideal candidate has a strong background in system integration projects (e.g. banking interfaces, SAP modules, HR systems, payment platforms), is fluent in English, and possesses excellent organizational and communication skills. This is a highly collaborative role requiring a proactive, decisive individual who can work with multiple stakeholders to ensure project success.
job_description[2]: Main tasks:
job_description[3]: 1. Liaison between Business & IT: Serve as the primary link between business units and functional/technical teams, translating business needs into clear requirements and functional specifications. Ensure both sides have a mutual understanding of objectives and deliverables.
job_description[4]: 2. Issue Management & Resolution: Proactively track and manage outstanding issues, risks, or change requests throughout the project. Follow up with relevant stakeholders (internal teams, vendors, etc.) to drive issues toresolution and document the outcomes. Ensure that all issues are resolved in a timely manner to keep project deliverables on track and maintain stakeholder
job_description[5]: confidence.
job_description[6]: 3. Stakeholder Engagement: Engage with multiple stakeholders across different departments and levels. Facilitate regular status meetings and discussions to update stakeholders on progress, gather input, and address concerns. Build strong relationships and maintain open lines of communication to ensure stakeholder needs are understood and met.
job_description[7]: 4. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities to improve business processes or system functionality based on insights gathered during projects. Recommend and help implement process optimizations or system enhancements. Ensure that lessons learned from each project (such as integration challenges or testing feedback) are documented and applied to future initiatives.

job_description[0]: 1. IT Operations & Support
job_description[1]: • Ensure the smooth operation of all local IT functions and engage in effective incident management.
job_description[2]: • Provide day-to-day IT support for end-users, including troubleshooting hardware, software, and network issues.
job_description[3]: • Maintain local IT infrastructure, including network devices and end-user equipment.
job_description[4]: • Act as the first point of contact for IT incidents when the ServiceDesk is unable to resolve issues.
job_description[5]: • Escalate unresolved issues to the Global IT team when required and ensure timely communication.
job_description[6]: • Participate in post-incident reviews and continuous improvement initiatives.
job_description[7]: 2. System Deployment & Device Management
job_description[8]: • Deploy, configure, and manage devices through Microsoft Intune, including compliance policies and application deployment.
job_description[9]: • Support Windows Autopilot provisioning for seamless device setup and lifecycle management.
job_description[10]: • Manage user and device identities via Microsoft Entra and AD, ensuring security and proper role-based access control.
job_description[11]: • Ensure all endpoints meet company security and compliance baselines as defined by Global IT.
job_description[12]: • Conduct periodic reviews of device configurations, security posture, and compliance reports.
job_description[13]: 3. Global Standards & Cybersecurity Compliance
job_description[14]: • Ensure compliance with global IT standards, policies, and procedures.
job_description[15]: • Deploy and maintain systems, tools, and updates as defined by the Global IT team.
job_description[16]: • Adhere to global cybersecurity and compliance guidelines.
job_description[17]: • Support global audits, risk assessments, and remediation plans.
job_description[18]: • Localize global initiatives (e.g., translations, adapting to local regulatory requirements).
job_description[19]: 4. User Education & Communication
job_description[20]: • Educate local users about global IT systems, tools, and security practices.
job_description[21]: • Provide training during system rollouts and upgrades.
job_description[22]: • Serve as a key contact between local users and Global IT for feedback, communication, and service alignment.
job_description[23]: 5. Asset & Vendor Management
job_description[24]: • Maintain an up-to-date inventory of all IT assets, including hardware and software.
job_description[25]: • Ensure proper lifecycle management and license compliance.
job_description[26]: • Coordinate with vendors and external parties for procurement, warranty claims, and repairs as directed by Global IT.
job_description[27]: 6. Server Room & Network Management
job_description[28]: • Maintain the physical and environmental conditions of the local server room (e.g., temperature, humidity, and cleanliness).
job_description[29]: • Conduct regular inspections to ensure all hardware (servers, storage, switches) operates optimally.
job_description[30]: • Ensure proper cabling, labeling, and documentation for all server room equipment.
job_description[31]: • Manage UPS and backup power systems, testing them periodically.
job_description[32]: • Implement and maintain access control and other security measures to protect the server room.
job_description[33]: 7. Budgeting & Reporting
job_description[34]: • Support Capex & Opex budget management.
job_description[35]: • Forecast and plan IT spending for projects, upgrades, and operations.
job_description[36]: • Provide regular IT reports and budget updates to both local management and Global IT.

job_description[0]: SunCloud – là sản phẩm của đơn vị thành viên trong hệ sinh thái HITC, là nền tảng hạ tầng điện toán đám mây được phát triển “Make in Vietnam”, hướng tới mục tiêu xây dựng trung tâm dữ liệu và dịch vụ Cloud tiêu chuẩn quốc tế, đồng hành cùng doanh nghiệp trong hành trình chuyển đổi số.
job_description[1]: Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm Trưởng phòng Hệ thống – người dẫn dắt đội ngũ kỹ sư tài năng, vận hành hạ tầng ổn định – an toàn – mở rộng linh hoạt, đồng thời định hình chiến lược công nghệ dài hạn cho Sun-Cloud.
job_description[2]: NHIỆM VỤ CHÍNH
job_description[3]: Đây là vị trí quản lý then chốt, giữ vai trò kiến trúc và vận hành toàn bộ hạ tầng công nghệ của SunCloud. Bạn sẽ:
job_description[4]: - Xây dựng chiến lược vận hành, mở rộng và tối ưu hạ tầng hệ thống theo định hướng phát triển sản phẩm.
job_description[5]: - Đảm bảo độ ổn định, an toàn, hiệu suất và tối ưu chi phí cho hạ tầng hoạt động 24/7.
job_description[6]: - Định hướng, dẫn dắt và phát triển năng lực đội ngũ kỹ sư hệ thống, xây dựng tinh thần teamwork – trách nhiệm – học hỏi.
job_description[7]: - Phối hợp cùng R&D, Network, Security, Product và đối tác kỹ thuật triển khai các dự án công nghệ mới.
job_description[8]: - Đề xuất và triển khai các giải pháp nâng cấp, tự động hóa và đổi mới công nghệ phù hợp với xu hướng Cloud toàn cầu.
job_description[9]: - Tham gia trực tiếp vào việc xây dựng kiến trúc hạ tầng tổng thể cho Sun-Cloud và các dự án Data Center mở rộng trong hệ sinh thái HITC.

job_description[0]: 1. Mục tiêu công việc
job_description[1]: Tham gia phát triển và duy trì các hệ thống phần mềm phục vụ hoạt động logistics, vận tải và kho vận của Công ty. Đảm bảo hệ thống vận hành ổn định, dữ liệu chính xác và có khả năng mở rộng, tích hợp linh hoạt với các nền tảng khác.

job_description[3]: 2.1. Phân tích & Lập trình chức năng nghiệp vụ
job_description[4]: • Phát triển các module backend phục vụ nghiệp vụ logistics: booking, theo dõi lệnh, báo giá, quản lý container, vận tải, billing...

job_description[8]: 2.2. Thiết kế & Quản lý cơ sở dữ liệu (Database)
job_description[9]: • Thiết kế cấu trúc bảng, quan hệ, chỉ mục (index) tối ưu cho hiệu năng truy xuất dữ liệu.
job_description[10]: • Làm việc với PostgreSQL, MySQL hoặc SQL Server.
job_description[11]: • Viết stored procedure, trigger hỗ trợ xử lý tự động.
job_description[12]: • Quản lý migration, sao lưu (backup) và khôi phục dữ liệu khi cần thiết.
job_description[13]: 2.3. Tích hợp hệ thống & API
job_description[14]: • Kết nối và tích hợp dữ liệu giữa hệ thống nội bộ với các nền tảng SaaS như: Base, Power BI, CRM, TMS Trucking...
job_description[15]: • Xây dựng middleware / API Gateway để xử lý dữ liệu trung gian.
job_description[16]: • Phối hợp với BA kỹ thuật trong việc test API endpoint và xử lý lỗi phản hồi.
job_description[17]: 2.4. Bảo mật & Phân quyền
job_description[18]: • Thiết lập các cơ chế xác thực người dùng (JWT, OAuth2).
job_description[19]: • Triển khai hệ thống phân quyền theo vai trò: user, admin, supervisor, kế toán, vận hành.
job_description[20]: • Ghi nhận và quản lý log hoạt động (Audit Trail) phục vụ kiểm soát nội bộ.
job_description[21]: 2.5. Tối ưu hiệu năng & Bảo trì
job_description[22]: • Viết code sạch (Clean Code), có cấu trúc module rõ ràng và dễ bảo trì.
job_description[23]: • Cải thiện tốc độ xử lý API, tối ưu truy vấn và bộ nhớ.
job_description[24]: • Theo dõi log server, phân tích và xử lý lỗi định kỳ.
job_description[25]: • Sẵn sàng học hỏi và tham gia vào quá trình refactor, nâng cấp hệ thống khi cần.

job_description[0]: The Head of Data
job_description[1]: will provide strategic leadership in building the next generation of eCommerce enablement—powered by AI, automation, and data intelligence. You will lead one of the most transformative functions in the company, shaping how AI changes how we operate and make decisions. This is a rare opportunity to design and implement the data backbone of an AI-first company in Southeast Asia's fastest-growing eCommerce markets.
job_description[2]: Reporting to the Deputy Chief Executive Officer
job_description[3]: you will be responsible for:
job_description[4]: Data Strategy & Governance
job_description[5]: • Define and execute a company-wide data strategy aligned with business goals and AI ambitions.
job_description[6]: • Establish and enforce data governance policies, privacy protocols, and compliance standards that align with company’s risk appetite and strategic objectives.
job_description[7]: • Maintain a centralized Risk Library for data-related risks (e.g., cybersecurity, data loss, poor quality) and oversee regular audits.
job_description[8]: • Champion data literacy across the organization.
job_description[9]: AI, Advanced Analytics and Data Infrastructure
job_description[10]: • Oversee the design and build-out of modern data architecture (e.g., data lakes, feature stores, vector databases).
job_description[11]: • Implement scalable pipelines to collect, clean, label, and manage structured and unstructured data for AI training.
job_description[12]: • Lead transition from traditional analytics to real-time, intelligent decision systems powered by LLMs and RAGs.
job_description[13]: Model Deployment & Integration
job_description[14]: • Partner with engineering and product teams to embed AI/ML models into business workflows.
job_description[15]: • Define KPIs to measure AI/ML model performance and impact.
job_description[16]: • Own the AI roadmap, including the move to Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures.
job_description[17]: Leadership & Team Development
job_description[18]: • Build and lead a cross-functional team.
job_description[19]: • Work closely with the Head of Business Transformation, Head of IT, and business unit heads to ensure alignment and execution.
job_description[20]: • Foster a culture of experimentation, speed, and responsible AI innovation.
job_requirement[0]: To succeed in the role, you should ideally have:
job_requirement[1]: • 10+ years of experience in data, analytics, or AI/ML roles, with 5+ years in leadership roles.
job_requirement[2]: • Proven track record of driving large-scale data initiatives and deploying AI/ML models in production.
job_requirement[3]: • Strong stakeholder management, executive communication, and strategic thinking skills.
job_requirement[4]: • Deep understanding of LLMs, RAG architecture, vector databases, and data labeling frameworks.
job_requirement[5]: • Expertise in modern data stack and MLOps tools.
job_requirement[6]: • Experience in eCommerce, Social / Live Commerce and retail is an added advantage.
job_requirement[7]: • Exposure to Southeast Asia digital and data landscape is an added advantage.
job_requirement[8]: • Knowledge of compliance frameworks in Southeast Asia (Singapore/Vietnam/Thailand) is an added advantage.
job_requirement[9]: • Fluent in spoken and written English is required.
job_requirement[10]: Success Metrics (First 12–18 Months):
job_requirement[11]: • Data architecture audit and re-design completed with production pipelines deployed.
job_requirement[12]: • Deployment of first-generation LLMs embedded in at least 3 business workflows.
job_requirement[13]: • Roadmap for RAG-based systems finalized and initiated.
job_requirement[14]: • 50%+ of low-value operational decisions transitioned to AI-assisted systems.
job_requirement[15]: • Establishment of enterprise data governance council and policies.
job_requirement[16]: • 100% critical internal data sources integrated and labeled for AI training

job_description[0]: The R&D Specialist (AI) is responsible for developing and maintaining data and AI infrastructures, including data pipelines, IT systems, and AI/ML models for forecasting, image recognition, and production optimization. The role also involves collaborating with IoT teams on AIoT solutions, developing AI-powered internal applications, and leading organizational AI awareness and responsible-use initiatives.
job_description[1]: Main Responsibilities:
job_description[2]: The R&D Specialist (AI) responsibilities are to:
job_description[3]: 1. Design and develop AI/ML-based forecasting and predictive models for manufacturing operations, focusing on time series data.
job_description[4]: 2. Design and develop computer vision systems for image recognition in manufacturing processes.
job_description[5]: 3. Build, organize, and manage IT infrastructure to support the development and deployment of AI/ML systems.
job_description[6]: 4. Experienced in working with data systems (batch and streaming data), handling and organizing data sources for AI/ML.
job_description[7]: 5. Work with batch and streaming data systems, responsible for processing and organizing data pipelines to support AI/ML models.
job_description[8]: 6. Collaborate with the IoT team to design, build, and enhance integrated AIoT systems and solutions.
job_description[9]: 7. Design and develop internal applications leveraging AI technologies to enhance business processes and operational efficiency.
job_description[10]: 8. Organize and deliver training programs to raise organizational awareness of AI technologies and promote understanding of potential risks and ethical considerations in AI adoption.
job_description[11]: 9. Focus on developing practical, high-impact AI solutions that deliver immediate business value and operational efficiency.
job_description[12]: 10. Perform various other duties and activities as assigned by the manager.
job_requirement[0]: Education:
job_requirement[1]: Bachelor of Science degree in a science-based field (e.g., Data Science, Informatic Technology, Engineering.).
job_requirement[2]: Experience:
job_requirement[3]: 1-3 years of experience
address: 76 Le Lai, Ben Thanh Ward, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh City
benefits.Đào tạo: Provided according to the need of employee (related to work)
benefits.Cơ hội du lịch: Chances to travel to many sites of the company

company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thanh Toán Số Mobifone
job_description[0]: Mục tiêu:
job_description[1]: Đảm bảo toàn bộ hoạt động vận hành thanh toán diễn ra liên tục, an toàn và tối ưu thông qua việc chuẩn hóa quy trình end-to-end, quản lý kết nối đối tác, kiểm soát đối soát - bù trừ - thanh quyết toán, và tối ưu nguồn lực để nâng cao hiệu suất vận hành.
job_description[2]: RESPONSIBILITIES:
job_description[3]: 1. Chiến lược vận hành & đảm bảo hoạt động thanh toán
job_description[4]: - Chăm sóc và quản lý các thành viên kết nối (members), bao gồm hỗ trợ yêu cầu kết nối, cấu hình hệ thống và đồng hành trong quá trình đưa vào vận hành.
job_description[5]: - Tham gia xây dựng định hướng vận hành tổng thể cho toàn bộ các sản phẩm, đảm bảo luồng giao dịch liên tục, ổn định và an toàn.
job_description[6]: - Chỉ đạo và giám sát toàn bộ hoạt động đối soát, bù trừ và thanh quyết toán; đảm bảo tính chính xác, đầy đủ và tuân thủ quy định tài chính.
job_description[7]: - Định hình và chuẩn hóa kiến trúc quy trình vận hành end-to-end, bao gồm cơ chế kiểm soát nội bộ, kịch bản dự phòng và quy trình xử lý sự cố để giảm thiểu rủi ro vận hành.
job_description[8]: - Giám sát, chuẩn hóa và tối ưu hóa các quy trình vận hành để nâng cao hiệu suất, hạn chế rủi ro và đảm bảo luồng giao dịch liên tục, không gián đoạn.
job_description[9]: - Phối hợp chặt chẽ với bộ phận Kỹ thuật và Tài chính để đảm bảo hệ thống hoạt động ổn định, an toàn và đáp ứng các chuẩn SLA.
job_description[10]: - Quản lý hoạt động đào tạo và hướng dẫn nghiệp vụ cho đội ngũ vận hành: xây dựng nội dung, chuẩn hóa quy trình, giám sát triển khai và cải tiến để nâng cao năng suất và chất lượng công việc.
job_description[11]: 2. Xây dựng và phát triển tổ chức:
job_description[12]: - Phân bổ nguồn lực phù hợp cho các dự án, chương trình và hoạt động BAU; đảm bảo sử dụng nguồn lực hiệu quả, đáp ứng mục tiêu vận hành và mục tiêu kinh doanh.
job_description[13]: - Xây dựng cơ chế quản lý năng lực vận hành và đánh giá định kỳ nhằm bảo đảm đội ngũ đáp ứng nhu cầu tăng trưởng.
job_description[14]: 3. Phát triển nhân tài
job_description[15]: - Quản lý đội ngũ nhân viên trong phạm vi phụ trách, bao gồm việc phân công công việc, đào tạo, và phát triển kỹ năng cho các thành viên trong nhóm.
job_description[16]: - Xây dựng và duy trì quan hệ phối hợp hiệu quả với các phòng ban liên quan để kiểm soát rủi ro vận hành và nâng cao chất lượng dịch vụ.
job_description[17]: - Chịu trách nhiệm và quản lý hiệu quản của đội nhóm và chịu trách nhiệm việc set KPI cho cá nhân/team trong phạm vi phụ trách
job_description[18]: - Đánh giá và giám sát kết quả hoàn thành công việc cá nhân/team
job_description[19]: - Thực hiện tuyển dụng, đào tạo nhân sự mới trong phạm vi phụ trách
job_description[20]: 4. Phát triển văn hóa
job_description[21]: - Xây dựng môi trường làm việc gắn kết, hỗ trợ lẫn nhau và thúc đẩy tinh thần trách nhiệm trong toàn đội.
job_description[22]: - Huấn luyện đội ngũ, phát triển năng lực, tạo động lực và thúc đẩy tinh thần chủ động hoàn thành mục tiêu vận hành.
job_requirement[0]: Trình độ học vấn
job_requirement[1]: - Trình độ học vấn: Tốt nghiệp Đại học/ Cao đẳng chuyên ngành Quản trị Kinh doanh, Kinh tế, Tài chính hoặc các lĩnh vực liên quan. Bằng Thạc sĩ là một lợi thế.
job_requirement[2]: - Ưu tiên ứng viên có chứng chỉ/chương trình nâng cao về quản lý vận hành, quản trị rủi ro hoặc quản trị dự án.
job_requirement[3]: Kinh nghiệm:
job_requirement[4]: - Tối thiểu 10 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực thanh toán hoặc vận hành hệ thống tài chính - ngân hàng; trong đó ít nhất 5 năm ở vai trò quản lý cấp trung/cấp cao (Lead/Manager/Head).
job_requirement[5]: - Có kinh nghiệm trực tiếp quản lý vận hành các sản phẩm fintech, kinh nghiệm chỉ đạo và triển khai dự án kết nối, tích hợp dịch vụ với ngân hàng, ví điện tử, trung gian thanh toán hoặc công ty chuyển mạch.
job_requirement[6]: - Ưu tiên ứng viên từng tham gia xây dựng, mở rộng hoặc vận hành các tổ chức thanh toán, công ty fintech, ví điện tử hoặc nền tảng hạ tầng tài chính.
job_requirement[7]: Kiến thức chuyên môn
job_requirement[8]: - Am hiểu sâu về quy trình vận hành end-to-end: quy trình chuyển mạch, đối soát, bù trừ, thanh quyết toán, etc...
job_requirement[9]: - Hiểu rõ về hạ tầng kỹ thuật thanh toán (switching, host-to-host, API, gateway, ISO 8583, ISO 20022) và các mô hình vận hành giao dịch theo chuẩn ngành.
job_requirement[10]: - Nắm vững pháp lý, quy định của NHNN, chuẩn mực quốc tế về an toàn thanh toán, bảo mật và phòng chống gian lận.
job_requirement[11]: - Kiến thức về quản trị rủi ro vận hành, quản lý SLA, business continuity và kịch bản dự phòng.
job_requirement[12]: Kỹ năng
job_requirement[13]: - Tư duy hệ thống, khả năng hoạch định chiến lược và dẫn dắt các sáng kiến tối ưu hóa vận hành.
job_requirement[14]: - Năng lực phân tích vấn đề, đánh giá rủi ro và ra quyết định trong môi trường biến động và yêu cầu độ chính xác cao.
job_requirement[15]: - Kỹ năng lãnh đạo đội ngũ, quản lý hiệu suất và phát triển nhân tài.
job_requirement[16]: - Kỹ năng giao tiếp, điều phối và đàm phán mạnh mẽ; có khả năng làm việc với cấp lãnh đạo ngân hàng, tổ chức tài chính và đối tác chiến lược.
job_requirement[17]: - Thành thạo tiếng Anh trong trao đổi chuyên môn, làm việc với đối tác quốc tế và đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật.
address: Tầng 30 - Tòa tháp C5 D’Capital, 119 Trần Duy Hưng, Phường Yên Hoà, Thành phố Hà Nội, Việt Nam

job_description[0]: Role Summary
job_description[1]: The Business Intelligence & AI Analyst will serve as a strategic data partner to the CEO, using advanced analytics, AI tools, and business dashboards to evaluate performance across three fast-growing, US-based companies ranging from technical services to building materials, and heavy-duty equipment solutions.
job_description[2]: This individual will leverage AI agents and automation tools to continuously collect, analyze, and interpret data from Sales, Marketing, Operations, and Finance systems (Salesforce, NetSuite, and other platforms). The analyst will translate data into actionable insights, highlight emerging trends, identify risks, and propose strategic opportunities to accelerate company growth and profitability.
job_description[3]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[4]: 1. Business Intelligence & Reporting
job_description[5]: • Build and maintain weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual performance dashboards across all companies.
job_description[6]: • Aggregate and visualize data from CRM (Salesforce), ERP (NetSuite), and financial reports.
job_description[7]: • Produce standardized executive summaries and recommendations for leadership.
job_description[8]: • Automate data ingestion and reporting through AI agents and low-code platforms.
job_description[9]: 2. AI-Enabled Analytics
job_description[10]: • Utilize AI tools (ChatGPT, Power BI Copilot, Tableau AI, etc.) to analyze trends and predict performance.
job_description[11]: • Train and refine internal AI agents to monitor company KPIs and flag anomalies or opportunities.
job_description[12]: • Implement data models to forecast sales, cash flow, and operational efficiency.
job_description[13]: 3. Strategic Insight & Communication
job_description[14]: • Advise the Sr. Leaders on market trends, competitor positioning, and growth opportunities.
job_description[15]: • Identify operational inefficiencies, spending variances, or margin erosion early.
job_description[16]: • Prepare Monthly & quarterly “State of the Business” reports summarizing insights across all divisions.
job_description[17]: • Collaborate with Sales and Marketing leadership to measure campaign ROI and lead-to-close ratios.
job_description[18]: 4. Cross-Company Integration
job_description[19]: • Cross-3 enterprises Integration
job_description[20]: • Develop a unified reporting framework across the enterprises
job_description[21]: • Coordinate with Finance and Operations teams to ensure accurate data mapping and consistency.

job_description[0]: 1. Mục tiêu công việc
job_description[1]: Phụ trách xây dựng, quản lý và tối ưu các sản phẩm/dịch vụ ngân hàng điện tử dành cho khách hàng cá nhân, khách hàng doanh nghiệp đồng thời nâng cao trải nghiệm người dùng trên các kênh số.
job_description[2]: 2. Nhiệm vụ chính
job_description[3]: • Tham gia toàn bộ vòng đời sản phẩm: nghiên cứu nhu cầu thị trường – thiết kế giải pháp – phối hợp triển khai – vận hành – đánh giá và cải tiến.

job_description[7]: • Đảm bảo sản phẩm ra mắt đồng bộ, an toàn và mang lại trải nghiệm tối ưu cho khách hàng.

job_description[9]: • Đánh giá hiệu quả các tính năng mới, cải tiến hành trình khách hàng nhằm tạo trải nghiệm nhất quán và hiệu quả trên toàn hệ sinh thái số.

job_description[0]: *Mục đích công việc:
job_description[1]: Chuyên gia Quản trị dự án CNTT là chức danh có thể độc lập quản trị hoặc tham mưu tư vấn cho các dự án quy mô lớn và chịu trách nhiệm quản lý nhóm dự án và đánh giá tổng quan công tác quản trị dự án để triển khai các biện pháp nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả, chất lượng công tác quản trị dự án.
job_description[2]: *Nhiệm vụ chính:
job_description[3]: 1. Tham mưu, giúp việc cho Ban Lãnh đạo Khối CNTT trong mảng liên quan đến công tác:
job_description[4]: - Quản trị dự án CNTT;
job_description[5]: - Quản lý danh mục dự án;
job_description[6]: - Quản lý chương trình dự án;
job_description[7]: 2. Tổ chức xây dựng kế hoạch hoạt động và triển khai công việc theo kế hoạch của mảng Quản trị dự án CNTT;
job_description[8]: 3. Tổ chức xây dựng và triển khai các văn bản, quy định, quy trình, tài liệu, tiêu chuẩn về quản trị, quản lý công tác triển khai dự án CNTT dựa trên các phương thức phân phối như Agile, Waterfall và lai (hybrid);
job_description[9]: 4. Tổ chức xây dựng danh sách kiểm tra, mẫu, tiêu chuẩn để thực hiện dự án;
job_description[10]: 5. Tổ chức quản lý và và triển khai dự án bao gồm kế hoạch dự án, nguồn lực triển khai dự án, các công tác chuẩn bị triển khai dự án và thực thi triển khai dự án; Phối hợp các hoạt động với các thành viên dự án, phòng ban liên quan của ngân hàng, đối tác (nhà thầu chính, nhà thầu phụ) đảm bảo hoàn thành mục tiêu của dự án với kế hoạch và ngân sách đã phê duyệt.
job_description[11]: 6. Tổ chức và triển khai các hoạt động đào tạo về Quản trị dự án, quản lý dự án, kiểm toán dự án;
job_description[12]: 7. Tổ chức xây dựng kế hoạch hoạt động và triển khai công việc theo kế hoạch của mảng Quản lý dự án CNTT;
job_description[13]: 8. Tổ chức triển khai cấu hình, hướng dẫn sử dụng công cụ quản lý dự án;
job_description[14]: 9. Xây dựng kho bài học kinh nghiệm/ kho thông tin và tài sản tri thức trong quá trình triển khai các dự án.

job_description[1]: • Là người trực tiếp khảo sát, thu thập thông tin, phân tích và đặc tả theo yêu cầu của nghiệp vụ.

job_description[4]: NHIỆM VỤ CHÍNH
job_description[5]: • Tham gia triển khai các dự án, các yêu cầu phát triển sản phẩm và chỉnh sửa ứng dụng từ nghiệp vụ về việc khảo sát, thu thập thông tin về nghiệp vụ ứng dụng, phân tích và đặt tả yêu cầu.
job_description[6]: • Tham gia xây dựng các kịch bản thử nghiệm (Test Case) theo từng yêu cầu nghiệp vụ của từng phiên bản sản phẩm, dịch vụ công nghệ.

job_description[9]: • Tham gia thiết kế, xây dựng, phát triển, bảo trì các ứng dụng của ngân hàng.
job_description[10]: • Tham gia phát triển các phần mềm/ứng dụng, các dự án của ngân hàng.
job_description[11]: • Tự động hóa các quy trình nghiệp vụ bên trong nội bộ ngân hàng.
job_description[12]: • Phối hợp xây dựng kế hoạch kiểm thử, triển khai thử nghiệm và triển khai chính thức các phần mềm/ ứng dụng trên nền tảng hạ tầng công nghệ số, hỗ trợ vận hành và xử lý sự cố.
job_description[13]: • Xây dựng tài liệu người dùng của các phần mềm/ ứng dụng trong ngân hàng.
job_description[14]: • Phối hợp với các nhà cung cấp trong việc chuyển giao và tiếp nhận các hệ thống phần mềm/ ứng dụng.
job_description[15]: • Báo cáo tiến độ thực hiện công việc đã được phân công.
job_description[16]: • Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của lãnh đạo.

job_description[11]: Overview about Asia Plus Inc.
job_description[12]: Asia Plus Inc. is a Japan-based technology company established in January 2014. We provide web-based platform services for enterprises in two main areas: (1) Market Research – delivering digital insight solutions that help businesses make data-driven decisions; (2) Enterprise Communication – offering tools that enhance collaboration and engagement within organizations. Our mission is to connect people and information through technology, empowering enterprises to understand their markets and employees more effectively

job_description[0]: I. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
job_description[1]: 1. Thiết kế Key Visual & ấn phẩm cho các chiến dịch truyền thông – giáo dục
job_description[2]: • Lên ý tưởng, phát triển và triển khai Key Visual, visual system, bộ ấn phẩm chủ đạo cho các sự kiện, cuộc thi học thuật, chiến dịch truyền thông hệ thống và các chương trình giáo dục của Vinschool.
job_description[3]: • Chuyển hóa concept giáo dục, mục tiêu chương trình, insight phụ huynh – học sinh thành ý tưởng thiết kế nhất quán, dễ hiểu, giàu cảm xúc và mang tính định hướng.
job_description[4]: • Sử dụng thành thạo các Ứng dụng AI để hỗ trợ việc lên concept, mô phỏng layout, mở rộng idea … tăng tốc độ sản xuất.
job_description[5]: 2. Thiết kế hệ thống ấn phẩm tuyển sinh & marketing
job_description[6]: • Thiết kế layout quảng cáo tuyển sinh đa dạng: bài social, banner, poster, newsletter, brochure, leaflet, OOH, digital ads, video graphics… với tần suất sản xuất cao, yêu cầu chất lượng chỉn chu và đảm bảo đồng bộ nhận diện thương hiệu.
job_description[7]: • Phát triển các ấn phẩm marketing theo nhu cầu của toàn hệ thống, đảm bảo tính mạch lạc, nhất quán theo brand guideline của Vinschool.
job_description[8]: • Thiết kế các ấn phẩm và visual cho sự kiện tuyển sinh, hoạt động trải nghiệm, hội thảo, workshop tại các cơ sở.
job_description[9]: 3. Thiết kế – quản lý nhận diện thương hiệu và hình ảnh Nhà trường
job_description[10]: • Tham gia xây dựng, cập nhật và hoàn thiện bộ nhận diện thương hiệu của Vinschool.
job_description[11]: • Thiết kế hệ thống biển bảng: nội quy, pano, signage, đồ họa không gian (wayfinding), phương án trang trí tại các cơ sở trường.
job_description[12]: • Phối hợp rà soát định kỳ hệ thống biển bảng, đảm bảo tính nhất quán và tiêu chuẩn thẩm mỹ.
job_description[13]: 4. Tư vấn hình ảnh & kiểm soát chất lượng hình ảnh truyền thông
job_description[14]: • Phối hợp cùng nhà thầu và bộ phận liên quan để tư vấn storyboard, concept chụp hình, đảm bảo hình ảnh phù hợp định hướng giáo dục và thương hiệu và hiệu quả quảng cáo qua hình ảnh.
job_description[15]: • Kiểm soát chất lượng hình ảnh sử dụng trên các kênh truyền thông (in ấn, online), đảm bảo thống nhất về nhận diện và thông điệp.
job_description[16]: • Tiếp nhận feedback, chỉnh sửa nhanh – chuẩn – hiệu quả; phối hợp tốt với các phòng ban, nhà cung cấp và đội dự án.

job_description[0]: About the Program
job_description[1]: Solutions Star Camp is a 6-month intensive internship program designed to develop the next generation of Solutions Consultants at Tech Data Vietnam. Through a carefully structured curriculum combining technical knowledge, business acumen, and professional skills, selected interns will gain the exposure, confidence, and mindset required to thrive in the IT industry.
job_description[2]: At the end of the program, high-performing interns may be considered for conversion into full-time roles within the Solutions team.
job_description[3]: What You'll Learn & Do
job_description[4]: - Build a foundation in enterprise IT systems, networking and security, virtualization, cloud platforms, AI/ML fundamentals, and more — through in-person classroom sessions, labs, and project-based learning
job_description[5]: - Learn how to translate customer needs into comprehensive, end-to-end technical solutions
job_description[6]: - Gain hands-on experience in technical configuration and solution design.
job_description[7]: - Develop key consulting skills such as customer engagement, problem framing, and solution storytelling
job_description[8]: - Work on real-world business scenarios guided by experienced professionals
job_description[9]: - In addition, each intern will be paired with a one-on-one business mentor — an expert outside of the technical team — who will provide valuable insights into the operations, strategy, and ecosystem of the IT distribution industry.
job_description[10]: You’ll discover what it means to become a trusted advisor
job_description[11]: to business partners and end users — someone who bridges technology capabilities with business goals to drive impactful solutions.
job_description[12]: By the end of the internship, you will:
job_description[13]: - Gain foundational knowledge of enterprise IT systems and current technologies in the market, giving you a practical lens on how technology can be applied to solve real-world business problems
job_description[14]: - Understand the role and impact of a Solutions Consultant in the B2B tech sales cycle
job_description[15]: - Be confident in presenting solutions to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
job_description[16]: - Strengthen your ability to analyze customer requirements and propose appropriate solutions
job_description[17]: - Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including Sales, Product and Marketing. -
job_description[18]: - Be ready to step into a solutions consultant associate role in the tech industry

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Java, Spring Boot, SQL)
company_name: Công Ty Tài Chính TNHH Ngân Hàng TMCP Sài Gòn - Hà Nội (SHBFinance)
job_description[0]: • Cộng tác với các đơn vị nghiệp vụ, bao gồm kiến trúc sư phần mềm, quản lý sản phẩm, các đơn vị kinh doanh, thiết kế để phát triển các ứng dụng Java của hệ thống LOS, CRM.
job_description[1]: • Thiết kế và triển khai ứng dụng bằng ngôn ngữ Java hiệu quả và đáng tin cậy, đảm bảo hiệu suất và bảo mật.
job_description[2]: • Thực hiện đánh giá mã nguồn để duy trì chất lượng và tuân theo các tiêu chuẩn mã hóa.
job_description[3]: • Gỡ lỗi, khắc phục sự cố và giải quyết các nhược điểm và sự cố phần mềm, đảm bảo độ tin cậy của ứng dụng.
job_description[4]: • Tham gia phân tích yêu cầu và thảo luận thiết kế phần mềm để đề xuất các giải pháp sáng tạo.
job_description[5]: • Phát triển và duy trì tài liệu kỹ thuật để tham khảo và báo cáo.
job_description[6]: • Cập nhật thông tin về xu hướng công nghệ liên quan đến Java, các cách thực hành tốt nhất và tiêu chuẩn ngành.
job_description[7]: • Xác định tầm nhìn kỹ thuật cho việc phát triển phần mềm, phù hợp với mục tiêu kinh doanh và thực tiễn tốt nhất của ngành.
job_description[8]: • Cộng tác với các nhà phát triển khác để xây dựng các giải pháp phần mềm có thể mở rộng và hiệu quả.
job_description[9]: • Góp phần vào toàn bộ vòng đời phát triển phần mềm, từ khái niệm và thiết kế đến thử nghiệm, triển khai và hỗ trợ.
