job_title: Senior Clerk - IT Infrastructure, Operations & Support
job_description[0]: Job Description:
job_description[1]: • Is responsible for supporting the organization’s information security and IT risk management programs.
job_description[2]: • Involves monitoring security controls, conducting risk assessments, responding to incidents, and helping to ensure compliance with security policies, standards, and regulations.
job_description[3]: • Works closely with IT, business units, and external partners to protect the organization’s information assets and manage technology-related risks.
job_description[4]: • Is responsible for overseeing the organization’s information security and IT risk management strategy, ensuring compliance and resilience.
job_description[5]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[6]: • Monitor and analyze security events, alerts, and vulnerabilities using security tools (SIEM, IDS/IPS, endpoint protection, etc.).
job_description[7]: • Support the implementation and maintenance of IT security policies, procedures, and controls.
job_description[8]: • Conduct or assist with IT risk assessments, vulnerability assessments, and security audits.
job_description[9]: • Respond to security incidents, investigate breaches, and assist in incident reporting and root cause analysis.
job_description[10]: • Assist in user awareness training and promote security best practices across the organization.
job_description[11]: • Support compliance efforts with relevant laws, regulations, and standards (e.g., ISO 27001, NIST, etc.).
job_description[12]: • Maintain and update IT security documentation and risk registers.
job_description[13]: • Coordinate with IT and business teams to remediate identified risks and vulnerabilities.
job_description[14]: • Participate in business continuity and disaster recovery planning and testing.
job_description[15]: • Stay up to date with the latest security threats, trends, and technologies. Provide training and guidance to end-users on IT systems and best practices.
job_requirement[0]: Education & Experience:
job_requirement[1]: • Bachelor’s degree in IT, or a related field.
job_requirement[2]: • 3+ years of experience in IT security, IT risk management, or a related IT role.
job_requirement[3]: Technical Skills:
job_requirement[4]: • In-depth knowledge of cybersecurity principles, threat landscapes, and risk management frameworks.
job_requirement[5]: • Hands-on experience with security technologies (SIEM, firewalls, IDS/IPS, endpoint protection, DLP, etc.).
job_requirement[6]: • Strong understanding of IT infrastructure, cloud security, and application security.
job_requirement[7]: • Familiarity with regulatory requirements and industry standards (ISO 27001, NIST, etc.).
job_requirement[8]: • Experience with incident response, forensics, and vulnerability management.
job_requirement[9]: Soft Skills:
job_requirement[10]: • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
job_requirement[11]: • Good communication and interpersonal skills.
job_requirement[12]: • High attention to detail and accuracy.
job_requirement[13]: • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
job_requirement[14]: • Integrity and commitment to confidentiality.
job_requirement[15]: • Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies.
job_requirement[16]: • Strong documentation and reporting skills.
job_requirement[17]: • Fluent in Vietnamese and English (both oral & written);
job_requirement[18]: Certifications (Preferred):
job_requirement[19]: • Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
job_requirement[20]: • Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA)
job_requirement[21]: • ISO 27001 Foundation or similar
job_requirement[22]: • Other relevant security or risk management certifications
job_requirement[23]: Our Offer:
job_requirement[24]: • Professional working environment
job_requirement[25]: • Competitive salary
job_requirement[26]: • 13th month salary
job_requirement[27]: • Performance bonus
job_requirement[28]: • Health care insurance & accident insurance
job_requirement[29]: • 16 days annual leave

job_description[0]: Job Description:
job_description[1]: • Is responsible for overseeing the design, implementation, maintenance, and support of the organization’s IT infrastructure. This includes servers, networks, storage, cloud services, database and related systems.
job_description[2]: • Ensures high availability, security, and optimal performance of IT services, and leads a team to deliver reliable IT operations to support business objectives.
job_description[3]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[4]: • Co-lead and manage the IT infrastructure and operations team, providing direction, coaching, and performance management.
job_description[5]: • Plan, implement, and maintain IT infrastructure (servers, networks, storage, cloud platforms, etc.).
job_description[6]: • Ensure system availability, reliability, and security in accordance with business requirements and SLAs.
job_description[7]: • Oversee daily IT operations, including incident response, troubleshooting, and problem resolution.
job_description[8]: • Manage IT infrastructure projects, upgrades, and migrations.
job_description[9]: • Develop and enforce IT policies, procedures, and best practices.
job_description[10]: • Monitor and analyze system performance; recommend and implement improvements.
job_description[11]: • Manage IT assets, licenses, and inventory.
job_description[12]: • Coordinate with vendors and service providers for procurement, support, and maintenance.
job_description[13]: • Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and security standards.
job_description[14]: • Prepare and manage IT infrastructure budgets and resource planning.
job_description[15]: • Provide regular reports on infrastructure health, incidents, and projects to IT Head and Management.

job_description[0]: Supervises the Quality Validation team to allocate detailed validation work on a specific portion of a broader task assigned to experienced engineers. Duties are assigned to provide experience and familiarization with validation methods, independent thinking, and company practices and policies.
job_description[1]: ESSENTIAL DUTIES
job_description[2]: • Manages and provides guidance for the Quality Validation group development, effectiveness, adhering to organizational policies and processes and supporting overall business and corporate targets
job_description[3]: • Serves as expert and main point of contact for Validation issues within area of responsibility.
job_description[4]: • Reviews and approves relevant validation documentation as per assignment and within area of responsibility.
job_description[5]: • Influences the organization in quality objectives, prioritization and resourcing decisions as necessary.
job_description[6]: • Acts as an internal key contributor for validation initiatives aimed at improving product quality, business systems and compliance; may be the primary representative of validation group on projects.
job_description[7]: • Understands FDA (CFR 820, 211, 210 and 21 CFR 11), ISO (13845 and 14971) and other regulatory requirements and validation guidance such as GHTF 2004 and FDA Process Validation Guidance 2011, ISPE GAMP5, PDA, ICH etc...
job_description[8]: • Ensures compliance with Quality System and safe working practices.
job_description[9]: • Plans, guides, and reviews projects and or work groups under one’s control to produce the desired outcome.
job_description[10]: • Utilizes technical skills to evaluate proposed solutions, adaptations, and modifications to projects.
job_requirement[0]: Education
job_requirement[1]: • Bachelor’s degree in Science or Engineering is required
job_requirement[2]: • Master’s degree in relevant field is preferred.
job_requirement[3]: Experience
job_requirement[4]: Minimum 7 years working experience with at least 5 under a regulated environment.
job_requirement[5]: Skills
job_requirement[6]: • In-depth knowledge of U.S. and international medical device and drugs regulations and standards (21 CFR 820 & 210, 211, 11, EU MDR and ISO 13485).
job_requirement[7]: • Strong interactive skills in cross functional participation and influence, mentoring and acceptance of guidance, project management, coordination with cross functional team members, and support for subordinates, junior engineers, technicians, and management.
job_requirement[8]: • Strong analytical and logical thinking skills and key part-taking in problem-solving in collaboration with relevant functions
job_requirement[9]: • Interacts with senior level external associates on significant technical matters often requiring coordination between organizations.
job_requirement[10]: • Follows technical specification requirements and provides significant input on validation procedures
job_requirement[11]: • Solicits and accepts the ideas of others, as well as actively contributes to an environment conducive to open communication.
job_requirement[12]: • Regularly and effectively presents complex technical information/analysis, and responds to questions from technical staff members and management.
job_requirement[13]: • Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively both verbally and in writing. Good command of English language required to attend meetings with English speaking associates and to write technical documentation.
job_requirement[14]: • Knowledge and use of relevant PC software applications and skills to use them effectively.

job_description[0]: Role Overview:
job_description[1]: We are looking for an experienced Windows Desktop Software Engineer to build and maintain secure, high-quality desktop solutions. The role focuses on developing modular, maintainable applications using modern .NET technologies, while ensuring performance, security, and long-term extensibility. You will collaborate closely with project stakeholders and technical team members to deliver reliable software components.
job_description[2]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[3]: - Develop and enhance Windows-based desktop applications using C# and WPF, with a strong focus on usability and maintainability.
job_description[4]: - Build user interfaces with XAML and apply UI design principles to deliver consistent and responsive experiences.
job_description[5]: - Integrate applications with backend systems via secure communication mechanisms such as HTTPS, SSL/TLS, and message-based protocols.
job_description[6]: - Design and maintain background processes, including Windows Services, to support application functionality and deployment.
job_description[7]: - Configure and manage runtime environments, including system variables, user accounts, access rights, and permissions.
job_description[8]: - Design and implement data access layers using SQL Server, ensuring efficient queries and reliable data handling.
job_description[9]: - Work with file systems, including network-shared locations, compressed files, and related I/O operations.
job_description[10]: - Implement comprehensive exception handling and logging to provide meaningful diagnostics and user-facing feedback.
job_description[11]: - Structure code into reusable modules and well-defined components to support future system integration.
job_description[12]: - Improve diagnostic and troubleshooting tools that retrieve data from databases and allow users to validate and retry operations efficiently.
job_description[13]: - Ensure solutions comply with internal security guidelines and performance expectations while limiting unnecessary external libraries.
job_description[14]: - Collaborate with project leadership and customers to address technical challenges and support team members on complex features.
job_description[15]: - Identify and resolve issues proactively to ensure stable and high-quality deliverables.
job_requirement[0]: Required Qualifications
job_requirement[1]: - Extensive hands-on experience in .NET (C#) and WPF development for Windows desktop applications (approximately 4+ years).
job_requirement[2]: - Strong foundation in object-oriented design principles and software engineering best practices.
job_requirement[3]: - Practical experience integrating applications with backend services using SOAP and REST APIs.
job_requirement[4]: - Proven ability to build rich UI components using WPF, XAML, and related design tools.
job_requirement[5]: - Solid understanding of MVVM architecture and experience connecting middleware components to UI layers.
job_requirement[6]: - Advanced experience with WPF features such as data binding, styles, templates, converters, and layout containers.
job_requirement[7]: - Experience using ADO.NET, Entity Framework, and LINQ to interact with SQL Server databases.
job_requirement[8]: - Ability to create technical design documentation and UML-style diagrams prior to implementation.
job_requirement[9]: - Experience writing unit tests using Microsoft testing frameworks.
job_requirement[10]: - Familiarity with source control systems such as Git or similar enterprise tools.
job_requirement[11]: - Hands-on knowledge of Windows Services, messaging or service bus concepts, and basic network configuration.
job_requirement[12]: - Strong skills in SQL Server, including database structure and query optimization.
job_requirement[13]: - Understanding of secure data exchange and communication standards (e.g., TLS, HTTP-based protocols, messaging).
job_requirement[14]: - Ability to produce clean, readable, and maintainable code with proper error handling and modular structure.
job_requirement[15]: - Experience working with Windows security concepts, file permissions, shared paths, and compressed file processing.
job_requirement[16]: - Proficiency in English for technical communication, documentation, and collaboration.
job_requirement[17]: Preferred Attributes
job_requirement[18]: - Willingness and ability to learn new technologies and adjust to evolving project requirements.
job_requirement[19]: - Strong analytical mindset with attention to detail.
job_requirement[20]: - Good organizational, prioritization, and problem-solving skills.
job_requirement[21]: - Experience working within Agile or iterative development frameworks.
job_requirement[22]: - Basic understanding of mobile application concepts is an advantage.
address: Hanoi / HCMC

job_description[1]: TT về FFSHOP GAMING:
job_description[2]: Tiên phong trong lĩnh vực cung cấp dịch vụ và giải pháp RMT cho các tựa game online hot nhất trên thị trường quốc tế. Tại FFShop Gaming, công nghệ không chỉ là công cụ, mà là đòn bẩy để tối ưu hóa lợi nhuận kinh doanh. Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm một "thuyền trưởng" cho khối Phát triển, người có tư duy sắc bén về thị trường game và khả năng hiện thực hóa nó bằng công nghệ.

job_description[4]: Báo cáo trực tiếp cho CEO và chịu trách nhiệm điều phối, quản lý 2 team cốt lõi: Team Product và Team Technology.

job_description[0]: Introduction
job_description[1]: Are you looking to be more than just an ordinary Data Analyst? Do you have what it takes to see where you can improve the lives of others through making great mobile and web products to solve issues and improve life? Do you want your products to be used by millions of users in the world and know immediately how much they love your work?
job_description[2]: As the Data Analyst, you will build useful and disruptive products, design and develop company applications, and coordinate a Data development team to deliver quality software technologies and systems. You will develop cross-domain and cross-functional knowledge about logistics business, products, and operations through working with vast volumes of data. You will provide technical input to product teams and stakeholders to help make business and product decisions and be part of creating great technology products. This is a challenging but rewarding opportunity that will increase your experience in a fast-moving product startup company. Join us to disrupt the logistic industry with your skills, abilities, and passion for technologies.
job_description[3]: Responsibilities
job_description[4]: Manage master data, including creation, updates, and deletion
job_description[5]: Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide important ongoing reports about customer behavior, usage patterns, and other business metrics
job_description[6]: Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and ways we can creatively experiment with our platform.
job_description[7]: Identify patterns and trends in data sets. Work with the data team to identify and revise report requirements and evolve key performance metrics
job_description[8]: Provide quality assurance, assess the effectiveness and accuracy of data tables in our Data Warehouse
job_description[9]: Work with other members to implement, integrate and optimize our existing systems
job_description[10]: Serve as an advocate of our data-driven culture.
job_requirement[0]: Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or Statistics
job_requirement[1]: At least 1-year experience in Data Analyst or Business Analyst
job_requirement[2]: At least 1-year experience with BI tools such as Google Studio, Power BI, etc.
job_requirement[3]: Have more than 1-year experience in scripting with PostgreSQL, Big Query, Python is plus
job_requirement[4]: Strong verbal and written communication skills (English)
job_requirement[5]: Having strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
job_requirement[6]: Possess logical thinking, detail-oriented, strong organizational skills, ability to multi-task with different departments and work independently under tight deadlines
job_requirement[7]: Demonstrate competency in handling large data set and relational databases
job_requirement[8]: Willingness to learn new things and solving problems using cutting edge technology
job_requirement[9]: Understanding of ETL framework and ETL tools is plus
job_requirement[10]: Experience in working with the distributed system is a huge plus
job_requirement[11]: Experience with Google Analytics, Appsflyer is a great advance.
address: 1/12 Hoàng Việt, Phường 4, Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam

benefits.Nghỉ phép có lương: 15 Days Paid Annual Leave

job_description[0]: Key Purpose of the Job:
job_description[1]: The Technical Product Specialist acts as the expert link between daily operations and platform governance, working closely with users, Country IT teams, and the Technical Product Lead to provide specialized technical support and platform governance for CRM and business applications across multiple countries. This role ensures stable operations, accurate configurations, secure access, high-quality support, and controlled change implementation following defined standards.
job_description[2]: Job description:
job_description[3]: 1. Service Support
job_description[4]: 1.1. Incident Management
job_description[5]: · Troubleshoot and resolve incidents requiring Specialist-level knowledge such as workflow failures, automation errors, permission misalignments, pipeline discrepancies, and data-sync issues.
job_description[6]: · Perform structured root-cause analysis (RCA), validate findings, and implement corrective actions.
job_description[7]: · Prepare and deliver complete incident evidence and impact analysis for Tier 3 escalation.
job_description[8]: · Support Country IT and user communication to ensure proper incident awareness and guidance.
job_description[9]: 1.2. Request Fulfillment
job_description[10]: · Execute approved configuration updates (fields, objects, workflows, templates, dashboards).
job_description[11]: · Manage user roles and permissions following RBAC standards and approval workflows.
job_description[12]: · Perform data corrections (duplicate merging, standardization, invalid records cleanup).
job_description[13]: · Provide advisory and training to end-users on new features, processes, and best practices.
job_description[14]: 1.3. Problems Management
job_description[15]: · Track recurring issues and perform initial analysis to identify patterns.
job_description[16]: · Provide input and evidence for deeper root-cause investigations led by Tier 3/Lead.
job_description[17]: · Execute corrective actions and improvements as defined by the Technical Product Lead.
job_description[18]: · Maintain the problem register and ensure proper closure of assigned problem records.
job_description[19]: 2. Service Delivery
job_description[20]: 2.1. Configuration & Asset Management
job_description[21]: · Maintain accurate system configuration aligned with organizational standards.
job_description[22]: · Update and document configuration items (CI): workflows, automation logic, user roles, integration endpoints.
job_description[23]: · Perform regular workflow/automation health checks, quota monitoring, and data validation scans.
job_description[24]: · Ensure all configuration changes follow naming conventions, field governance, and approved templates
job_description[25]: 2.2. Change Management
job_description[26]: · Prepare change documentation: impact assessment, UAT evidence, and rollback considerations.
job_description[27]: · Execute configuration changes approved by the Technical Product Lead or CAB.
job_description[28]: · Conduct UAT and regression testing, ensuring test results meet audit expectations.
job_description[29]: · Contribute to release notes and support post-release verification.
job_description[30]: 3. IT Security Management
job_description[31]: · Enforce RBAC policies by ensuring correct access provisioning, role alignment, and segregation-of-duties (SoD) adherence.
job_description[32]: · Support regular access reviews and identify access anomalies or policy violations.
job_description[33]: · Ensure that all access-related actions and configuration updates are fully logged and traceable for audits.
job_description[34]: · Support implementation of platform-level security controls and compliance tasks.
job_description[36]: · Maintain and update operational SOPs, configuration documents, and user-facing guides.
job_description[37]: · Create troubleshooting documentation and contribute to the Known Issues repository.
job_description[38]: · Share insights and operational learnings to drive platform improvement and training materials.
job_description[39]: · Propose enhancements to workflows, automation logic, or processes based on operational experience.
job_requirement[0]: Required Competencies
job_requirement[1]: Business Competencies:
job_requirement[2]: · Strong understanding of Sales, Marketing, and Customer Service workflows.
job_requirement[3]: · Ability to translate business needs into configuration logic and system actions.
job_requirement[4]: · Clear and structured communication with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
job_requirement[5]: Technical Competencies:
job_requirement[6]: · Advanced CRM administration (workflows, pipelines, roles, automation logic).
job_requirement[7]: · Solid analytical and troubleshooting skills for mid-complexity incidents.
job_requirement[8]: · Working knowledge of API/webhook behavior and integration points.
job_requirement[9]: · Strong understanding of RBAC and application-level security principles.
job_requirement[10]: Behavioral Competencies
job_requirement[11]: · Detail-oriented, structured, and disciplined in execution.
job_requirement[12]: · Proactive in identifying problems and proposing improvements.
job_requirement[13]: · Ability to collaborate effectively across countries.
job_requirement[14]: Required Professional Qualification
job_requirement[15]: Technical Domain:
job_requirement[16]: · CRM Advanced Administration
job_requirement[17]: · Workflow & Automation Logic
job_requirement[18]: · RBAC & Application Security
job_requirement[19]: · API/Webhook Basic troubleshooting
job_requirement[20]: · Configuration Governance
job_requirement[21]: · Change Execution & Test Documentation
job_requirement[22]: · Data Quality & Validation Standards
job_requirement[23]: Technical Stack:
job_requirement[24]: · CRM: HubSpot / Salesforce (advanced admin)
job_requirement[25]: · Identity: Entra ID (RBAC provisioning, audit logs)
job_requirement[26]: · Integrations: Postman (API testing), webhook logs, iPaaS (Power Automate, Make/Zapier)
job_requirement[27]: · Governance Tools: Jira Service Management (change workflow), Confluence (configuration & standards documentation)
job_requirement[28]: · Monitoring: APM dashboards, quota & automation logs
job_requirement[29]: · Documentation: Miro/Visio, SharePoint
address: 21 Le Quy Don St., Dist. 3, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

job_title: Chuyên Gia Mạng Và Kết Nối (Networking Expert)
company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Công Nghiệp Bưu Chính Viễn Thông - VNPT Technology
job_description[0]: MỤC ĐÍCH CÔNG VIỆC
job_description[1]: Chuyên gia Mạng & Kết nối chịu trách nhiệm dẫn dắt nghiên cứu và phát triển các công nghệ mạng tiên tiến như XGS-PON, 5G, và Wi-Fi 7 cho các thiết bị mạng thông minh tại biên (Edge AI). Vị trí này đảm bảo việc tích hợp phần mềm mạng, tối ưu hiệu năng và độ trễ thấp, cũng như bảo mật đường truyền cho các dịch vụ AI. Đồng thời đóng vai trò điều phối giữa các nhóm phát triển mạng, AI, và hệ điều hành nhằm đảm bảo tính đồng bộ, hiệu quả và tuân thủ lộ trình sản phẩm.
job_description[2]: TRÁCH NHIỆM CÔNG VIỆC CHÍNH
job_description[3]: • Dẫn dắt nghiên cứu và phát triển các công nghệ XGS-PON, 5G và Wi-Fi 7 cho thiết bị Edge AI và các nền tảng mạng thông minh.
job_description[4]: • Quản lý tích hợp phần mềm mạng (network stack) và tối ưu hóa hiệu năng truyền dẫn.
job_description[5]: • Đảm bảo khả năng kết nối độ trễ thấp và bảo mật cao cho các dịch vụ AI, IoT và Cloud Edge.
job_description[6]: • Phối hợp với nhóm AI và OS để đảm bảo sự tương thích trong triển khai ngăn xếp mạng.
job_description[7]: • Hỗ trợ kiểm thử thực tế (field validation), thu thập phản hồi và đề xuất cải tiến thiết kế.
job_description[8]: • Điều phối hoạt động của các nhóm mạng con (networking sub-teams), thống nhất hướng phát triển kỹ thuật theo lộ trình sản phẩm.
job_description[9]: • Phân tích, đánh giá công nghệ mới trong lĩnh vực mạng, đề xuất chiến lược tích hợp phù hợp cho sản phẩm VQEC.
job_description[10]: • Hỗ trợ xây dựng và chuẩn hóa kiến trúc mạng trong các sản phẩm VNPT Technology.
job_requirement[0]: YÊU CẦU
job_requirement[1]: 1. Trình độ học
job_requirement[2]: • Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Điện tử Viễn thông, CNTT, hoặc Tự động hóa.
job_requirement[3]: 2. Chứng chỉ
job_requirement[4]: • Ưu tiên có chứng chỉ chuyên sâu về Networking (CCNP/CCIE, Wireless, hoặc PON).
job_requirement[5]: 3. Kinh nghiệm
job_requirement[6]: • Tối thiểu 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong phát triển phần mềm mạng hoặc tối ưu hiệu năng mạng, 2 năm ở vị trí chuyên gia.
job_requirement[7]: 4. Kiến thức
job_requirement[8]: • Am hiểu giao thức mạng (TCP/IP, VLAN, QoS, PON, 5G NR, Wi-Fi 7), bảo mật và các kỹ thuật tối ưu hiệu năng.
job_requirement[9]: 5. Tin học
job_requirement[10]: • Thành thạo công cụ đo kiểm mạng (Wireshark, iPerf, Spirent), môi trường Linux/Embedded và hệ thống ảo hóa.
job_requirement[11]: 6. Ngoại ngữ
job_requirement[12]: • Sử dụng tiếng Anh thành thạo trong giao tiếp và làm việc với đối tác quốc tế.
job_requirement[13]: 7. Kỹ năng khác
job_requirement[14]: • Kỹ năng chuyên sâu về mạng truyền thông:
job_requirement[15]: - Nắm vững kiến thức và triển khai thực tế các công nghệ XGS-PON, Wi-Fi 6/7, 5G, Ethernet.
job_requirement[16]: - Tư duy tối ưu hóa ngăn xếp giao thức mạng (network stack) cho thiết bị nhúng có giới hạn tài nguyên.
job_requirement[17]: • Kỹ năng tích hợp hệ thống và kiểm thử hiện trường:
job_requirement[18]: - Kết hợp với nhóm phần mềm và phần cứng để tích hợp hệ thống mạng toàn diện.
job_requirement[19]: - Thành thạo kiểm thử hiện trường (field validation), đánh giá hiệu năng thực tế và phân tích phản hồi khách hàng.
job_requirement[20]: • Kỹ năng thiết kế kiến trúc mạng sản phẩm:
job_requirement[21]: - Định nghĩa kiến trúc kết nối cho các dòng sản phẩm AI Gateway, ONT, Wi-Fi AI Router.
job_requirement[22]: - Khả năng xây dựng tài liệu kỹ thuật, sơ đồ hệ thống và tiêu chuẩn hóa kết nối theo lộ trình sản phẩm.
job_requirement[23]: • Kỹ năng lãnh đạo kỹ thuật và phối hợp nhóm:
job_requirement[24]: - Điều phối hoạt động giữa các nhóm mạng, hệ điều hành và AI để đảm bảo hiệu quả hệ thống.
job_requirement[25]: - Hướng dẫn kỹ sư trẻ, đánh giá hiệu quả nhóm kỹ thuật, xây dựng năng lực kế thừa.
job_requirement[26]: • Kỹ năng phân tích xu hướng và hoạch định chiến lược:
job_requirement[27]: - Theo dõi các xu hướng mạng tiên tiến, đề xuất công nghệ phù hợp với định hướng sản phẩm.
job_requirement[28]: - Lập kế hoạch nâng cấp và mở rộng hệ thống kết nối dài hạn cho các nền tảng VQEC.
job_requirement[29]: 8. Thái độ/tố chất
job_requirement[30]: • Chủ động, hợp tác, tinh thần học hỏi cao và kiên trì với mục tiêu kỹ thuật.
job_requirement[32]: • Có kinh nghiệm thực tế với chipset Qualcomm hoặc Broadcom là một lợi thế.
address: Số 124 Hoàng Quốc Việt, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội

company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Công Nghiệp Bưu Chính Viễn Thông - VNPT Technology
job_description[0]: MỤC ĐÍCH CÔNG VIỆC
job_description[1]: Chuyên gia Edge-AI chịu trách nhiệm nghiên cứu, phát triển, tối ưu và triển khai các mô hình AI trên thiết bị nhúng (on-device inference) sử dụng phần cứng chuyên dụng như NPU/DSP. Vị trí đóng vai trò dẫn dắt kỹ thuật, xây dựng pipeline AI cho các bài toán thị giác máy tính, xử lý tiếng nói, AI tạo sinh và tích hợp vào sản phẩm thương mại như AI Box, AI Gateway, Wi-Fi AI Router, Camera AI.
job_description[2]: TRÁCH NHIỆM CÔNG VIỆC CHÍNH
job_description[3]: • Phát triển và tối ưu mô hình AI: Dẫn dắt nhóm kỹ thuật tối ưu mô hình AI (quantization, pruning, compression) cho inference thời gian thực trên phần cứng NPU/DSP.
job_description[4]: • Xây dựng pipeline AI tại biên: Thiết kế và triển khai các pipeline AI nhúng phục vụ use case như phát hiện khuôn mặt, phân tích hành vi, nhận diện giọng nói, xử lý dữ liệu hình ảnh và âm thanh.
job_description[5]: • Tích hợp AI vào sản phẩm: Làm việc chặt chẽ với nhóm hệ điều hành, phần mềm ứng dụng để hiện thực hóa các tính năng AI thành sản phẩm thương mại.
job_description[6]: • Làm việc với đối tác công nghệ: Phối hợp với Qualcomm và các đối tác để triển khai công cụ SNPE, AIMET, hỗ trợ kiểm thử và đánh giá hiệu năng mô hình trên chip.
job_description[7]: • Cố vấn kỹ thuật & đào tạo nội bộ: Mentor kỹ sư AI trẻ, hỗ trợ xây dựng năng lực đội ngũ về AI nhúng, cập nhật xu hướng AI phần cứng.
job_description[8]: • Xây dựng roadmap công nghệ AI: Định hướng phát triển AI trong trung và dài hạn, theo kịp xu hướng AI at the Edge.
job_requirement[0]: YÊU CẦU
job_requirement[1]: 1. Trình độ học
job_requirement[2]: • Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Khoa học máy tính, AI, Hệ thống nhúng, Điện tử - Viễn thông.
job_requirement[3]: • Ưu tiên ứng viên có bằng Thạc sĩ/ Tiến sĩ các lĩnh vực liên quan.
job_requirement[4]: 2. Chứng chỉ
job_requirement[5]: • Ưu tiên có chứng chỉ trong các lĩnh vực: Machine Learning, Embedded AI, Qualcomm AI Stack (SNPE, AIMET).
job_requirement[6]: 3. Kinh nghiệm
job_requirement[7]: • Tối thiểu 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phát triển AI, trong đó có ít nhất 2 năm về AI nhúng/AI trên thiết bị.
job_requirement[8]: • Có kinh nghiệm triển khai AI vào sản phẩm thực tế (AI camera, thiết bị IoT, AI Gateway...).
job_requirement[9]: 4. Kiến thức
job_requirement[10]: • Hiểu biết sâu về mô hình học sâu (CNN, Transformer), kỹ thuật tối ưu hóa mô hình (quantization, pruning).
job_requirement[11]: • Thành thạo công cụ: SNPE, AIMET, TensorRT, TFLite, ONNX Runtime, TVM.
job_requirement[12]: • Có kinh nghiệm tích hợp AI vào hệ điều hành Linux/Android/RTOS.
job_requirement[13]: • Nắm rõ kiến trúc phần cứng hỗ trợ AI: NPU, DSP, SoC Qualcomm/NXP/Amlogic.
job_requirement[14]: • Hiểu về AI pipeline và đánh giá hiệu năng, latency, power-aware AI.
job_requirement[15]: 5. Tin học
job_requirement[16]: • Sử dụng thành thạo Python, C++, Git.
job_requirement[17]: • Thành thạo các công cụ quản lý mã nguồn và pipeline AI: MLflow, DVC, Notion, Jira.
job_requirement[18]: 6. Ngoại ngữ
job_requirement[19]: • Thành thạo tiếng Anh chuyên ngành kỹ thuật (đọc hiểu tài liệu, trao đổi kỹ thuật với chuyên gia quốc tế).
job_requirement[20]: 7. Kỹ năng khác
job_requirement[21]: • Kỹ năng chuyên sâu về AI tại biên:
job_requirement[22]: - Tư duy tối ưu hóa mô hình cho thiết bị giới hạn tài nguyên (AIoT).
job_requirement[23]: - Hiểu mối liên hệ giữa phần mềm – phần cứng trong triển khai inference hiệu quả.
job_requirement[24]: • Kỹ năng tích hợp sản phẩm:
job_requirement[25]: - Phối hợp nhóm đa lĩnh vực: hệ điều hành, phần mềm, phần cứng, QA.
job_requirement[26]: - Thực hiện kiểm thử, benchmark mô hình AI trên nền tảng sản phẩm cụ thể.
job_requirement[27]: • Kỹ năng mentor và đào tạo:
job_requirement[28]: - Khả năng hướng dẫn nhóm kỹ sư trẻ, xây dựng tài liệu kỹ thuật, chia sẻ kinh nghiệm.
job_requirement[29]: - Góp phần hình thành đội ngũ AI nội bộ vững mạnh.
job_requirement[30]: • Kỹ năng phân tích và chiến lược:
job_requirement[31]: - Phân tích xu hướng công nghệ AI tại biên (RISC-V AI, TinyML, Generative Edge AI).
job_requirement[32]: - Đề xuất roadmap công nghệ phù hợp định hướng sản phẩm của công ty.
job_requirement[33]: • Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm và giao tiếp:
job_requirement[34]: - Có khả năng trình bày, bảo vệ giải pháp kỹ thuật trước lãnh đạo và đối tác.
job_requirement[35]: - Giao tiếp hiệu quả với đối tác quốc tế (Qualcomm, nhà cung cấp AI IP...).
job_requirement[37]: • Tư duy cầu tiến, đổi mới sáng tạo, chủ động học hỏi.
job_requirement[38]: • Cam kết chất lượng kỹ thuật cao, tinh thần trách nhiệm với sản phẩm.
job_requirement[39]: • Có đam mê AI và mong muốn phát triển sản phẩm đột phá mang thương hiệu Việt.
job_requirement[41]: • Sẵn sàng tham gia đào tạo trong nước hoặc công tác ngắn hạn nước ngoài nếu cần.

job_description[0]: What you’ll do

job_description[0]: Digital Transformation Consultant
job_description[1]: is primarily responsible for consulting on product solutions and project scoping, ensuring alignment (fit) between the Business Problem, the Product Solution, and GEEK UP's Expertise Scope.
job_description[2]: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
job_description[3]: 1. Business Consulting
job_description[4]: • Conduct discovery sessions with business stakeholders to gain a profound understanding of their business model, concepts, and operations.
job_description[5]: • Conduct business research on the market and various concepts, and capture clients' insights to debrief their demands.
job_description[6]: 2. Product Discovery
job_description[7]: • Research suitable product solutions, strategies, and concepts, and then map the solutions that align with the client's business needs.
job_description[8]: • Propose and consult business partners about GEEK UP's product solutions.
job_description[9]: • Align and agree with the client on the strategy and direction of the product solution.
job_description[10]: 3. Product Definition
job_description[11]: • Define and align the boundaries of the Product Scope and Expertise Scope boundary.
job_description[12]: • Collaborate with the Product Delivery team to finalize the product proposal.
job_requirement[0]: • Have
job_requirement[1]: 5 years
job_requirement[2]: of experience as a Business/Digital Consultant, Product Manager, Product Designer, or relevant roles.
job_requirement[3]: • Possess solid knowledge of the Business Model or Product Concept.
job_requirement[4]: • Have hands-on experience in proposing solutions or consulting businesses.
job_requirement[5]: • Possess an unwavering passion and sharp curiosity for researching and crafting product solutions across diverse domains. You must be motivated to drive impactful product decisions that directly solve complex business challenges and align with ambitious business goals.
job_requirement[6]: • Exceptional Client & Stakeholder Partnership Management: Ability to navigate and align expectations across diverse stakeholders, including internal product teams and external client leadership, fully embracing GEEK Up’s Co-Creation Partnership Model (CC Model).
job_requirement[7]: • Strong Critical Thinking and problem-solving skills to adjust expectations, drive consensus among stakeholders, and ensure the fit of the product solution and project scope.

job_title: Nhân Viên Công Nghệ Thông Tin
company_name: Công ty CP Đầu tư công nghệ và giải pháp TFS
job_description[0]: 1. Thiết Lập Hệ Thống (Setup & Deployment)
job_description[1]: - Triển khai Hệ điều hành: Cài đặt, cấu hình và tối ưu hóa các HĐH server (Windows Server, Linux
job_description[2]: các bản phân phối như Ubuntu, CentOS, RedHat).
job_description[3]: - Cấu hình Dịch vụ Mạng:
job_description[4]: Thiết lập và quản lý các dịch vụ như DNS, DHCP, Firewall, Proxy, VPN để đảm bảo kết nối mạng ổn định và an toàn.
job_description[5]: - Triển khai Hạ tầng Ảo hóa & Đám mây:
job_description[6]: + Ảo hóa:
job_description[7]: Sử dụng VMware vSphere, Hyper-V, Proxmox để tạo và quản lý các máy ảo.
job_description[8]: + Cloud:
job_description[9]: Triển khai hạ tầng trên các nền tảng đám mây như AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Công việc bao gồm tạo VPC (mạng ảo), EC2/Virtual Machines (máy chủ ảo), Load Balancer,...
job_description[10]: - Triển khai Ứng dụng:
job_description[11]: Cài đặt và cấu hình các phần mềm, ứng dụng cần thiết lên server (ví dụ: Web Server - Nginx/Apache, Cơ sở dữ liệu - MySQL/PostgreSQL, Ứng dụng Java/Python/.NET).
job_description[12]: - Tự động hóa Triển khai: Sử dụng các công cụ như Ansible, Puppet, Chef
job_description[13]: để tự động hóa việc cài đặt và cấu hình hàng loạt server, đảm bảo tính đồng nhất và tiết kiệm thời gian.
job_description[14]: 2. Giám sát & Bảo Trì Định Kỳ (Monitoring & Maintenance)
job_description[15]: - Giám sát Hệ thống:
job_description[16]: + Thiết lập các công cụ giám sát (như Zabbix, Nagios, Prometheus + Grafana, Datadog
job_description[17]: ) để theo dõi theo thời gian thực:
job_description[18]: - Tài nguyên phần cứng:
job_description[19]: CPU, RAM, Disk I/O, Network Traffic.
job_description[20]: - Tình trạng dịch vụ:
job_description[21]: Web server, database có đang chạy không?
job_description[22]: - Hiệu năng ứng dụng:
job_description[23]: Thời gian phản hồi (response time), tỷ lệ lỗi.
job_description[24]: + Thiết lập cảnh báo (alert) qua email, SMS, Slack khi có sự cố xảy ra.
job_description[25]: - Quản lý Sao lưu và Phục hồi (Backup & Recovery):
job_description[26]: + Lập lịch sao lưu tự động:
job_description[27]: Định kỳ sao lưu dữ liệu, cấu hình hệ thống và ứng dụng.
job_description[28]: + Kiểm tra tính toàn vẹn của bản sao lưu:
job_description[29]: Định kỳ thử phục hồi từ bản sao lưu để đảm bảo nó hoạt động khi cần.
job_description[30]: + Có kế hoạch dự phòng (Disaster Recovery Plan):
job_description[31]: Xác định RTO (Thời gian phục hồi mục tiêu) và RPO (Điểm phục hồi mục tiêu).
job_description[32]: - Quản lý Người dùng và Quyền:
job_description[33]: + Tạo, xóa, phân quyền truy cập cho người dùng và nhóm người dùng.
job_description[34]: + Áp dụng nguyên tắc đặc quyền tối thiểu (principle of least privilege).
job_description[35]: - Cập nhật & Quản lý Bản vá:
job_description[36]: + Định kỳ cập nhật các bản vá bảo mật và bản cập nhật phần mềm cho HĐH và ứng dụng.
job_description[37]: + Cần có quy trình thử nghiệm trước khi áp dụng lên môi trường production để tránh gây gián đoạn.
job_description[38]: 3. Xử Lý Sự Cố & Tối Ưu Hóa (Troubleshooting & Optimization)
job_description[40]: Khi hệ thống gặp vấn đề (chậm, treo, mất kết nối), kỹ sư cần:
job_description[41]: + Phân tích log hệ thống, log ứng dụng.
job_description[42]: + Sử dụng các lệnh để chẩn đoán (trên Linux: top, htop, iostat, netstat, ssh, grep...).
job_description[43]: + Phối hợp với các team phát triển để tìm ra nguyên nhân gốc rễ (root cause).
job_description[45]: + Điều chỉnh cấu hình hệ điều hành, cơ sở dữ liệu và ứng dụng để khai thác tối đa hiệu suất.
job_description[46]: + Phân tích nút thắt cổ chai (bottleneck) và đề xuất nâng cấp phần cứng/nền tảng nếu cần.

job_title: Trưởng nhóm Phân tích Dữ liệu BI Analysis Leader
job_description[0]: MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
job_description[1]: 1. Mục tiêu công việc:
job_description[2]: • Ứng dụng phân tích: Chuyển đổi nhu cầu kinh doanh thành giải pháp dữ liệu, triển khai phân tích và theo dõi hiệu quả.
job_description[3]: • Chiến lược & phối hợp: Xây dựng và phát triển chính sách và lộ trình phân tích dữ liệu; Đảm bảo phù hợp chiến lược số hóa, quản lý đối tác, đào tạo và thúc đẩy văn hóa dữ liệu.

job_description[5]: • Xây dựng và phát triển chính sách và lộ trình phân tích dữ liệu đảm bảo giải quyết hiệu quả các vấn đề trong kinh doanh của tập đoàn và các CTTV.

job_description[7]: • Nhận diện các vấn đề tiềm năng trong kinh doanh có thể giải quyết được bằng ứng dụng phân tích dữ liệu từ cơ bản đến nâng cao.
job_description[8]: • Ứng dụng toán thống kê, toán ứng dụng dựa trên các nghiên cứu khoa học để giải quyết các vấn đề kinh doanh.
job_description[9]: • Chịu trách nhiệm triển khai và trình bày kết quả với các đơn vị kinh doanh/công ty thành viên, đảm bảo tính hiệu quả của việc ứng dụng phân tích dữ liệu.
job_description[10]: • Phân tích và trực quan hóa dữ liệu: Xây dựng báo cáo, dashboard giúp cung cấp insight hữu ích cho các bộ phận kinh doanh.
job_description[11]: • Xây dựng mô hình dữ liệu: Thiết kế, tối ưu hóa mô hình dữ liệu nhằm hỗ trợ phân tích hiệu quả.
job_description[12]: • Xây dựng và theo dõi các KPIs/OKRs của việc ứng dụng kết quả phân tích dữ liệu trong kinh doanh và lập kế hoạch cải thiện nếu cần.
job_description[13]: 3. Định hướng chiến lược & Phối hợp các bên liên quan:
job_description[14]: • Hợp tác với lãnh đạo cấp cao và các bên liên quan để đảm bảo các sáng kiến data platform phù hợp với chiến lược chuyển đổi số và mục tiêu kinh doanh.
job_description[15]: • Lãnh đạo đội ngũ BI Analyst: Hướng dẫn, đào tạo và quản lý đội ngũ để đảm bảo chất lượng phân tích dữ liệu.
job_description[16]: • Làm việc với các bên liên quan để cân bằng giữa mục tiêu ngắn hạn và chiến lược dài hạn.
job_description[17]: • Đồng hành cùng các bên liên quan để xác định nhu cầu và yêu cầu hệ thống tối ưu.
job_description[18]: • Đào tạo các bên non-techincal về công nghệ BI và phương pháp phân tích dữ liệu nhằm thúc đẩy văn hóa ra quyết định dựa trên dữ liệu.
job_description[19]: 4. Các bên liên quan:
job_description[20]: • Báo cáo trực tiếp: Giám đốc Ban Công nghệ thông tin
job_description[21]: • Các bên liên quan nội bộ: Các đơn vị CNTT và các phòng ban kinh doanh liên quan trong toàn bộ hệ thống công ty thành viên.
job_description[22]: • Các bên liên quan bên ngoài: Đối tác chiến lược, bên cung cấp giải pháp và các vendors.

job_title: Senior AI Engineer / Data Scientist (Machine Learning/python)
company_name: Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited
job_description[0]: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced
job_description[1]: Senior AI Engineer / Data Scientist
job_description[2]: to join our dynamic group. In this pivotal role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing
job_description[3]: cutting-edge (Generative) AI solutions leveraging Python, Machine Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs), and classical Natural Language Processing (NLP) methodologies.
job_description[4]: You will collaborate closely with two expert teams to analyze large datasets, build robust models, and create innovative solutions. Additionally, you will play a key role in guiding junior colleagues and may take on topic leadership for specific areas.
job_description[5]: This position demands a high degree of adaptability and willingness to contribute to both short-term, agile projects and longer-term strategic developments, such as an in-house developed chat system. Your contribution will be crucial in ensuring we always have up-to-date and demonstrable solutions readily available for pre-sales activities and rapid prototyping.
job_description[6]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[7]: • Design & Development:
job_description[8]: Design, develop, and implement advanced machine learning algorithms, models, and LLM-based pipelines.
job_description[9]: • Data Analysis & Insights:
job_description[10]: Analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights and patterns.
job_description[11]: • Software Engineering:
job_description[12]: Write production-quality code in Python, adhering to standard software engineering best practices (Git, testing, etc.). A strong focus will be on backend development using FastAPI and leveraging Azure SDKs. Support basic front-end development tasks.
job_description[13]: • Collaboration & Problem Solving:
job_description[14]: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to identify, understand, and solve complex business problems.
job_description[15]: • Technology Adoption:
job_description[16]: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI, GenAI, and data science, actively integrating new technologies where beneficial.
job_description[17]: • Integration & Deployment:
job_description[18]: Work closely with software engineers to integrate AI models into production systems and package AI components for reusability.
job_description[19]: • Mentorship & Leadership:
job_description[20]: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior data scientists and engineers, potentially leading specific topics or initiatives.
job_description[21]: • MLOps & Infrastructure:
job_description[22]: Contribute to the development of robust MLOps pipelines (CI/CD for ML) and apply strong skills in Docker and container orchestration.
job_description[23]: • Strategic Evaluation:
job_description[24]: Research and evaluate external AI services versus in-house development ("Make or Buy") in a global context, assessing feasibility and ROI.
job_description[25]: • Agile Contribution:
job_description[26]: Support highly volatile projects on demand and contribute to rapid prototyping and continuous improvement. Develop use cases and demos for pre-sales purposes, ensuring consistently updated versions.

job_description[0]: Job Description
job_description[1]: MiTek’s Component Manufacturing division is seeking a dynamic and passionate Software Engineer to help pioneer industry-changing solutions for the residential construction industry. This position will be part of a team working on a 3D BIM solution for single or multi-family modeling, design, and estimating. Be part of a high-performing and collaborative team that is focused on innovation and engaging MiTek customers, while creating powerful software.
job_description[2]: Role, Responsibilities & Typical Activities
job_description[3]: Software Development:
job_description[4]: • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code for 3D CAD/Engineering desktop software using C++, and C#.
job_description[5]: • Contribute to large, breakthrough enhancements in our CAD/BIM platform. Efforts require refactoring existing logic, feasibility analysis, and creating new enhancements.
job_description[6]: • Apply best programming standards and techniques to ensure efficient performance and data manipulation.
job_description[7]: Technical Leadership:
job_description[8]: • Lead design reviews, code reviews, and collaborative requirements reviews.
job_description[9]: • Mentor junior engineers and support their growth.
job_description[10]: • Author documents for software architecture and team process.
job_description[11]: Collaboration & Communication:
job_description[12]: • Lead collaboration across multiple global teams to contribute to a large-scale project.
job_description[13]: • Collaborate with product manager, testing, and other development teams to ensure solutions are efficient, consistent, and fulfill business needs.
job_description[14]: • Attendance during regular work hours and in the evening as required.
job_requirement[0]: Required Qualifications:
job_requirement[1]: • Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or a related discipline
job_requirement[2]: • 6+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying enterprise-grade applications in international environments
job_requirement[3]: • Proven experience in desktop application development, with 2+ years of hands-on experience with C++ application development.
job_requirement[4]: • 2+ years of experience in a technical leadership role.
job_requirement[5]: • Strong expertise in software architecture, design patterns, and object-oriented programming principles.
job_requirement[6]: • Proficient in version control systems such as Git, TFS, or Bitbucket.
job_requirement[7]: • Experience with UI testing, unit testing, and automated testing frameworks.
job_requirement[8]: • Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines and end-to-end delivery processes.
job_requirement[9]: • Ability to analyze and troubleshoot large, complex codebases, including diagnosing and resolving critical issues.
job_requirement[10]: • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders (English proficiency: B2 CEFR or equivalent).
job_requirement[11]: Preferred Qualifications:
job_requirement[12]: • Good understanding of mathematical concepts, including algebra and geometry.
job_requirement[13]: • Experience as a Scrum Master or Agile team facilitator/coordinator.
job_requirement[14]: • Experience with Azure DevOps, or CI/CD pipelines is a big plus.
job_requirement[15]: • Hands-on experience with TDD, automation testing, or code performance optimization.
job_requirement[16]: Why You'll Love Working Here
job_requirement[17]: Competitive Income:
job_requirement[18]: Attractive salary, 13th-month bonus, year-end performance bonus
job_requirement[19]: Comprehensive Healthcare
job_requirement[20]: : PVI insurance, full social insurance, 24/7 accident insurance, annual health check-ups
job_requirement[21]: Training & Development:
job_requirement[22]: English courses, LinkedIn Learning, MiTek University, overseas training opportunities
job_requirement[23]: Leave Policy:
job_requirement[24]: 12 annual leave days, Christmas holiday
job_requirement[25]: Recognition of Achievements & Contributions:
job_requirement[26]: Employee of the Month/Year, Platinum Star Award, VIP trip for employees with 3 years of service
job_requirement[27]: Modern Facilities:
job_requirement[28]: Designed to support learning, working, and development
job_requirement[29]: Benefits:
job_requirement[30]: Free diverse lunch options, team-building activities, sports clubs (Badminton, Football, Swimming, Modern Dance, Yoga, Esports, Gym)

job_description[0]: Summary:
job_description[1]: The IoT Engineering Lead plays a pivotal role within the Smart Brewery IoT team, part of the Connected Brewery Portfolio in the Digital Supply Chain domain. He/She will be the forefront contact approach breweries first, create the foundation for whole team to provides services to intelligently support the shop floor of our Breweries in their increasingly complex tasks and unlock opportunities through insights that we never had before.
job_description[2]: The Smart Brewery is an industrial facility with very high efficiency, very low maintenance time that can be monitored, diagnosed, and improved on site or remotely thanks to digital.
job_description[3]: Roles & responsibilities
job_description[4]: Deploy CB kit at Heineken breweries in APAC region
job_description[5]: Finding required data for deploying CB use-cases
job_description[6]: Able to be a Coordinator for projects under Connected Breweries portfolio
job_description[7]: Assist the breweries in region for their requirement related to IoT domain.
job_description[8]: Support project management and prepare documents, deliver training programs .
job_description[9]: Be able to do planning, schedule, prepare documents, check lists, progress reports
job_description[10]: Work as IT help desk for issues of CB Kit, connectivity's between Kit and machines, machine data losing
job_description[11]: Foster a culture of continuous improvement by analyzing project outcomes and incorporating lessons learned.
job_requirement[0]: Signs of strong performance
job_requirement[1]: Project/Portfolio management skills, communication and change management, stakeholder management
job_requirement[2]: Good communication and alignment
job_requirement[3]: Experience & profile
job_requirement[4]: Bachelor / Master degree in a relevant field such as mechanical, electric, control& automation, computer science
job_requirement[5]: Proven experience in change management and communications, transformational and/or digital programs preferably within large, matrixed organizations.
job_requirement[6]: Familiarity with manufacturing environment, ideally within the FMCG industry or a similar dynamic environment.
job_requirement[7]: Knows how to own leadership, people and stakeholder management skills.
job_requirement[8]: Ability to build and maintain strong collaborative relationships with leaders across the business
job_requirement[9]: Ensures the product design and implementation adheres to functional requirements and architecture standards;
job_requirement[10]: Collaborate with PCD product team to align the PCD standards and Reference Architecture and ensure applying them for the IT solutions of the Digital initiatives
job_requirement[11]: Basic PLC knowledge is a plus
job_requirement[12]: Project management certifications (e.g., PMP, Agile) are advantageous

company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Chứng Khoán SSI
job_description[0]: Tổng quan về Vị trí:
job_description[1]: Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm Kỹ sư Phần mềm (Software Engineer) tài năng và đam mê để tham gia vào đội ngũ phát triển Nền tảng Dữ liệu (Data Platform). Bạn sẽ đóng vai trò then chốt trong việc thiết kế, xây dựng và duy trì một nền tảng dữ liệu mạnh mẽ, có khả năng mở rộng cao, phục vụ cho toàn bộ hoạt động phân tích và ra quyết định dựa trên dữ liệu của công ty.
job_description[2]: Trách nhiệm & Công việc chính:
job_description[3]: 1. Phát triển & Duy trì Core Data Platform:
job_description[4]: • Thiết kế, xây dựng và vận hành các thành phần cốt lõi của Data Platform.
job_description[5]: • Phát triển các dịch vụ Data Integration (Tích hợp dữ liệu) để thu thập dữ liệu từ nhiều nguồn đa dạng (cơ sở dữ liệu, API, log, streaming...).
job_description[6]: • Xây dựng và tối ưu hóa hệ thống Data Processing (Xử lý dữ liệu) cho cả hai luồng Batch (theo lô) và Real-time (thời gian thực).
job_description[7]: • Đảm bảo độ tin cậy, hiệu suất và khả năng mở rộng của toàn bộ nền tảng.
job_description[8]: 2. Phát triển Nền tảng Low-code API:
job_description[9]: • Thiết kế và xây dựng một hệ thống Low-code/No-code cho phép người dùng nội bộ có thể dễ dàng tạo, quản lý và triển khai các API thông qua việc cấu hình trực quan (config-based).
job_description[10]: • Tối ưu hóa hiệu năng và bảo mật cho các API được tạo ra từ nền tảng.
job_description[11]: 3. Phát triển Giao diện Người dùng Trực quan (UI/UX):
job_description[12]: • Phát triển các giao diện web trực quan, thân thiện với người dùng cho các module của Data Platform (như quản lý data pipeline, dashboard, công cụ cấu hình API).
job_description[13]: • Đảm bảo trải nghiệm người dùng mượt mà và hiệu quả cho việc tương tác và khai thác dữ liệu.
job_description[14]: 4. Tích hợp & Đảm bảo An ninh Bảo mật (Security):
job_description[15]: • Tích hợp và triển khai các giải pháp bảo mật toàn diện cho nền tảng: xác thực (Authentication), ủy quyền (Authorization), mã hóa dữ liệu (Encryption), và quản lý bí mật (Secrets Management).
job_description[16]: • Tuân thủ các chính sách bảo mật và quy định về quyền riêng tư dữ liệu.
job_requirement[0]: Bắt buộc:
job_requirement[1]: • Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học dữ liệu, Toán - Tin hoặc liên quan.
job_requirement[2]: Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm
job_requirement[3]: ở vị trí Software Engineer, Backend Engineer hoặc Data Engineer.
job_requirement[4]: • Thành thạo ít nhất một ngôn ngữ lập trình backend như Java, Python, Go hoặc Scala.
job_requirement[5]: • Có kinh nghiệm thực tế với các framework phát triển web để xây dựng UI (ưu tiên React.js hoặc Vue.js/Angular).
job_requirement[6]: • Hiểu biết vững về kiến trúc hệ thống, các mẫu thiết kế (Design Patterns) và nguyên lý lập trình hướng đối tượng (OOP).
job_requirement[7]: • Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các cơ sở dữ liệu SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) và NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra).
job_requirement[8]: • Quen thuộc với các công cụ và nền tảng xử lý dữ liệu như Apache Spark, Apache Flink, Kafka, Trino, Airflow, dbt.
job_requirement[9]: • Hiểu biết về các nguyên tắc bảo mật cơ bản trong phát triển ứng dụng và dịch vụ web.

job_description[0]: 1. Scope and Responsibilities:
job_description[1]: ***Requirement Elicitation and Analysis:
job_description[2]: -Conduct interviews, workshops, and meetings with stakeholders to gather and clarify business requirements.
job_description[3]: - Analyze and document business processes, workflows, and system interactions to understand current state and identify improvement opportunities.
job_description[4]: - Use various techniques such as use case modeling, process modeling, and data modeling to capture and define requirements.
job_description[5]: ***Requirement Documentation and Management:
job_description[6]: - Document business requirements in a clear, concise, and structured manner using tools like use cases, user stories, requirement specifications, and acceptance criteria.
job_description[7]: - Manage and prioritize requirements using requirement management tools, ensuring traceability and alignment with project objectives.
job_description[8]: - Collaborate with stakeholders to review and validate requirements, incorporating feedback and updates as necessary.
job_description[9]: ***Communication and Collaboration:
job_description[10]: - Serve as a liaison between business stakeholders and IT teams, facilitating communication and ensuring mutual understanding.
job_description[11]: - Translate business needs into technical requirements and specifications, effectively communicating complex concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
job_description[12]: - Work closely with project managers, developers, testers, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment of goals, priorities, and expectations.
job_description[13]: ***Solution Design and Validation:
job_description[14]: - Participate in solution design sessions, providing input based on a deep understanding of business requirements and constraints.
job_description[15]: - Validate proposed solutions against business needs, ensuring they address the root causes of business problems and deliver expected benefits.
job_description[16]: - Collaborate with architects and technical leads to ensure solutions are scalable, maintainable, and aligned with enterprise architecture standards.
job_description[17]: ***Testing and Quality Assurance:
job_description[18]: - Define test scenarios and acceptance criteria based on business requirements and user stories.
job_description[19]: - Support testing efforts by reviewing test cases, participating in testing activities, and triaging defects.
job_description[20]: - Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) with business stakeholders, ensuring solutions meet their needs and expectations.
job_description[21]: ***Training and Support:
job_description[22]: - Develop training materials and deliver training sessions to end-users on new systems, processes, and functionalities.
job_description[23]: - Provide ongoing support to end-users, answering questions, troubleshooting issues, and facilitating resolution.
job_description[24]: ***Continuous Improvement:
job_description[25]: - Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of implemented solutions, gathering feedback and identifying areas for improvement.
job_description[26]: - Proactively identify opportunities to streamline processes, enhance system capabilities, and drive innovation.
job_description[27]: - Stay abreast of industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies relevant to business analysis and IT.
job_description[28]: 2. Daily Activities:
job_description[29]: - Conduct stakeholder meetings to discuss project status, gather requirements, and address concerns.
job_description[30]: - Analyze and refine business requirements, documenting them in requirement management tools.
job_description[31]: - Collaborate with development teams to clarify requirements, provide context, and resolve issues.
job_description[32]: - Review and provide feedback on design documents, user interface mockups, and technical specifications.
job_description[33]: - Participate in Agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and sprint reviews.
job_description[34]: - Assist with user story grooming, ensuring stories are well-defined, estimated, and ready for development.
job_description[35]: - Coordinate and conduct UAT sessions with business stakeholders, capturing feedback and validating solutions.
job_description[36]: - Develop and deliver training sessions or materials for end-users on new features or systems.
job_description[37]: - Document lessons learned, best practices, and insights gained from project experiences.
job_description[38]: - Engage in professional development activities such as training courses, workshops, or networking events to enhance skills and knowledge.
job_description[41]: - Requirement Specifications: Detailed documents outlining functional and non-functional requirements, including use cases, user stories, business rules, and acceptance criteria.
job_description[42]: - Requirement Traceability Matrix: Matrix linking requirements to business objectives, system components, test cases, and other related artifacts.
job_description[43]: - Data Models: Diagrams illustrating the structure, relationships, and attributes of data entities within the system.
job_description[44]: - Process Models: Diagrams depicting current and future state business processes, workflows, and interactions.
job_description[46]: - Stakeholder Communication Plan: Plan outlining communication strategies, channels, frequency, and key messages for engaging with stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.
job_description[47]: - Meeting Minutes: Summaries of discussions, decisions, and action items from stakeholder meetings, workshops, and requirement elicitation sessions.
job_description[48]: - Presentation Materials: Slides and visuals used to communicate project updates, requirements, and recommendations to stakeholders and project teams.
job_description[50]: - Solution Architecture Documents: High-level and detailed descriptions of the proposed system architecture, components, interfaces, and technologies.
job_description[51]: - User Interface Mockups: Wireframes, prototypes, or design mockups illustrating the layout, navigation, and functionality of user interfaces.
job_description[52]: - Integration Specifications: Specifications outlining how different system components and third-party systems will integrate and exchange data.
job_description[54]: - Test Plans: Documents outlining the approach, scope, resources, and schedule for testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.
job_description[55]: - Test Cases: Detailed scripts or scenarios describing steps to be executed during testing, along with expected results and pass/fail criteria.
job_description[56]: - Defect Reports: Documentation of identified defects, including descriptions, severity, steps to reproduce, and resolution status.
job_description[58]: - Training Guides: Manuals, tutorials, or user guides providing step-by-step instructions for using the system or specific features.
job_description[59]: - Training Presentations: Slides or materials used during training sessions to educate end-users on system functionality, best practices, and tips.
job_description[60]: - FAQ Documents: Frequently asked questions and answers addressing common queries and issues related to the system.
job_description[62]: - Lessons Learned Reports: Summaries of project successes, challenges, and key takeaways to inform future projects and improve processes.
job_description[63]: - Best Practice Guides: Documents outlining recommended approaches, techniques, and tools for conducting business analysis and project management.
job_description[64]: - Knowledge Base Articles: Articles or wiki entries documenting system features, configurations, troubleshooting steps, and tips for system administrators and end-users.

job_requirement[1]: - Good analytical skills to interpret data and problem solving skills to address business challenges and attention to detail to ensure accuracy in analysis.
job_requirement[2]: - Excel in documentation and time management, experience in organizing, prioritizing and managing simultaneous projects.
job_requirement[3]: - Fluent verbal and writing communication skills in English with the ability to collaborate with stakeholders.
job_requirement[4]: - High adaptability skills with empathy and emotional intelligence, an excellent team player and hard worker.

job_description[0]: About the Project
job_description[1]: We’re rebuilding a next-generation
job_description[2]: securities trading platform
job_description[3]: — a modern, high-performance mobile superapp that connects securely to a leading securities core system and integrates
job_description[4]: AI-powered investment assistance
job_description[5]: Phase 1 includes:
job_description[6]: ● Rewriting the
job_description[7]: mobile app in Flutter
job_description[8]: for iOS and Android.
job_description[9]: ● Rebuilding the
job_description[10]: backend in Go (Golang)
job_description[11]: to integrate with an on-prem securities core via RESTful APIs.
job_description[12]: ● Adding an
job_description[13]: AI chatbot
job_description[14]: hosted on
job_description[15]: AWS Cloud
job_description[16]: , combining multiple data sources for intelligent market insights.
job_description[17]: We’re looking for a
job_description[18]: Technical Program Manager (TPM)
job_description[19]: to drive delivery across teams and vendors, ensuring on-time, on-budget, and high-quality execution.
job_description[20]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[21]: Program Management & Delivery
job_description[22]: ● Own end-to-end delivery of the trading app rebuild (mobile + backend + AI chatbot).
job_description[23]: ● Maintain the program roadmap, milestones, dependencies, and delivery KPIs (schedule, budget, quality).
job_description[24]: ● Coordinate across internal engineering teams, external vendors, and core-system partners.
job_description[25]: ● Identify delivery risks early, manage dependencies, and ensure smooth handoffs between teams.
job_description[26]: ● Lead release management, including blue-green deployment, rollback testing, and version rollout.
job_description[27]: ● Track progress through structured weekly reporting (velocity, risks, QA metrics).
job_description[28]: Cross-Team Coordination
job_description[29]: ● Partner with:
job_description[30]: ○ Senior Engineer (Trading App) – overseeing Flutter + Go implementation.
job_description[31]: ○ Senior Engineer (AI) – delivering chatbot and data integration features.
job_description[32]: ○ Technical Architect – validating architecture, security, and performance targets.
job_description[33]: ○ BA and QA Teams – ensuring requirement traceability and quality coverage.
job_description[34]: ○ 1-2 mid-level Engineers and a Devops/AWS engineer
job_description[35]: ● Manage communication and delivery alignment between internal product teams, backend partners, infrastructure stakeholders, and external data providers.
job_description[37]: ● Understand and track system architecture, including API Gateway, Middleware, and hybrid on-prem / cloud infrastructure.
job_description[38]: ● Ensure compliance with security and regulatory standards (TLS, audit trails, data retention).
job_description[39]: ● Supervise integration testing and end-to-end validation across mobile, backend, and AI components.
job_description[40]: ● Oversee observability and performance using monitoring tools (ELK, Prometheus, Grafana).
job_description[41]: ● Participate in performance benchmarking and scaling reviews (< 300 ms order latency, > 55 FPS mobile chart and stock feed).
job_description[43]: ● Maintain comprehensive project documentation and change logs.
job_description[44]: ● Define and verify acceptance criteria for each release milestone.
job_description[45]: ● Coordinate compliance checks, penetration tests, and security audits.
job_description[46]: ● Report regularly to executive sponsors on delivery status and risk posture.

job_requirement[1]: Professional Background
job_requirement[2]: ● 8+ years of experience in software delivery, program management, or engineering leadership.
job_requirement[3]: ● Proven success delivering complex fintech or trading platforms involving mobile, backend, and data systems.
job_requirement[4]: ● Hands-on familiarity with:
job_requirement[5]: ○ Flutter or React Native mobile development.
job_requirement[6]: ○ Go (Golang) backend or similar modern backend frameworks.
job_requirement[7]: ○ Hybrid cloud/on-prem environments (Kubernetes, AWS).
job_requirement[8]: ○ API integrations with third-party or core systems.
job_requirement[9]: ● Experience managing multi-vendor and cross-functional teams.

job_requirement[11]: ● Strong understanding of SDLC, CI/CD, QA, and DevOps workflows.
job_requirement[12]: ● Skilled in risk management, dependency mapping, and delivery governance.
job_requirement[13]: ● Excellent communication skills — able to bridge product, engineering, and business stakeholders.

job_requirement[16]: Soft Skills
job_requirement[17]: ● Clear communicator and team unifier across technical and business domains.

job_requirement[19]: ● Highly organized and detail-oriented.

job_description[1]: ra đời từ 2016, tập trung nâng cao năng suất cá nhân toàn cầu. Sản phẩm đầu tay
job_description[2]: Habitify là ứng dụng theo dõi thói quen thành công
job_description[3]: , được Apple vinh danh nhiều lần trên App Store với các danh hiệu như "App of The Day" và "New App We Love". Việc được Apple chủ động quảng bá tới 13 lần là một minh chứng rõ ràng cho chất lượng của ứng dụng. Hiện tại có
job_description[4]: hơn 2 triệu người dùng
job_description[5]: quốc tế, khẳng định vị thế sản phẩm Việt trên thị trường cạnh tranh như Mỹ, Nhật, Hàn.
job_description[6]: Đằng sau Habitify là một đội ngũ người Việt trẻ trung, sáng tạo, luôn khao khát đưa sản phẩm "made in Vietnam" ra thế giới bằng con đường chất lượng thực sự. Từng dòng code, từng tính năng đều được tạo ra với sự chỉn chu, tâm huyết và tinh thần làm chủ – điều giúp Habitify luôn theo sát những đổi mới công nghệ và mang lại trải nghiệm tốt nhất cho người dùng.
job_description[7]: Với chúng mình, Unstatic không chỉ là nơi làm việc – mà còn là nơi để bạn góp phần tạo ra điều có ý nghĩa cho hàng triệu người. Nếu bạn đang tìm kiếm một môi trường để phát triển, thử thách bản thân, và để lại dấu ấn cá nhân trong một sản phẩm và có giá trị toàn cầu – Unstatic sẵn sàng đồng hành cùng bạn.
job_description[8]: 1. Nhiệm vụ
job_description[9]: - Phân tích yêu cầu tổng quan và tính năng cụ thể của ứng dụng.
job_description[10]: - Phân tích thiết kế giao diện, xác định và triển khai tương tác người dùng phù hợp, đảm bảo tính khả thi và khả dụng của công nghệ đối với yêu cầu và thiết kế.
job_description[11]: - Thiết kế và phát triển các ứng dụng web có độ phản hồi cao, đáp ứng các yêu cầu về tối ưu hóa dung lượng, thời gian tải/nạp/chạy (parse/load/run-time) và khả năng mở rộng, tái ứng dụng cao.
job_description[12]: - Thiết kế và triển khai các mô hình phát triển dự án dựa trên hệ sinh thái ReactJS (library và các third party framework).
job_description[13]: - Liên tục thay đổi cách tiếp cận và triển khai ý tưởng.

job_description[0]: ABOUT PIZZA 4P'S
job_description[1]: Pizza 4P's is a renowned restaurant chain with a mission to "Make the World Smile for Peace." We're expanding our technological capabilities to enhance customer experiences and streamline operations across our growing network of restaurants. Our tech team develops and maintains various applications including our customer-facing mobile app, website, POS systems, and internal operational tools.
job_description[2]: POSITION OVERVIEW
job_description[3]: We are seeking an experienced Senior QA Engineer to lead quality assurance initiatives across our technology ecosystem. This role combines manual and automated testing approaches to ensure the reliability, functionality, and performance of our applications. As a Senior QA Engineer, you will establish testing standards, develop comprehensive test strategies, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software that enhances both customer experience and operational efficiency.
job_description[4]: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
job_description[5]: Design, develop, and implement comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scenarios for web applications, mobile apps, APIs, and internal systems
job_description[6]: Lead the development and maintenance of automated test frameworks and scripts using industry-standard tools and best practices
job_description[7]: Perform thorough manual testing including functional, regression, usability, and exploratory testing across multiple platforms
job_description[8]: Design and execute performance, load, and stress tests to ensure application stability under various conditions
job_description[9]: Establish and maintain QA processes, methodologies, and quality metrics that align with agile development practices
job_description[10]: Conduct thorough analysis of defects, including root cause identification, and work closely with development teams on resolution
job_description[11]: Create and maintain test environments, test data, and documentation for all testing activities
job_description[12]: Lead test planning and estimation for new features and releases
job_description[13]: Mentor junior QA team members and promote quality-focused mindset across the organization
job_description[14]: Participate in code reviews from a quality assurance perspective
job_description[15]: Monitor and analyze application logs and metrics to identify potential issues before they impact users
job_description[16]: Stay current with emerging testing tools, technologies, and methodologies
job_description[17]: Work with product owners to ensure applications meet business requirements and user expectations
job_description[18]: Perform security testing and vulnerability assessments in coordination with the security team
job_description[19]: Ensure overall product quality by consolidating test results, quality metrics, and risk assessments into clear, actionable reports for stakeholders and leadership.
job_requirement[0]: WHO YOU ARE
job_requirement[1]: Bachelor‘s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent practical experience)
job_requirement[2]: 5+ years of experience in QA engineering with a proven track record in both manual and automated testing
job_requirement[3]: Strong experience with test automation frameworks and tools (such as Selenium, Cypress, TestNG, Appium, JUnit, or similar)
job_requirement[4]: Proficient in at least one programming/scripting language (Python, Java, JavaScript, etc.) for test automation
job_requirement[5]: Experience with API testing using tools like Postman, Rest Assured, or similar
job_requirement[6]: Knowledge of SQL and database testing
job_requirement[7]: Experience with performance testing tools (JMeter, Gatling, Locust, etc.)
job_requirement[8]: Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and testing integration (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
job_requirement[9]: Strong understanding of QA methodologies, best practices, and testing techniques
job_requirement[10]: Experience working in Agile/Scrum development environments
job_requirement[11]: Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail
job_requirement[12]: Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
job_requirement[13]: Experience with test management tools and defect tracking systems
job_requirement[14]: Demonstrate strong leadership potential, with the ability to take ownership, guide QA initiatives, and influence quality standards across teams.
job_requirement[15]: PREFERRED SKILLS
job_requirement[16]: Experience in the hospitality or food service industry
job_requirement[17]: Knowledge of mobile application testing (iOS and Android)
job_requirement[18]: Experience with BDD frameworks (Cucumber, SpecFlow, etc.)
job_requirement[19]: Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
job_requirement[20]: Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
job_requirement[21]: Knowledge of accessibility testing and WCAG compliance
job_requirement[22]: Experience with security testing methodologies and tools
job_requirement[23]: Understanding of restaurant operations and POS systems
job_requirement[24]: Experience with microservices architecture testing
job_requirement[25]: Knowledge of test data management techniques
