job_title: Senior Technology Assurance - Ha Noi Office
job_description[0]: At EY, we’re all in to shape your future with confidence.
job_description[1]: We’ll help you succeed in a globally connected powerhouse of diverse teams and take your career wherever you want it to go.​
job_description[2]: Join EY and help to build a better working world.
job_description[3]: The opportunity: Senior – Technology Assurance
job_description[4]: EY’s Technology Assurance services are designed for the dual purpose of strengthening internal controls and, in so doing, helping to improve IT and business performance. In addition to assurance-related engagements such as financial audit IT (FAIT), our services focus on IT governance and effectiveness; IT internal control assessment; security and controls of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) implementations; and risk data analysis.
job_description[5]: We are currently seeking senior associate positions in the following areas:
job_description[6]: - IT Process Risk & Internal Controls assessment
job_description[7]: - Application System Risk & Controls assessment
job_description[8]: - Data Delivery and Analysis Services practice
job_description[9]: - Financial Services Technology Risk and IT Regulatory Services
job_description[10]: Your key responsibilities
job_description[11]: - Perform IT audits for systems that generate financial statements that includes the effectiveness evaluation of IT General controls across IT environments, automated functions in ERP system system, data reports.
job_description[12]: - Support Executives in directing daily progress of fieldwork, informing works status, and managing performance in delivering IT audit assignments against established methodologies, frameworks and global best practices
job_description[13]: - Apply a thorough understanding of system functions, IT controls to support Managers in controls optimization assignments, in identify client or audit challenges, and in providing/ implementing/ assessing solutions.
job_description[14]: - Apply digital solutions and technology such as Alteryx, SQL, RPA and Python etc. to analyze data and identify abnormal criteria's in digital assurance engagements.
job_requirement[0]: Mức độ phù hợp và xếp hạng của bạn so với ứng viên khác như thế nào?

benefits.Đào tạo: Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next. Access to premium content including EY Global Methodology, Udemy for Business, Microsoft, SAP partners v.v.

benefits.Khác: Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.\n
benefits.Hoạt động nhóm: Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.

company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Sapo
job_description[0]: Sapo là công ty công nghệ hàng đầu tại Việt Nam, cung cấp nền tảng quản lý và bán hàng đa kênh giúp hơn 230.000 khách hàng trong lĩnh vực bán lẻ và thương mại điện tử quản trị kinh doanh hiệu quả từ Online đến Offline. Với hơn 1.000 nhân sự trẻ trung, nhiệt huyết, Sapo không ngừng sáng tạo để mang đến giải pháp công nghệ tối ưu, đồng hành cùng sự phát triển của các nhà bán hàng trên toàn quốc.
job_description[1]: Trong hành trình này, vai trò của Ban lãnh đạo là cực kỳ quan trọng để hoạch định chiến lược, giám sát vận hành và thúc đẩy sự gắn kết toàn tổ chức. Vì vậy, chúng tôi tìm kiếm Trợ lý Phó Tổng Giám Đốc – người đồng hành sát cánh cùng lãnh đạo trong việc quản lý mục tiêu, điều phối hoạt động và triển khai các dự án chiến lược. Đây là cơ hội để bạn trực tiếp tham gia vào quá trình ra quyết định quan trọng, phát triển kỹ năng quản trị cấp cao và đóng góp vào sự thành công bền vững của Sapo.
job_description[2]: MÔ TẢ CHI TIẾT CÔNG VIỆC:
job_description[3]: - Hỗ trợ phân tích dữ liệu & xây dựng báo cáo
job_description[4]: - Thu thập, tổng hợp và phân tích dữ liệu và xây dựng hệ thống báo cáo tự động
job_description[5]: - Thiết kế bộ KPI chuẩn hóa cho các nhóm Sales của sapo
job_description[6]: - Đưa ra đề xuất chiến lược tăng trưởng dựa trên phân tích dữ liệu
job_description[7]: Nghiên cứu thị trường & phân tích đối thủ
job_description[8]: - Theo dõi, phân tích thị trường SaaS, đối thủ cạnh tranh để đưa ra các đề xuất và cải tiến kịp thời
job_description[9]: - Phân tích pricing, promotion, tính năng sản phẩm mới, kênh bán, thông điệp truyền thông và chiến thuật bán hàng của đối thủ
job_description[10]: - Đề xuất chiến lược cạnh tranh: điều chỉnh giá/gói sản phẩm, đề xuất cải tiến tính năng, xây dựng battle cards cho đội Sales
job_description[11]: Chuẩn hoá vận hành kinh doanh & xây dựng quy trình
job_description[12]: - Rà soát, đánh giá và hệ thống hóa toàn bộ quy trình kinh doanh ở 20 văn phòng, bao gồm: quy trình tìm kiếm khách hàng, quy trình demo – tư vấn – chốt bán, quy trình đào tạo và onboarding Sales
job_description[13]: - Xây dựng “Sales Operation Playbook” cho toàn lực lượng Sales toàn quốc
job_description[14]: - Đề xuất tối ưu vận hành nhằm làm giảm chi phí sales, tăng năng suất
job_description[15]: Điều phối dự án & triển khai chiến lược cùng Giám đốc
job_description[16]: - Tham gia vào các dự án đặc biệt của Giám đốc Kinh doanh
job_description[17]: - Theo dõi tiến độ, giám sát chất lượng thực thi và báo cáo kết quả
job_description[18]: - Là cầu nối giữa Giám đốc kinh doanh và các phòng ban là tối ưu vận hành và hiệu quả

job_description[24]: - Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo từ các chuyên gia hàng đầu về thương mại điện tử, marketing online, phần mềm, nhân sự, tài chính...

job_requirement[5]: - Có khả năng lập kế hoạch, quản lý dự án và phối hợp liên phòng ban
job_requirement[6]: - Tinh thần chủ động, trách nhiệm cao, giao tiếp rõ ràng, chịu được áp lực và định hướng kết quả

job_title: Phó Giám Đốc Khối Dịch Vụ và Trải Nghiệm Khách Hàng
company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ Sapo
job_description[0]: Sapo là công ty công nghệ hàng đầu tại Việt Nam, cung cấp nền tảng quản lý và bán hàng đa kênh giúp hơn 230.000 khách hàng trong lĩnh vực bán lẻ và thương mại điện tử quản trị kinh doanh hiệu quả từ Online đến Offline. Với hơn 1.000 nhân sự trẻ trung, nhiệt huyết, Sapo không ngừng sáng tạo để mang đến giải pháp công nghệ tối ưu, đồng hành cùng sự phát triển của các nhà bán hàng trên toàn quốc.
job_description[1]: Trong giai đoạn tăng trưởng và chuyển đổi chiến lược, Sapo tìm kiếm Phó Giám đốc Khối Dịch vụ & Trải nghiệm Khách hàng – người kiến tạo chiến lược Customer Success toàn diện, nâng chuẩn dịch vụ và trải nghiệm khách hàng, đồng thời đóng góp trực tiếp vào tăng trưởng bền vững thông qua renewal, upsell/cross-sell và hiệu suất vận hành tối ưu.
job_description[2]: TRÁCH NHIỆM CHÍNH
job_description[3]: - Gia tăng giá trị và doanh thu bền vững qua Tỷ lệ Gia hạn (Renewal Rate) và Upsell/Cross-sell.
job_description[4]: - Tăng cường gắn bó khách hàng với sản phẩm và hệ sinh thái: Tỷ lệ Active và Lifetime Value.
job_description[5]: - Tối ưu hóa năng suất, ứng dụng AI/Automation nhằm tăng hiệu suất.
job_description[6]: - Nâng chuẩn chất lượng dịch vụ qua các chỉ số CSAT, NPS.
job_description[7]: MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC CHI TIẾT:
job_description[8]: Chiến lược, Hệ thống & Công nghệ (Strategy & Human-Tech)
job_description[9]: - Phối hợp cùng Giám đốc Khối xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược Customer Success toàn diện, lấy Renewal Rate và Active Rate làm kim chỉ nam.
job_description[10]: - Thiết kế và triển khai mô hình dịch vụ Human-Tech, ứng dụng AI, chatbot, automation và phân tích dữ liệu hành vi nhằm tự động hóa và cá nhân hóa trải nghiệm hỗ trợ khách hàng.
job_description[11]: - Thiết lập và vận hành hệ thống cảnh báo sớm (Early Warning System), sử dụng dữ liệu để dự báo rủi ro rời bỏ (churn) và chủ động đưa ra giải pháp can thiệp.
job_description[12]: - Thiết kế và giám sát bộ chỉ số điều hành 360°, bao gồm CSAT, NPS, Renewal Rate, Active Rate, CLV và Cost Efficiency.
job_description[13]: Vận hành Hiệu suất & Trải nghiệm (Performance & CX)
job_description[14]: - Điều hành toàn bộ hoạt động của các trung tâm dịch vụ (CS, CSKH, QA, Training, Claim), đảm bảo hiệu suất – chất lượng – chi phí tối ưu.
job_description[15]: - Tối ưu hành trình khách hàng (Customer Journey), gia tăng tần suất và chiều sâu sử dụng sản phẩm nhằm nâng cao tỷ lệ Active.
job_description[16]: - Giám sát trải nghiệm khách hàng đa kênh (Omnichannel CX), đảm bảo sự thống nhất và liền mạch giữa hotline, chat, email, ticket, social và app.
job_description[17]: Thúc đẩy Giá trị Khách hàng & Tăng trưởng (Retention & Value)
job_description[18]: - Phối hợp cùng các khối Kinh doanh, Marketing và Sản phẩm để thiết kế và triển khai chương trình Renewal, Upsell/Cross-sell dựa trên Customer Health Score.
job_description[19]: - Định kỳ phân tích CLV, churn rate, adoption rate để nhận diện và khai thác phân khúc khách hàng tiềm năng, gia tăng giá trị trọn đời.
job_description[20]: - Đề xuất và triển khai chính sách khách hàng trung thành (Loyalty/Retention Program) phù hợp với hành vi, nhu cầu và chu kỳ sử dụng của từng nhóm khách hàng.
job_description[21]: QUYỀN LỢI:
job_description[22]: - Thu nhập cạnh tranh & xứng đáng với năng lực: Gói lương hấp dẫn gồm lương cứng cao + thưởng theo hiệu quả vận hành + thưởng dự án chiến lược, đảm bảo tương xứng với vai trò lãnh đạo cấp cao.
job_description[23]: - Cơ hội dẫn dắt chiến lược & tạo dấu ấn cá nhân: Trực tiếp tham gia hoạch định chiến lược dịch vụ và trải nghiệm khách hàng toàn hệ thống, góp phần định hình hành trình “Customer-First” của Sapo trong giai đoạn tăng trưởng bứt phá.
job_description[24]: - Ảnh hưởng thực tế & đóng góp giá trị bền vững: Dẫn dắt các sáng kiến AI, automation, data-driven CX, giúp hàng trăm nghìn doanh nghiệp Việt nâng cao năng lực vận hành và tối ưu trải nghiệm khách hàng.
job_description[25]: - Phát triển nghề nghiệp & học hỏi liên tục: Tiếp cận hệ thống đào tạo nội bộ và các chương trình phát triển lãnh đạo (Leadership Development Program) do Sapo thiết kế riêng cho cấp quản lý cấp cao.
job_description[26]: - Môi trường đổi mới, trẻ trung và linh hoạt: Văn hóa công nghệ năng động, nơi mọi ý tưởng sáng tạo đều được lắng nghe và khuyến khích thử nghiệm – “Dám nghĩ, dám làm, dám thay đổi”.
job_description[27]: - Phúc lợi toàn diện: Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp dành cho quản lý cấp cao; thưởng lễ Tết, du lịch & team building định kỳ.

job_description[0]: How You'll Make an Impact
job_description[1]: We’re looking for proactive Operations Analysts to set up, run, and continuously improve our data operations. You’ll keep pipelines and portals reliable, ensure lead flows and enrichments are timely and accurate, and produce clear operational reporting so our telesales and product teams can move fast with confidence. You’ll work closely with analysts, engineers, and operators to identify issues early, address root causes, and elevate operational excellence.
job_description[2]: What You'll Do
job_description[3]: • Configure and maintain lead intake, routing, and enrichment flows.
job_description[4]: • Own daily lead allocation/reallocation to meet SLAs.
job_description[5]: • Run enrichment jobs and health checks; resolve anomalies quickly.
job_description[6]: • Reconcile AGI product data (inputs, outputs, transactions) and close mismatches.
job_description[7]: • Maintain the telesales portal (access, views, widgets, permissions).
job_description[8]: • Ship daily/weekly ops dashboards; set alerts for freshness, volume, and error rates.
job_description[9]: • Keep SOPs/runbooks current; drive RCA and prevention for data issues.
job_description[10]: • Propose small process/tooling improvements to reduce manual work.

job_description[0]: Trusting Social is an AI Fintech pioneer that's revolutionizing credit access in emerging markets. Our mission is "Advancing AI to Meet the Financial Needs of Everyday Consumers with Empathy." We've assessed over 1 billion consumers across four countries, and we're on a mission to provide 100 million credit lines using the power of AI and Big Data.
job_description[1]: Are you a dedicated and curious
job_description[2]: Senior Data Analyst
job_description[3]: ready to dive deep into data and drive impactful business decisions? We're looking for a proactive individual to join our dynamic team in Vietnam. If you're passionate about uncovering insights, solving complex problems, and contributing directly to operational excellence and product development in a company with a strong social mission, this role is for you!
job_description[4]: How You'll Make an Impact
job_description[5]: As a Senior Data Analyst at Trusting Social, you'll be at the core of our data-driven decision-making process. You'll analyze and interpret complex datasets to provide actionable insights that directly influence our strategic direction, product enhancements, and operational efficiency. Your work will not only improve our internal processes but also contribute directly to democratizing credit access for millions in emerging markets.

job_description[8]: - Conduct In-Depth Analysis: Perform thorough data analyses focused on practical problems that drive significant business improvements.
job_description[9]: - Innovate Infrastructure: Support the maintenance and innovation of our analyst infrastructure, including code bases and business intelligence tools.
job_description[10]: - Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Work closely with various departments to enhance workflows and boost overall organizational efficiency.
job_description[11]: - Strengthen Our Team: Participate in talent acquisition and management efforts to help build and strengthen our analytics capabilities.

job_description[0]: About Casal:
job_description[1]: We are a Boutique Corporate Advisory/Family Office/Accounting practice that services small to mid-market. We are also part of a wider group serving our own in-house businesses with turnover in excess of $60M but also service external mid-size businesses across a range of industries.
job_description[2]: Our service offering is a combination of tax, accounting, data analytics and most importantly - advisory. We service approximately 15 groups, about half of them being related and the other half external.
job_description[3]: As we continue to grow, we are expanding our technology and automation capabilities to better support small-to-medium-sized businesses. We cut out the jargon and technical complexity to deliver simple, practical, and user-friendly solutions that enhance our clients’ daily operations and drive their success.
job_description[4]: About the job:
job_description[5]: We are looking for a
job_description[6]: Data/Software Engineer
job_description[7]: to join our growing team in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. This position will work closely with our accounting professionals to build internal applications, automate workflows, and integrate data across multiple systems that improve accuracy, efficiency and business insights.
job_description[8]: The successful candidate will work out of our office based in Hanoi.
job_description[9]: Key Responsibilities:
job_description[10]: • Developing and maintaining scalable data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data.
job_description[11]: • Designing and building internal web-apps that connect with accounting and operational systems.
job_description[12]: • Building integrations with internal and external data sources and APIs.
job_description[13]: • Exploring and implementing AI agents to solve real-world business problems.
job_description[14]: • Automating workflows to streamline accounting and financial reporting processes.
job_description[15]: • Managing data infrastructure on cloud platforms such as Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure.
job_description[16]: • Liaising with accounting and operational teams to identify tech needs and deliver solutions.

job_description[1]: Responsibilities:
job_description[2]: • Develop and maintain frontend solutions using Vue.js 3.
job_description[3]: • Evaluate and compare strengths and weaknesses of Vue.js 3 and other frontend frameworks (e.g., React.js).

job_description[8]: • Ensure version control using Git and follow Agile development methodologies.
job_description[9]: • Optimize application performance and user experience through efficient use of component lifecycles and performance tuning.
job_description[10]: • Experience in migrating or upgrading applications to Vue.js 3 or other frameworks is a plus.
job_description[11]: • Implement CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Azure DevOps) to facilitate continuous integration, delivery, and deployment.
job_description[12]: • Collaborate with development teams to integrate application code into CI/CD pipelines and implement automated testing and quality assurance strategies.
job_description[13]: • Implement security best practices to ensure compliance with standards and regulations throughout development and deployment.
job_description[14]: • Troubleshoot and debug issues to maintain high application stability.
job_description[15]: • Ensure code quality and maintainability through rigorous code reviews, testing, and adherence to coding standards.
job_description[16]: • Stay updated with the latest features and updates in Vue.js 3, and evaluate their relevance to ongoing projects.

job_description[0]: About UOB
job_description[1]: United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values – Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.
job_description[2]: About the Department
job_description[3]: The Finance and Corporate Services function manages the financial and administrative needs of the Group to help achieve its business goals.
job_description[4]: Overview of Role
job_description[5]: Lead Finance systems production support and data enablement to ensure accurate, timely, and well‑governed financial data for management, performance, and regulatory reporting. The role combines FIM operational excellence (SLA, SOP, controls) with data engineering to build robust pipelines across Data Warehouse and Hadoop platforms that strengthen Finance architecture and governance.
job_description[6]: Job Responsibilities
job_description[7]: A. Financial Information Management (Primary)
job_description[8]: • Ensure timely and accurate service delivery to Finance stakeholders in line with SLAs.
job_description[9]: • Maintain and govern system configuration; ensure SOPs are current, comprehensive, and adhered to.
job_description[10]: • Triage and resolve production issues, incidents, and user queries; drive root‑cause analysis and preventive fixes.
job_description[11]: • Translate Finance needs into functional requirements and support UAT (test plan, scripts, execution, sign‑off).
job_description[12]: • Liaise with Technology and vendors to implement enhancements and ensure compliance with Finance and regulatory standards.
job_description[13]: • Identify and implement process and control improvements to reduce risk and improve cycle time and data quality.
job_description[14]: B. Data Engineering (Secondary but critical)
job_description[15]: • Design, build, and maintain data pipelines (ETL/ELT) for Finance datasets across traditional Data Warehouse and Hadoop (Spark, Hive) platforms.
job_description[16]: • Optimize data storage, query performance, and reliability for Finance reporting and regulatory submissions.
job_description[17]: • Implement data quality checks, reconciliation controls, and lineage aligned to Enterprise Data Governance.
job_description[18]: • Partner with Analytics/Reporting teams to provision well‑modeled, governed datasets for dashboards and regulatory templates.

job_description[0]: MỤC ĐÍCH CÔNG VIỆC
job_description[1]: Điều phối, định hướng các hệ thống thuộc lĩnh vực sản xuất công nghiệp trên phương diện kỹ thuật. Triển khai hoàn thiện các công nghệ sản xuất, chuyển giao áp dụng cho các đơn vị sản xuất trực tiếp, điều phối xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh xuyên suốt qua trình tổ chức sản xuất nhằm đảm bảo mục tiêu, chỉ tiêu kế hoạch của công ty VNPT Technology đã đưa ra
job_description[2]: 1. Xây dựng quản lý và triển khai quy trình công nghệ sản xuất sản phẩm
job_description[3]: • Quản lý dự án sản xuất các sản phẩm mới (NPI), bao gồm các dự án OEM/ODM.
job_description[4]: • Tổ chức tiếp nhận chuyển giao công nghệ từ bộ phận nghiên cứu, phát triển thiết kế sản phẩm mẫu (Prototype).
job_description[5]: • Tổ chức triển khai hoạt động sản xuất thử nghiệm (Pilot) để xây dựng hoàn thiện công nghệ sản xuất cho từng sản phẩm cụ thể bao gồm: Quy trình sản xuất, tiêu chuẩn sử dụng nguồn lực (vật tư, nhân lực, máy móc, công cụ), hướng dẫn công việc, tư liệu kỹ thuật đặc thù.
job_description[6]: • Tổ chức chuyển giao, đào tạo công nghệ sản xuất sản phẩm tới đơn vị trực tiếp sản xuất trong giai đoạn sản xuất số lượng lớn (Mass Production).
job_description[7]: • Hỗ trợ kỹ thuật, đánh giá, cải tiến các quy trình, tiêu chuẩn để nâng cao hiệu quả sử dụng các nguồn lực, đảm bảo chất lượng sản phẩm và rút ngắn thời gian giao hàng xuyên suốt quá trình sản xuất số lượng lớn (Mass Production).
job_description[8]: 2. Xây dựng, triển khai máy móc dây chuyền và hạ tầng sản xuất mới
job_description[9]: • Tiếp nhận yêu cầu mở rộng, xác định quy mô, số lượng, yêu cầu kỹ thuật của máy móc, dây chuyền và hạ tầng sản xuất mới.
job_description[10]: • Tổ chức đánh giá các đề xuất kỹ thuật trong quá trình đầu tư.
job_description[11]: • Tổ chức nghiệm thu kỹ thuật các dự án đầu tư máy móc, dây chuyền và hạ tầng sản xuất mới.
job_description[12]: 3. Định hướng hệ thống, điều phối sản xuất.
job_description[13]: • Nghiên cứu đề xuất phương án, triển khai áp dụng các phương pháp và công cụ quản lý sản xuất tiên tiến, phù hợp với chiến lược và văn hóa công ty như Lean, 6 sigma,...
job_description[14]: • Xây dựng được phương án tối ưu trong hoạt động sản xuất sản phẩm công nghệ đối với các nghiệp vụ mang tính hệ thống, đề xuất áp dụng trong chuỗi sản xuất của công ty.
job_description[15]: • Tìm hiểu, đánh giá và đề xuất các chỉ số kiểm soát hiệu quả KPI cho hoạt động sản xuất.
job_description[16]: • Tìm hiểu chuyên sâu các công nghệ mới trong lĩnh vực sản phẩm công nghệ công nghiệp theo PLM, bao gồm cả: thiết kế, sản xuất, sửa chữa và bảo hành. Tham vấn, đào tạo, phổ biến kiến thức cho nội bộ tổ chức và các đối tác nhằm nâng cao năng lực của chuỗi.
job_description[17]: • Đánh giá được các yếu tố bên trong, bên ngoài ảnh hưởng tới hoạt động kỹ thuật của PEO, đề xuất tham mưu các chủ trương, phương án điều chỉnh nhằm nâng cao năng lực kỹ thuật của công ty.

job_description[0]: Our client is an US company is hiring Senior Test Engineer (onsite in CMs in Bac Ninh)
job_description[1]: This position supports existing manufacturing test processes as well as develops new innovative manufacturing test methods and processes. The duties of this position will be to support factory testing including new product.
job_description[2]: Primary duty: Conduct test engineering assignments on new and current products
job_description[3]: Second duty: Analyze testing data take preventives and corrective actions for problem & improvements in testing
job_description[4]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[5]: 1. Resolve all issues related to testing day-to-day from pre-production build; Evaluate newly designed products regarding test and manufacturability.
job_description[6]: 2. Determine root cause by gathering and analyzing test data related to test coverage, test yields; while ensuring production goals
job_description[7]: 3. Maintain and upgrade test equipment and configure it for new products.
job_description[8]: 4. Contribute in development and documentation of test fixtures, equipment, and procedures during the product development life cycle.
job_description[9]: 5. Develop new test plans/sequences, bug fix to resolve the issues reported and do software development & modification for test improvements.
job_description[10]: 6. Recommend and set up necessary process improvements

job_description[0]: POSITION PURPOSE
job_description[1]: Support Manager and support function teams like NCE/GTM in streamlining and automating reporting processes. Monitor stock status across the three main groups (ADV/SD/NC&SR stores) to promptly alert Supply Chain of any unusual cases, mitigating risks.
job_description[2]: RESPONSIBILITIES AND DUTIES
job_description[3]: Stock Controlling:
job_description[4]: • Undertake primary responsibility for monitoring stock volume and Days of Inventory (DOI) status in ADV distributor, promptly notifying Management and Supply Chain stakeholders upon detection of atypical DOI trends for specific SKUs.
job_description[5]: • Compile and deliver recommendations pertaining to stock management for the SD stock, aiming to optimize sales by strategically allocating resources to SKUs nearing expiration and promptly addressing elevated stock levels in key store locations.
job_description[6]: Forecasting and Planning:
job_description[7]: • Consolidate SR/NC stock data sourced from MOBIWORK to forecast volume targets at the individual store level. This entails leveraging historical sales volumes, current stock levels, and off-take calculations to ascertain the maximum potential volume delivery.
job_description[8]: Reporting & Sales Analysis:
job_description[9]: • Deliver comprehensive sales distribution analysis to Trade Sales, accompanied by actionable recommendations for CMM/RSM to gain a competitive edge in the market.
job_description[10]: • Assist the Manager in streamlining and automating reporting processes across departments to centralize HUD data and facilitate commercial analysis in Power BI.
job_description[11]: People:
job_description[12]: Promote collaboration and maintain a proactive approach to problem-solving. Foster a culture of knowledge-sharing to aid team members in their development and encourage mutual learning opportunities within the group.

job_description[0]: We are seeking a detail-oriented Software QA/QC Engineer who combines a tester’s mindset with a developer’s skill set to join our growing tech team. In this role, you will be a critical part of ensuring our commercial platforms which power our sales, distribution, and target-setting operations are reliable, accurate, and user-friendly.
job_description[1]: This is not just about finding bugs; it's about safeguarding our business logic and data integrity to help our sales teams succeed.
job_description[2]: By joining with us, you will be part of a high performance and enthusiastic software development team in a pleasant work environment.
job_description[3]: Analyze Business Requirements
job_description[4]: : Collaborate with project managers and business analysts to understand the logic behind our sales and data platforms, and design comprehensive test plans.
job_description[5]: Execute End-to-End Testing
job_description[6]: : Perform rigorous functional, integration, and usability testing on new features, system upgrades, and bug fixes for our web and mobile applications.
job_description[7]: Develop & Maintain Test Suites
job_description[8]: : Create, document, and execute detailed test cases and regression test suites to ensure new builds do not break existing business logic.
job_description[9]: Contribute to Innovation:
job_description[10]: Continuously update technical skills and willing to expand your scope of work to assist in building digital solutions that simplify workflows and optimize daily business operations.
job_description[11]: Validate Data Integrity
job_description[12]: : Perform data reconciliation and validation to ensure that reports, dashboards, and financial calculations are 100% accurate.
job_description[13]: Defect Management
job_description[14]: : Identify, clearly document, and track defects from discovery to resolution using our project management tools (Jira/ClickUp).
job_description[15]: Support & Troubleshoot
job_description[16]: : Work closely with the development team to reproduce and resolve technical issues identified in both testing and production environments.
job_requirement[0]: Execute End-to-End Testing
job_requirement[1]: : Perform rigorous functional, integration, and usability testing on new features, system upgrades, and bug fixes for our web and mobile applications.

job_description[0]: Trusting Social is an AI Fintech pioneer that's revolutionizing credit access in emerging markets. Our mission is "Advancing AI to Meet the Financial Needs of Everyday Consumers with Empathy." We've assessed over 1 billion consumers across four countries, and we're on a mission to provide 100 million credit lines using the power of AI and Big Data.
job_description[1]: How You'll Make an Impact
job_description[2]: The Credit Insight team consists of highly skilled and passionate data scientists who are committed to staying current with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Our team tackles a wide range of areas including credit scoring, fraudulent activity detection, profit optimization, and developing advanced technologies such as conversational AI. By analyzing extensive datasets that capture daily customer behavior, we continuously uncover unique and intriguing machine learning and business challenges. Our goal is to build robust machine learning models that enhance user experience and optimize the profitability of our financial products.
job_description[3]: What You'll Do
job_description[4]: • Train and Fine-tune LLM Models: Develop and refine large language models to follow instructions, comprehend customer inquiries, and communicate naturally and effectively.
job_description[5]: • Design and Develop LLM Agents: Create and tailor LLM agents to meet specific business needs and objectives.
job_description[6]: • Build Evaluation Frameworks: Establish comprehensive evaluation frameworks to assess the performance and effectiveness of LLM agents.
job_description[7]: • Feedback Collection and Model Improvement: Develop systems for collecting user feedback and iteratively improving model performance based on this feedback.
job_description[8]: • Develop Other ML Models: Design and implement various types of machine learning models to address diverse business needs.
job_description[9]: • Collaboration and Consultation: Work closely with peers, colleagues, and managers to resolve issues and achieve shared goals.
job_description[10]: • Develop other ML models.

job_title: Network Engineer, IT Department, Head Office
job_description[0]: Network Engineer
job_description[1]: is responsible for implementing application systems to support the bank's business goals while striving for the highest quality. We aim to provide extensive system support by delivering reliable application solutions. We are looking for a dedicated Network Administrator to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for managing and maintaining our network infrastructure to ensure seamless connectivity and performance for our core banking system. Additionally, you will be required to align and develop Infrastructure architecture, assess business requirements, and oversee Infrastructure projects in line with IT Enterprise Architecture.
job_description[2]: General Duties
job_description[3]: 1) General
job_description[4]: - Administer and maintain the bank's network infrastructure.
job_description[5]: - Troubleshoot network issues and provide technical support to end-users.
job_description[6]: - Document network configurations and support resolutions.
job_description[7]: 2) Network Management
job_description[8]: - Design, implement, and maintain network solutions, including routers, switches, and firewalls.
job_description[9]: - Monitor and optimize network performance to ensure high availability and reliability.
job_description[10]: - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve network-related challenges.
job_description[11]: 3) Infrastructure Architecture
job_description[12]: - Develop and align Infrastructure architecture in accordance with IT solution.
job_description[13]: - Assess requirements, design, and develop new IT Infrastructure to support business requirements.
job_description[14]: - Upgrade and manage the IT Infrastructure of the Bank.
job_description[15]: - Manage Infrastructure projects within budgets, timelines, and with required effectiveness and efficiency.
job_description[16]: 4) Administrative and Compliance
job_description[17]: - Oversee IT vendor management, including Service Level Agreements (SLAs).
job_description[18]: - Ensure all IT services and renewals are completed on time.
job_description[19]: - Ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements, external and internal audits, and security/regulatory certifications.
job_description[20]: - In conjunction with IT Security, develop and implement a comprehensive IT Security Policy.
job_description[21]: 5) Additional Responsibilities:
job_description[22]: - Provide key inputs to IT Controller and other Senior IT Management personnel on IT issues and Infrastructure in the banking industry.
job_description[23]: - Assess training requirements of the IT personnel and ensure adequate and relevant training is provided to them.
job_description[24]: - Develop Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan.
job_description[25]: - Be a part of IT committee meetings and advise Top Management on IT Projects and Strategy.
job_description[26]: - Demonstrate leadership skills to lead the team and ensure desired performance is delivered by the team.
job_description[27]: - Undertake any other responsibility as and when assigned by the competent authority of the bank from time to time.

job_description[0]: POSITION PURPOSE
job_description[1]: We are looking for an experienced and passionate Software and Application Support to join our team! As a Software and Application Support at our company, you will have the opportunity to work on new and exciting projects and develop your career.
job_description[2]: The Software and Application Supporter is responsible for providing technical assistance, troubleshooting, and end-user support for a range of software programs and business applications within an organisation. The position may also be involved in software deployment, testcase design and validation, updates, and user training.
job_description[3]: To be successful as a Software and Application Support, you should be result-driven, have good communication skills, the capability to run through tests, and the ability to analyze the results. Ultimately, the Software and Application Support should act as the first point of contact for users experiencing issues, ensuring prompt resolution and minimal disruption to business operations.
job_description[4]: AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY
job_description[5]: • Troubleshooting and issue resolution:
job_description[6]: • Diagnose and fix application and system issues, and provide technical support to internal and external users.
job_description[7]: • Escalate complex problems to higher-level support or vendors as needed.
job_description[8]: • Incident management: Respond to and manage support tickets, ensuring timely resolution and accurate logging of all issues.
job_description[9]: • Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, support manuals, and knowledge base articles for known fixes and procedures.
job_description[10]: • Root cause analysis: Perform root cause analysis to identify and address the underlying causes of recurring problems.
job_description[11]: • Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams, including development, operations, and infrastructure, to resolve complex problems and implement solutions.
job_description[12]: • Deployment and validation management: Assist with the deployment of application version updates, change validation, and bug fixes.
job_description[13]: • Process automation: Identify opportunities to automate routine tasks to improve efficiency.

job_title: Senior IT Audit in HCMC Office
job_description[0]: At EY, we’re all in to shape your future with confidence.
job_description[1]: We’ll help you succeed in a globally connected powerhouse of diverse teams and take your career wherever you want it to go.​
job_description[2]: Join EY and help to build a better working world.
job_description[3]: The opportunity: Senior – Technology Assurance (IT Audit)
job_description[4]: EY’s Technology Assurance services are designed for the dual purpose of strengthening internal controls and, in so doing, helping to improve IT and business performance. In addition to assurance-related engagements such as financial audit IT (FAIT), our services focus on IT governance and effectiveness; IT internal control assessment; security and controls of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) implementations; and risk data analysis.
job_description[5]: We are currently seeking senior associate positions in the following areas:
job_description[6]: - IT Process Risk & Internal Controls assessment
job_description[7]: - Application System Risk & Controls assessment
job_description[8]: - Data Delivery and Analysis Services practice
job_description[9]: - Financial Services Technology Risk and IT Regulatory Services
job_description[10]: Your key responsibilities
job_description[11]: - Perform IT audits for systems that generate financial statements that includes the effectiveness evaluation of IT General controls across IT environments, automated functions in ERP system system, data reports.
job_description[12]: - Support Executives in directing daily progress of fieldwork, informing works status, and managing performance in delivering IT audit assignments against established methodologies, frameworks and global best practices
job_description[13]: - Apply a thorough understanding of system functions, IT controls to support Managers in controls optimization assignments, in identify client or audit challenges, and in providing/ implementing/ assessing solutions.
job_description[14]: - Apply digital solutions and technology such as Alteryx, SQL, RPA and Python etc. to analyze data and identify abnormal criteria's in digital assurance engagements.

job_description[0]: Summary of Position
job_description[1]: Anne Hill International School (AHIS) seeks a highly motivated and experienced MIS Executive (Helpdesk) to join our growing team. You have experience with School Information System (SIS) experience and have at least 2 successful implementations will have an advantage. SIS knowledge should include, but not limited to Person Records Management, Teaching Management, Timetable management, School Reporting, Admissions/Registrations, Enrollment cycles, Fee management, Activities/ECA management, Student Care, Facilities Management, and portal management for students, teachers and parents would be advantageous.
job_description[2]: Responsibilities
job_description[3]: • Provide technical support and troubleshooting for staff and students.
job_description[4]: • Manage and maintain the school’s SIS and other software applications.
job_description[5]: • Assist with the implementation of new IT systems and upgrades.
job_description[6]: • Develop and deliver training to staff on IT systems and software.
job_description[7]: • Ensure data integrity and security.
job_description[8]: • Coordinate and work with overseas vendors.
job_description[9]: • Manage user expectations and provide excellent customer service.
job_description[10]: • Other requirements by line manager

job_description[0]: I. ABOUT 4P’s CORPORATION
job_description[1]: 4P’s, headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, operates 40 worldwide restaurants. Our main restaurant, Pizza 4P’s, has 35 stores in Vietnam and manages global franchises like IPPUDO and ABOUT LIFE COFFEE BREWERS. Our core products are food and beverages, specifically pizza, with key differentiators of "House-made cheeses", "Earth-to-people" and "Omotenashi" hospitality.
job_description[2]: Pizza 4P’s is an innovative Vietnam-based Japanese Italian pizza restaurant that started in Vietnam with a simple yet powerful mission: “Delivering Wow, Sharing Happiness”. We are known for crafting artisanal pizzas, homemade cheese, and unique East-meets-West flavors while embracing sustainability and community impact at the heart of everything we do. Today, we operate restaurants across Vietnam, Cambodia, Japan, India and Indonesia, and continue to grow with a vision of bringing people together through memorable dining experiences.
job_description[3]: II. ROLE PURPOSE
job_description[4]: As part of our commitment to innovation and customer happiness, our Technology Department develops digital solutions that enhance guest experience, streamline restaurant operations, and empower our partners. These include mobile applications, online ordering platforms, and internal management systems that support the entire 4P’s ecosystem.
job_description[5]: The UX/UI Designer plays a key role in designing and improving digital experiences that reflect 4P’s purpose and operational excellence. This position combines creative design thinking with user-centered principles to transform business needs into intuitive, elegant, and functional digital interfaces for both customers and internal teams.
job_description[6]: The role bridges business strategy, technology, and design to deliver delightful and efficient user journeys across all 4P’s digital touchpoints.
job_description[7]: Reporting to: Product Manager / Head of Product Design
job_description[8]: Job Level: Professional / Individual Contributor

job_description[1]: • Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược phát triển công nghệ dài hạn, gắn liền với mục tiêu kinh doanh và tầm nhìn số hóa của công ty

job_description[0]: The Data Analytics Supervisor
job_description[1]: is responsible for overseeing data analysis related to legal compliance and operational efficiency, utilizing tools like Excel and Power BI to generate insights and reports. This role involves collaborating with various departments to ensure adherence to regulations, optimizing data management systems, and providing training to team members.
job_description[2]: Job Duties:
job_description[3]: 1. Data Analysis & Compliance Monitoring:
job_description[4]: • Collect, analyze, and interpret legal and compliance data across various departments.
job_description[5]: • Utilize data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, and Power BI to synthesize information for decision-making.
job_description[6]: • Monitor regulatory changes and assess their impact on company operations.
job_description[7]: 2. Data System Management:
job_description[8]: • Evaluate and optimize the current information system for effective data management.
job_description[9]: • Develop and propose improvements to enhance data security and compliance with legal standards.
job_description[10]: • Ensure seamless integration with the Group’s common data system.
job_description[11]: 3. Compliance Support & Risk Management:
job_description[12]: • Provide data-driven insights to support internal compliance and risk management initiatives.
job_description[13]: • Work closely with Internal Control and Legal teams to evaluate compliance risks.
job_description[14]: • Assist in implementing strategies to ensure regulatory adherence.
job_description[15]: 4. Reporting & Dashboard Development:
job_description[16]: • Design dashboards and reporting tools to streamline compliance analysis.
job_description[17]: • Prepare detailed reports for senior management, ensuring clarity and accuracy.
job_description[18]: • Communicate analytical findings effectively to key stakeholders.
job_description[19]: 5. Employee Guidance & System Utilization:
job_description[20]: • Train employees on using compliance tools and information systems efficiently.
job_description[21]: • Maintain and update standards, processes, and policies related to compliance data management.
job_description[22]: 6. Legal Documentation & Policy Enforcement:
job_description[23]: • Assist in drafting and reviewing legal documents to ensure corporate compliance.
job_description[24]: • Support company-wide initiatives to align operations with legal requirements.

job_title: IT Manager (English) – Làm Việc Độc Lập
job_description[0]: 1. Mục tiêu công việc
job_description[1]: Đảm bảo tòa nhà hoạt động thuận lợi và phối hợp với IT Helpdesk xử lý các vấn đề về IT nội bộ.
job_description[2]: 2. Nhiệm vụ và trách nhiệm chính
job_description[3]: I-Công việc IT:
job_description[4]: Hạ tầng & hệ thống
job_description[5]: • Quản lý, vận hành và bảo trì hệ thống máy chủ, mạng LAN/WAN, Wi-Fi, VPN, firewall Fortinet, Sysnology, camera giám sát.
job_description[6]: • Đảm bảo hệ thống email, phần mềm văn phòng, phần mềm nghiệp vụ (MitaPro2025, Misa, Citrix, Zscalers, v.v.) hoạt động ổn định.
job_description[7]: • Giám sát backup, phục hồi dữ liệu, và bảo mật thông tin theo chính sách của tập đoàn.
job_description[8]: • Quản lý thiết bị CNTT: máy tính, laptop, printer, NAS/Synology, CCTV, và các thiết bị liên quan.
job_description[9]: Hỗ trợ người dùng (User Support)
job_description[10]: • Hỗ trợ kỹ thuật cho khoảng 140–150 nhân viên tại văn phòng, chi nhánh (Hà Nội, Hải Phòng, Quy Nhơn, Đà Nẵng, Cambodia).
job_description[11]: • Đào tạo và hướng dẫn người dùng về các quy trình và chính sách IT.
job_description[12]: • Giải quyết sự cố phần mềm, phần cứng, và kết nối mạng kịp thời.
job_description[13]: Quản lý & lập kế hoạch
job_description[14]: • Xây dựng ngân sách IT hàng năm (mua sắm, bảo trì, nâng cấp thiết bị, bản quyền phần mềm).
job_description[15]: • Đề xuất và triển khai các dự án nâng cấp hạ tầng, bảo mật, và chuyển đổi số.
job_description[16]: • Làm việc với đối tác, nhà cung cấp dịch vụ, và đội IT khu vực (Regional IT Team).
job_description[17]: • Báo cáo định kỳ cho Ban Giám đốc về tình hình hoạt động và rủi ro công nghệ.
job_description[18]: An toàn thông tin & tuân thủ
job_description[19]: • Thực hiện chính sách bảo mật thông tin (IT Security Policy) theo tiêu chuẩn toàn cầu của ECU Worldwide.
job_description[20]: • Giám sát việc tuân thủ các quy định về quyền truy cập, sao lưu và lưu trữ dữ liệu.
job_description[21]: • Phối hợp xử lý các sự cố an ninh mạng, kiểm toán nội bộ và kiểm tra của tập đoàn.
job_description[22]: II- Công việc bảo trì tòa nhà
job_description[23]: • Chịu trách nhiệm quản lý về tài sản của tòa nhà: số lượng và chất lượng các máy móc, thiết bị thuộc tòa nhà.
job_description[24]: • Chịu trách nhiệm về an ninh và an toàn của tòa nhà.
job_description[25]: • Liên hệ nhà cung cấp để sửa chữa, khắc phục kịp thời các sự cố liên quan đến các máy móc, thiết bị trong tòa nhà.
job_description[26]: • Theo dõi, đảm bảo hoạt động, phụ trách giám sát việc sửa chữa, lịch bảo trì hệ thống máy lạnh, hệ thống điện nước, hệ thống camera, máy phát điện, các thiết bị cứu hỏa,…
job_description[27]: • Điện:
job_description[28]: - Kiểm tra các thiết bị điện hàng ngày, liên hệ nhà cung cấp để sửa chữa, thay thế khi các thiết bị bị hư hỏng.
job_description[29]: - Theo dõi và ghi chỉ số đồng hồ điện hàng tháng.
job_description[30]: - Thông báo kịp thời cho cơ quan chức năng và nội bộ công ty về các tình huống mất điện hoặc sửa chữa điện.
job_description[31]: • Nước:

job_description[0]: Role Overview
job_description[1]: We are looking for an experienced engineer specializing in system-level validation to ensure the reliability and performance of operating system builds, firmware packages, and device drivers. The role involves performing comprehensive feature verification, building automated test capabilities, and supporting cross-disciplinary teams throughout the product development lifecycle.
job_description[2]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[3]: - System & Component Validation
job_description[4]: + Develop validation strategies and execute detailed test activities for OS builds, firmware modules, and subsystem drivers.
job_description[5]: + Evaluate system behavior across multiple hardware configurations and ensure compliance with quality and performance expectations.
job_description[6]: - Automation & Tooling
job_description[7]: + Build, enhance, and maintain automation frameworks and internal validation tools.
job_description[8]: + Diagnose script issues, optimize automated workflows, and support scalable test execution.
job_description[9]: - Cross-Functional Collaboration
job_description[10]: + Work closely with engineering partners across electrical, hardware, software, design, components, and program management teams to ensure seamless integration and validation readiness.
job_description[11]: + Communicate risks, findings, and technical insights clearly and promptly.
job_description[12]: - Testing Methodologies & Documentation
job_description[13]: + Apply structured testing approaches including black-box and grey-box techniques.
job_description[14]: + Draft and maintain test cases, validation checklists, execution results, and technical reports.
job_description[15]: + Support continuous improvement of validation practices, processes, and internal methodologies.
job_description[16]: - Planning & Execution
job_description[17]: + Take ownership of task estimation, scheduling, and progress tracking.
job_description[18]: + Actively contribute to team initiatives and improvement projects.
job_requirement[0]: Qualifications
job_requirement[1]: - 4–6+ years of professional experience in software, system validation, or a related technical domain.
job_requirement[2]: - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with hands-on experience in testing or validating system-level software.
job_requirement[3]: - Exposure to software design or testing workflows.
job_requirement[4]: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field (a Master’s degree may offset part of the experience requirement).
job_requirement[5]: - Solid understanding of Windows operating system architecture.
job_requirement[6]: - Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
job_requirement[7]: Preferred Experience
job_requirement[8]: - Experience validating firmware components, hardware drivers, or operating systems.
job_requirement[9]: - Familiarity with building automation tools, scripts, or software utilities for validation workflows.
job_requirement[10]: - Hands-on involvement in early hardware prototype testing, debugging, failure analysis, or performance/yield improvements.

job_description[0]: Our team
job_description[1]: Welcome to our KPMG Innovation and Developer Team. As the backbone of our corporate innovation, our team is dedicated to fostering growth, operational excellence, and a culture of innovation. Our mission is to drive the company forward by designing and developing cutting-edge solutions and internal applications. The team plays a pivotal role in enhancing our firm's efficiency and automation processes. We work hand-in-hand with other teams, creating a synergistic environment that allows us to adapt swiftly to regional technology trends and maintain robust security measures.
job_description[2]: Join us as we continue to push the boundaries of innovation, creating a future where our business thrives in an ever-evolving technological landscape.
job_description[3]: About the role
job_description[4]: We are seeking a Corporate Developer proficient in the .NET C# platform to join our dynamic innovation team. The successful candidate will be entrusted with developing robust web applications, designing and building SQL Server databases, as well as actively participating in every phase of the software development lifecycle.
job_description[5]: We welcome recent graduates who are enthusiastic about technology and learning. This is a fantastic opportunity to get involved in web application development in a corporate setting and start building your career.
job_description[6]: Key responsibilities
job_description[7]: 1. Develop robust and user-friendly web applications utilizing the .NET C# platform.
job_description[8]: 2. Design, build and maintain efficient SQL Server databases.
job_description[9]: 3. Participate in all stages of software development from conception, through planning, implementation, documentation, testing, and deployment.
job_description[10]: 4. Collaborate closely with the team and various stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver solutions.
job_description[11]: 5. Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code that follows the best software development practices.
job_description[12]: 6. Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize code to ensure performance & scalability.
job_description[13]: 7. Work flexibly across multiple projects and deadlines.

job_description[6]: • Team & Vendor Management: Lead the local network team and manage relationships and SLAs with external vendors and telco providers.

job_description[0]: Navigos Search's client in manufacturing sector is seeking a Digital / System Expert who will take ownership of end-to-end planning systems and support business stakeholders across supply chain and production planning functions. This role plays a key part in ensuring system reliability, driving continuous improvement, and enabling data-driven decision making through advanced technologies, including AI/ML forecasting.
job_description[1]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[2]: 1. System Ownership & Optimization
job_description[3]: - Serve as the subject-matter expert for planning systems, ensuring they are properly configured, maintained, and optimized for production planning and supply chain needs.
job_description[4]: - Continuously enhance system performance to deliver accurate planning outputs and reliable business results.
job_description[5]: - Troubleshoot system issues, identify root causes, and propose effective IT/system solutions.
job_description[6]: 2. Business & Technology Bridging
job_description[7]: - Work closely with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
job_description[8]: - Support new system rollouts, feature enhancements, and integration projects across supply chain, planning, and operations teams.
job_description[9]: - Guide stakeholders on system capabilities, best practices, and improvement opportunities.
job_description[10]: 3. Data Integrity & Compliance
job_description[11]: - Maintain strong data governance, ensuring planning master data, configurations, and transactions meet internal standards and compliance requirements.
job_description[12]: - Monitor and resolve system inaccuracies to support error-free planning cycles.
job_description[13]: 4. Advanced Analytics & Innovation
job_description[14]: - Lead initiatives that improve planning accuracy through automation, digitalization, and advanced analytics.
job_description[15]: - Apply AI/ML-based forecasting and optimization methods to enhance demand and supply planning processes.
job_description[16]: - Drive continuous improvement programs to increase efficiency and operational performance.
job_description[17]: 5. User Enablement & Risk Management
job_description[18]: - Deliver training and documentation for users to ensure effective planning system usage.
job_description[19]: - Manage system risks and ensure system stability, availability, and performance.
job_description[20]: - Provide actionable insights to support planning, supply chain, and operations leaders.

Collaboration is key, as you'll work closely with cross-functional teams to translate data insights into actionable features for our users.

job_description[4]: of users and concurrent transactions.

job_description[7]: • Implement efficient caching and storage solutions to deliver lightning-fast data access to our users.
job_description[8]: • Collaborate closely with front-end developers and the product manager to translate user needs into technical solutions.
job_description[9]: • Integrate with third-party services and exchanges to expand our data reach.
job_description[10]: • Write clean, well-documented code, adhering to best practices for code quality and security.

job_description[0]: About the role
job_description[1]: As a QA specialist - Maternity backup for 1 year, your mission is to ensure the stability and consistency of product quality from the very beginning of the production flow by controlling raw material quality (IQC) and monitoring key process checkpoints during manufacturing.
job_description[2]: After 1 year - Establish, improve, and maintain quality standards for new and existing 3D card products and production processes. Act as a quality gatekeeper during product development, ensuring that risks are assessed, test batches are properly inspected, and structured standards are in place to prevent defects and drive continuous improvement.
job_description[3]: Accountabilities
job_description[4]: • Maternity backup for 1 year
job_description[5]: • Support QC staff and line leaders in identifying potential process risks
job_description[6]: • Define and monitor in-line quality control checkpoints during production processes: printing, cutting, Foiling, gluing, folding, assembly, etc
job_description[7]: • Perform random in-process audits to ensure operators follow correct methods and standards
job_description[8]: • Investigate recurring defects or process abnormalities and assist in root cause analysis
job_description[9]: • Recommend process adjustments or preventive actions based on early defect trends/risk in new project or daily audit
job_description[10]: • Validate changes to materials, tools, or settings before full-scale use
job_description[11]: • Coordinate testing for alternative or replacement materials proposed by Purchasing, ensure test results meet technical and functional standards for 3D card applications (e.g. printing, cutting, folding, gluing…)
job_description[12]: After 1 year, rotation to
job_description[13]: • Evaluate structure, materials, and production feasibility of new designs
job_description[14]: • Coordinate with PE, TRA and Production teams to define mitigation plans
job_description[15]: • Approve new product readiness for test batch or mass production
job_description[16]: • Conduct detailed inspections for test batch orders
job_description[17]: • Verify compliance with customer specs, artwork, pop-up structure, and packaging
job_description[18]: • Document defects, risk areas, and recommend improvements before mass production approval
job_description[19]: • Define product-specific inspection criteria based on customer requirements
job_description[20]: • Finalize standard samples with QA and cross-functional alignment
job_description[21]: • Standardize quality checkpoints and criteria for each production step (printing, cutting, assembly, etc.)
job_description[22]: • Develop QA Standards for QC team and production use
job_description[23]: • Support training and audits to ensure adherence to standards

job_title: HR Intern Employer Branding & UX/UI Support (English Required)
job_description[0]: JOB PURPOSE
job_description[1]: This role is ideal for someone who enjoys design, has an interest in UX/UI, and feels confident communicating in English. You will work in a supportive environment with guidance from the HR team.
job_description[2]: 1. Employer Branding & Employee Engagement (90%)
job_description[3]: a. HR Landing Page Support on SharePoint (70%)
job_description[4]: • Assist in designing and updating the HR landing page on SharePoint.
job_description[5]: • Apply basic UX/UI principles to ensure the page is user-friendly and visually appealing.
job_description[6]: • Help with layouts, simple wireframes, icons, and banners.

job_description[0]: 1. Master Data Governance & Control
job_description[1]: - Establish and maintain RSC’s Master Data Governance framework, policies, naming conventions, and validation rules.
job_description[2]: - Ensure all master data requests follow the standardized process: Template → Approval → MDT validation → System update.
job_description[3]: - Maintain strong controls to prevent duplicates, incorrect setup, or inconsistent data in D365.
job_description[4]: - Define and enforce data quality standards and audit mechanisms.
job_description[5]: 2. Data Review & Validation
job_description[6]: - Validate all master data submissions (by Data Owners) for structure, completeness, accuracy, consistency, naming standards, and version control.

job_description[8]: - Coordinate with functional SME/ data owners to clarify data issues or resolve conflicts
job_description[9]: 3. Approval & Workflow Oversight
job_description[10]: - Review and approve Master Data Officer updates before they are executed in the system.
job_description[11]: - Ensure proper approval documentation (email, sign-off forms, workflow records) is attached for audit purposes.
job_description[12]: - Act as the final gatekeeper before changes are applied in D365.
job_description[13]: 4. Master Data Operations Management
job_description[14]: - Manage and prioritize daily master data intake and workload for the Master Data team.
job_description[15]: - Oversee quality and timelines of system updates performed by Master Data Officers.
job_description[16]: - Ensure proper handover and tracking of every master data request through the MDT pipeline (ticketing / SharePoint / logs).
job_description[17]: 5. Reporting & Compliance
job_description[18]: - Generate monthly master data quality reports for PMO, Internal Audit, and functional heads.
job_description[19]: - Monitor KPIs such as:
job_description[20]: o Data quality score
job_description[21]: o Duplicate reduction
job_description[22]: o On-time master data processing
job_description[23]: o Error / rework count
job_description[24]: - Support compliance with RSC and international audit requirements.
job_description[25]: 6. Project & Change Management Support
job_description[26]: - Work closely with ERP, IT, and functional teams on:
job_description[27]: o Data migration
job_description[28]: o New module rollout
job_description[29]: o System enhancements
job_description[30]: o Integration improvements
job_description[31]: - Provide guidance on master data structure changes and impacts.

job_description[0]: It's more than a job
job_description[1]: In this IT role, you will manage, develop, and support the technology infrastructure that powers Kuehne+Nagel’s global systems and operations. This contribution is vital to making both special and ordinary moments in the lives of people a reality. In fact, your work enables our teams to deliver fresh fruit, time-sensitive healthcare products and much more to people all around the world. Working in IT at Kuehne+Nagel contributes to more than we imagine.
job_description[2]: The IT Specialist is responsible for providing comprehensive technical support across the organization, ensuring the smooth operation of end-user devices, IT infrastructure, and related systems. This role supports day-to-day user needs, manages endpoint configurations, and assists in maintaining core infrastructure components such as servers, networks, and storage. In addition, the IT Specialist contributes to IT procurement processes, asset tracking, and general administrative tasks to support the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the IT function. The position plays a key role in maintaining a secure, reliable, and user-focused IT environment aligned with organizational goals.
job_description[3]: How you create impact
job_description[4]: • Provide technical support to end users via phone, email, chat, or in person.
job_description[5]: • Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to desktops, laptops, mobile devices, printers, and other peripherals.
job_description[6]: • Install, configure, and maintain operating systems, software applications, and hardware components following corporate standards.
job_description[7]: • Manage endpoint devices using corporate provided tools such as RMM/MDM/EMM platforms.
job_description[8]: • Ensure infrastructure and endpoint security through patch management, access controls, and compliance with IT policies and data protection guidelines.
job_description[9]: • Maintain accurate documentation of support requests, resolutions, asset inventory (hardware and software), network diagrams, configurations, and standard operating procedures
job_description[10]: • Collaborate with other IT team members to escalate and resolve complex issues.
job_description[11]: • Assist in onboarding and offboarding processes, including device provisioning and decommissioning.
job_description[12]: • Participate in IT projects and initiatives related to infrastructure upgrades, system rollouts, and process improvements
job_description[13]: • Based on business requirements, design, implement, and maintain network and other IT infrastructure components, including physical and virtual servers, storage systems, and backup solutions, ensuring corporate standards are consistently applied.
job_description[14]: • Monitor performance bottlenecks (e.g. network bandwidth or resources on servers), troubleshoot connectivity issues to ensure high availability and reliability, and propose improvements.
job_description[15]: • Collaborate with vendors and service providers for infrastructure implementations, upgrades and support.
job_description[16]: • Participate in disaster recovery planning and testing.
job_description[17]: • Provide support for escalated issues.
job_description[18]: • Assist in IT procurement processes, including sourcing, evaluating, and purchasing hardware, software, and services.
job_description[19]: • Coordinate with vendors for quotes, deliveries, and support agreements.

job_description[0]: About UOB
job_description[1]: United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values – Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.
job_description[2]: About the Department
job_description[3]: The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our physical and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.
job_description[4]: Overview of the Role
job_description[5]: Application Development & Support Manager is responsible for supporting maintenance and enhancing local applications based on Business Unit and Regulatory requirement; conducting Application assessment to provide suitable application fixing for application bug, security issue following UOB Technical standards; managing local vendor in providing IT software service for local application.
job_description[6]: Job Responsibilities
job_description[7]: • Conduct Application design, POC and solution review with Group SME for any new application or system enhancement.
job_description[8]: • Collaborate with cross-functional teams such as development, infrastructure, architecture, etc. to enhance application systems and processes.
job_description[9]: • Participate in project reviews and evaluations, ensuring alignment of technology investments with the Enterprise Architecture Framework and the bank’s strategic directions.
job_description[10]: • Work with testing team to ensure the test strategy align with application design and implementation plan.
job_description[11]: • Manage vendor performance and qualities to ensure their output meet our UOB Technical standard and project timeline.
job_description[12]: • Ensure Application deployment meeting our UOB release management criteria.
job_description[13]: • Manage risks and issues relating to the successful execution of assigned projects.
job_description[14]: • Monitor progress against project plans and identify areas for improvement.

job_description[0]: • Develop, maintain, and optimize frontend applications using Vue.js 3 and Next.js.
job_description[1]: • Evaluate and compare strengths, weaknesses, and use-cases of Vue.js 3, Next.js, and other modern frontend frameworks.
job_description[2]: • Implement core Vue.js 3 and Next.js principles including components, server-side rendering (SSR), routing, reactivity, state management (Pinia/Vuex), and API data fetching.

job_description[4]: • Integrate frontend applications with RESTful APIs using asynchronous programming and efficient data-handling patterns.

job_description[6]: • Ensure proper version control practices using Git and contribute in an Agile/Scrum development environment.

job_description[8]: • Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps) for automated testing, integration, and deployment.
job_description[9]: • Collaborate with backend and DevOps teams to ensure smooth integration and deployment of frontend code.
job_description[10]: • Apply security best practices across Vue.js and Next.js applications to ensure compliance with relevant standards.
job_description[11]: • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve frontend issues to maintain high application stability.
job_description[12]: • Maintain code quality through code reviews, testing, documentation, and adherence to industry best practices.
job_description[13]: • Stay updated with latest developments in Vue.js 3 and Next.js.

job_description[0]: AI Thermal & Mechanical Engineer – Job Description
job_description[1]: Mechanical & Thermal Systems Lead for Home AI Data Center Prototype
job_description[2]: Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_description[3]: Type: Full-Time
job_description[4]: Department: Hardware Engineering
job_description[5]: Reports to: AI Hardware Systems Engineer / Founder
job_description[6]: Industry: AI Hardware • High-Performance Consumer Electronics • Edge Computing
job_description[8]: About the Role
job_description[9]: We are developing a next-generation Home AI Data Center — a compact, plug-and-play system that combines AI acceleration, gaming-level performance, and home server functionality in a single device.
job_description[10]: We are seeking an experienced AI Thermal & Mechanical Engineer to design, prototype, and optimize the mechanical structure and cooling systems of the device. You will ensure the hardware can operate safely and efficiently under high-performance AI and gaming workloads while maintaining a sleek, consumer-ready design.
job_description[11]: This role is critical to turning the hardware concept into a robust, functional, and thermally optimized prototype.
job_description[13]: Key Responsibilities
job_description[14]: Thermal System Design
job_description[15]: Design and implement advanced thermal management solutions including:
job_description[16]: Cold plate and liquid cooling systems
job_description[17]: Heat pipes, radiators, and airflow optimization
job_description[18]: Thermal interface materials (TIMs) and heatsink integration
job_description[19]: Model thermal loads using CFD or equivalent tools to ensure stable operation under AI/gaming workloads.
job_description[20]: Collaborate with hardware engineers to ensure thermal designs support component longevity and system stability.
job_description[21]: Mechanical Design
job_description[22]: Design and prototype the enclosure/chassis for the compact AI Data Center.
job_description[23]: Ensure precise integration of electronic components, cooling systems, and wiring harnesses.
job_description[24]: Maintain structural integrity, vibration resistance, and durability.
job_description[25]: Select materials and manufacturing methods suitable for prototype and eventual consumer production.
job_description[26]: Prototype Development & Testing
job_description[27]: Collaborate with the Assembly & Electronics Technician to build and test prototype units.
job_description[28]: Conduct thermal and mechanical testing to validate designs.
job_description[29]: Iterate designs based on testing results to optimize performance, noise, and reliability.
job_description[30]: Collaboration
job_description[31]: Work closely with the AI Hardware Systems Engineer on system layout and integration.
job_description[32]: Provide mechanical and thermal input to the Software/UI Engineer to ensure smooth user interaction and airflow considerations.
job_description[33]: Communicate progress, technical decisions, and recommendations directly to the founder.
job_description[37]: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Thermal Engineering, Mechatronics, or related field.
job_description[38]: 1 - 2 + years of experience in thermal design and mechanical engineering for electronics or high-performance computing devices.
job_description[39]: Strong experience with CAD tools (SolidWorks, AutoCAD, CATIA, or similar).
job_description[40]: Knowledge of thermal simulation and analysis (CFD, ANSYS, or equivalent).
job_description[41]: Understanding of materials, tolerances, and manufacturability for metals, plastics, or hybrid enclosures.
job_description[42]: Experience designing enclosures and cooling systems for compact, high-density electronics.
job_description[43]: Ability to read and interpret mechanical drawings, schematics, and assembly guides.
job_description[45]: High attention to detail and precision in design work.
job_description[46]: Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot thermal or mechanical issues.
job_description[48]: Comfortable working in a fast-paced, prototype-driven environment.
job_description[49]: Ability to iterate quickly and adapt designs based on testing feedback.
job_description[52]: Experience designing enclosures for high-performance PCs, servers, or AI systems.
job_description[53]: Familiarity with vibration, acoustic, or shock mitigation techniques.
job_description[54]: Experience with rapid prototyping tools (3D printing, CNC machining, laser cutting).
job_description[55]: Experience in consumer electronics or startup hardware product development.
job_description[58]: Opportunity to lead the thermal and mechanical design of a first-of-its-kind AI hardware product.
job_description[59]: Competitive salary for top engineering talent in Vietnam.
job_description[60]: Direct collaboration with founders and senior engineers.
job_description[61]: A chance to have ownership of your work and shape the product for global launch.
